67 extern pEffect SpellEffects[TOTAL_SPELL_EFFECTS];
68 
69 SpellDestination::SpellDestination()
70 {
71  _position.Relocate(0, 0, 0, 0);
72  _transportOffset.Relocate(0, 0, 0, 0);
73 }
74 
75 SpellDestination::SpellDestination(float x, float y, float z, float orientation, uint32 mapId)
76 {
77  _position.Relocate(x, y, z, orientation);
78  _position.m_mapId = mapId;
79  _transportOffset.Relocate(0, 0, 0, 0);
80 }
81 
82 SpellDestination::SpellDestination(Position const& pos)
83 {
84  _position.Relocate(pos);
85  _transportOffset.Relocate(0, 0, 0, 0);
86 }
87 
88 SpellDestination::SpellDestination(WorldObject const& wObj)
89 {
90  _transportGUID = wObj.GetTransGUID();
91  _transportOffset.Relocate(wObj.GetTransOffsetX(), wObj.GetTransOffsetY(), wObj.GetTransOffsetZ(), wObj.GetTransOffsetO());
92  _position.Relocate(wObj);
93 }
94 
95 void SpellDestination::Relocate(Position const& pos)
96 {
97  if (_transportGUID)
98  {
99  Position offset;
100  _position.GetPositionOffsetTo(pos, offset);
101  _transportOffset.RelocateOffset(offset);
102  }
103  _position.Relocate(pos);
104 }
105 
106 void SpellDestination::RelocateOffset(Position const& offset)
107 {
108  if (_transportGUID)
109  _transportOffset.RelocateOffset(offset);
110 
111  _position.RelocateOffset(offset);
112 }
113 
114 SpellCastTargets::SpellCastTargets() : m_elevation(0), m_speed(0), m_strTarget()
115 {
116  m_objectTarget = nullptr;
117  m_itemTarget = nullptr;
118 
119  m_itemTargetEntry = 0;
120 
121  m_targetMask = 0;
122 }
123 
124 SpellCastTargets::~SpellCastTargets()
125 {
126 }
127 
128 void SpellCastTargets::Read(ByteBuffer& data, Unit* caster)
129 {
130  data >> m_targetMask;
131 
132  if (m_targetMask == TARGET_FLAG_NONE)
133  return;
134 
135  if (m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT | TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MINIPET | TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ENEMY | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ALLY))
136  data >> m_objectTargetGUID.ReadAsPacked();
137 
138  if (m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_ITEM | TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM))
139  data >> m_itemTargetGUID.ReadAsPacked();
140 
141  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)
142  {
143  data >> m_src._transportGUID.ReadAsPacked();
144  if (m_src._transportGUID)
145  data >> m_src._transportOffset.PositionXYZStream();
146  else
147  data >> m_src._position.PositionXYZStream();
148  }
149  else
150  {
151  m_src._transportGUID = caster->GetTransGUID();
152  if (m_src._transportGUID)
153  m_src._transportOffset.Relocate(caster->GetTransOffsetX(), caster->GetTransOffsetY(), caster->GetTransOffsetZ(), caster->GetTransOffsetO());
154  else
155  m_src._position.Relocate(caster);
156  }
157 
158  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
159  {
160  data >> m_dst._transportGUID.ReadAsPacked();
161  if (m_dst._transportGUID)
162  data >> m_dst._transportOffset.PositionXYZStream();
163  else
164  data >> m_dst._position.PositionXYZStream();
165  }
166  else
167  {
168  m_dst._transportGUID = caster->GetTransGUID();
169  if (m_dst._transportGUID)
170  m_dst._transportOffset.Relocate(caster->GetTransOffsetX(), caster->GetTransOffsetY(), caster->GetTransOffsetZ(), caster->GetTransOffsetO());
171  else
172  m_dst._position.Relocate(caster);
173  }
174 
175  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_STRING)
176  data >> m_strTarget;
177 
178  Update(caster);
179 }
180 
181 void SpellCastTargets::Write(ByteBuffer& data)
182 {
183  data << uint32(m_targetMask);
184 
185  if (m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ALLY | TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ENEMY | TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MINIPET))
186  data << m_objectTargetGUID.WriteAsPacked();
187 
188  if (m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_ITEM | TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM))
189  {
190  if (m_itemTarget)
191  data << m_itemTarget->GetPackGUID();
192  else
193  data << uint8(0);
194  }
195 
196  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)
197  {
198  data << m_src._transportGUID.WriteAsPacked(); // relative position guid here - transport for example
199  if (m_src._transportGUID)
200  data << m_src._transportOffset.PositionXYZStream();
201  else
202  data << m_src._position.PositionXYZStream();
203  }
204 
205  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
206  {
207  data << m_dst._transportGUID.WriteAsPacked(); // relative position guid here - transport for example
208  if (m_dst._transportGUID)
209  data << m_dst._transportOffset.PositionXYZStream();
210  else
211  data << m_dst._position.PositionXYZStream();
212  }
213 
214  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_STRING)
215  data << m_strTarget;
216 }
217 
218 ObjectGuid SpellCastTargets::GetUnitTargetGUID() const
219 {
220  switch (m_objectTargetGUID.GetHigh())
221  {
222  case HighGuid::Player:
223  case HighGuid::Vehicle:
224  case HighGuid::Unit:
225  case HighGuid::Pet:
226  return m_objectTargetGUID;
227  default:
228  break;
229  }
230 
231  return ObjectGuid::Empty;
232 }
233 
234 Unit* SpellCastTargets::GetUnitTarget() const
235 {
236  if (m_objectTarget)
237  return m_objectTarget->ToUnit();
238  return nullptr;
239 }
240 
241 void SpellCastTargets::SetUnitTarget(Unit* target)
242 {
243  if (!target)
244  return;
245 
246  m_objectTarget = target;
247  m_objectTargetGUID = target->GetGUID();
248  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_UNIT;
249 }
250 
251 ObjectGuid SpellCastTargets::GetGOTargetGUID() const
252 {
253  switch (m_objectTargetGUID.GetHigh())
254  {
255  case HighGuid::Transport:
256  case HighGuid::Mo_Transport:
257  case HighGuid::GameObject:
258  return m_objectTargetGUID;
259  default:
260  break;
261  }
262 
263  return ObjectGuid::Empty;
264 }
265 
266 GameObject* SpellCastTargets::GetGOTarget() const
267 {
268  if (m_objectTarget)
269  return m_objectTarget->ToGameObject();
270  return nullptr;
271 }
272 
273 void SpellCastTargets::SetGOTarget(GameObject* target)
274 {
275  if (!target)
276  return;
277 
278  m_objectTarget = target;
279  m_objectTargetGUID = target->GetGUID();
280  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT;
281 }
282 
283 ObjectGuid SpellCastTargets::GetCorpseTargetGUID() const
284 {
285  switch (m_objectTargetGUID.GetHigh())
286  {
287  case HighGuid::Corpse:
288  return m_objectTargetGUID;
289  default:
290  break;
291  }
292 
293  return ObjectGuid::Empty;
294 }
295 
296 Corpse* SpellCastTargets::GetCorpseTarget() const
297 {
298  if (m_objectTarget)
299  return m_objectTarget->ToCorpse();
300  return nullptr;
301 }
302 
303 void SpellCastTargets::SetCorpseTarget(Corpse* target)
304 {
305  if (!target)
306  return;
307 
308  m_objectTarget = target;
309  m_objectTargetGUID = target->GetGUID();
310  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_MASK;
311 }
312 
313 WorldObject* SpellCastTargets::GetObjectTarget() const
314 {
315  return m_objectTarget;
316 }
317 
318 ObjectGuid SpellCastTargets::GetObjectTargetGUID() const
319 {
320  return m_objectTargetGUID;
321 }
322 
323 void SpellCastTargets::RemoveObjectTarget()
324 {
325  m_objectTarget = nullptr;
326  m_objectTargetGUID.Clear();
327  m_targetMask &= ~(TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MASK | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_MASK | TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT_MASK);
328 }
329 
330 void SpellCastTargets::SetItemTarget(Item* item)
331 {
332  if (!item)
333  return;
334 
335  m_itemTarget = item;
336  m_itemTargetGUID = item->GetGUID();
337  m_itemTargetEntry = item->GetEntry();
338  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_ITEM;
339 }
340 
341 void SpellCastTargets::SetTradeItemTarget(Player* caster)
342 {
343  m_itemTargetGUID.Set(uint64(TRADE_SLOT_NONTRADED));
344  m_itemTargetEntry = 0;
345  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM;
346 
347  Update(caster);
348 }
349 
350 void SpellCastTargets::UpdateTradeSlotItem()
351 {
352  if (m_itemTarget && (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM))
353  {
354  m_itemTargetGUID = m_itemTarget->GetGUID();
355  m_itemTargetEntry = m_itemTarget->GetEntry();
356  }
357 }
358 
359 SpellDestination const* SpellCastTargets::GetSrc() const
360 {
361  return &m_src;
362 }
363 
364 Position const* SpellCastTargets::GetSrcPos() const
365 {
366  return &m_src._position;
367 }
368 
369 void SpellCastTargets::SetSrc(float x, float y, float z)
370 {
371  m_src = SpellDestination(x, y, z);
372  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION;
373 }
374 
375 void SpellCastTargets::SetSrc(Position const& pos)
376 {
377  m_src = SpellDestination(pos);
378  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION;
379 }
380 
381 void SpellCastTargets::SetSrc(WorldObject const& wObj)
382 {
383  m_src = SpellDestination(wObj);
384  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION;
385 }
386 
387 void SpellCastTargets::ModSrc(Position const& pos)
388 {
389  ASSERT(m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION);
390  m_src.Relocate(pos);
391 }
392 
393 void SpellCastTargets::RemoveSrc()
394 {
395  m_targetMask &= ~(TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION);
396 }
397 
398 SpellDestination const* SpellCastTargets::GetDst() const
399 {
400  return &m_dst;
401 }
402 
403 WorldLocation const* SpellCastTargets::GetDstPos() const
404 {
405  return &m_dst._position;
406 }
407 
408 void SpellCastTargets::SetDst(float x, float y, float z, float orientation, uint32 mapId)
409 {
410  m_dst = SpellDestination(x, y, z, orientation, mapId);
411  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION;
412 }
413 
414 void SpellCastTargets::SetDst(Position const& pos)
415 {
416  m_dst = SpellDestination(pos);
417  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION;
418 }
419 
420 void SpellCastTargets::SetDst(WorldObject const& wObj)
421 {
422  m_dst = SpellDestination(wObj);
423  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION;
424 }
425 
426 void SpellCastTargets::SetDst(SpellDestination const& spellDest)
427 {
428  m_dst = spellDest;
429  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION;
430 }
431 
432 void SpellCastTargets::SetDst(SpellCastTargets const& spellTargets)
433 {
434  m_dst = spellTargets.m_dst;
435  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION;
436 }
437 
438 void SpellCastTargets::ModDst(Position const& pos)
439 {
440  ASSERT(m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION);
441  m_dst.Relocate(pos);
442 }
443 
444 void SpellCastTargets::ModDst(SpellDestination const& spellDest)
445 {
446  ASSERT(m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION);
447  m_dst = spellDest;
448 }
449 
450 void SpellCastTargets::RemoveDst()
451 {
452  m_targetMask &= ~(TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION);
453 }

455 // Xinef: Channel Data
456 void SpellCastTargets::SetObjectTargetChannel(ObjectGuid targetGUID)
457 {
458  m_objectTargetGUIDChannel = targetGUID;
459 }
460 
461 void SpellCastTargets::SetDstChannel(SpellDestination const& spellDest)
462 {
463  m_dstChannel = spellDest;
464 }
465 
466 WorldObject* SpellCastTargets::GetObjectTargetChannel(Unit* caster) const
467 {
468  return m_objectTargetGUIDChannel ? ((m_objectTargetGUIDChannel == caster->GetGUID()) ? caster : ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*caster, m_objectTargetGUIDChannel)) : nullptr;
469 }
470 
471 bool SpellCastTargets::HasDstChannel() const
472 {
473  return m_dstChannel._position.GetExactDist(0, 0, 0) > 0.001f;
474 }
475 
476 SpellDestination const* SpellCastTargets::GetDstChannel() const
477 {
478  return &m_dstChannel;
479 }
480 
481 void SpellCastTargets::Update(Unit* caster)
482 {
483  m_objectTarget = m_objectTargetGUID ? ((m_objectTargetGUID == caster->GetGUID()) ? caster : ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*caster, m_objectTargetGUID)) : nullptr;
484 
485  m_itemTarget = nullptr;
486  if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
487  {
488  Player* player = caster->ToPlayer();
489  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_ITEM)
490  m_itemTarget = player->GetItemByGuid(m_itemTargetGUID);
491  else if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
492  if (m_itemTargetGUID.GetRawValue() == TRADE_SLOT_NONTRADED) // here it is not guid but slot. Also prevents hacking slots
493  if (TradeData* pTrade = player->GetTradeData())
494  m_itemTarget = pTrade->GetTraderData()->GetItem(TRADE_SLOT_NONTRADED);
495 
496  if (m_itemTarget)
497  m_itemTargetEntry = m_itemTarget->GetEntry();
498  }
499 
500  // update positions by transport move
501  if (HasSrc() && m_src._transportGUID)
502  {
503  if (WorldObject* transport = ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*caster, m_src._transportGUID))
504  {
505  m_src._position.Relocate(transport);
506  m_src._position.RelocateOffset(m_src._transportOffset);
507  }
508  }
509 
510  if (HasDst() && m_dst._transportGUID)
511  {
512  if (WorldObject* transport = ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*caster, m_dst._transportGUID))
513  {
514  m_dst._position.Relocate(transport);
515  m_dst._position.RelocateOffset(m_dst._transportOffset);
516  }
517  }
518 }
519 
520 class SpellEvent : public BasicEvent
521 {
522  public:
523  SpellEvent(Spell* spell);
524  ~SpellEvent();
525 
526  bool Execute(uint64 e_time, uint32 p_time);
527  void Abort(uint64 e_time);
528  bool IsDeletable() const;
529 
530  protected:
531  Spell* m_Spell;
532 };
533 
534 void SpellCastTargets::OutDebug() const
535 {
536  if (!m_targetMask)
537  LOG_INFO("spells", "No targets");
538 
539  LOG_INFO("spells", "target mask: %u", m_targetMask);
540  if (m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MASK | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_MASK | TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT_MASK))
541  LOG_INFO("spells", "Object target: %s", m_objectTargetGUID.ToString().c_str());
542  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_ITEM)
543  LOG_INFO("spells", "Item target: %s", m_itemTargetGUID.ToString().c_str());
544  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
545  LOG_INFO("spells", "Trade item target: %s", m_itemTargetGUID.ToString().c_str());
546  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)
547  LOG_INFO("spells", "Source location: transport guid: %s trans offset: %s position: %s",
548  m_src._transportGUID.ToString().c_str(), m_src._transportOffset.ToString().c_str(), m_src._position.ToString().c_str());
549  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
550  LOG_INFO("spells", "Destination location: transport guid: %s trans offset: %s position: %s",
551  m_dst._transportGUID.ToString().c_str(), m_dst._transportOffset.ToString().c_str(), m_dst._position.ToString().c_str());
552  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_STRING)
553  LOG_INFO("spells", "String: %s", m_strTarget.c_str());
554  LOG_INFO("spells", "speed: %f", m_speed);
555  LOG_INFO("spells", "elevation: %f", m_elevation);
556 }
557 
558 SpellValue::SpellValue(SpellInfo const* proto)
559 {
560  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
561  EffectBasePoints[i] = proto->Effects[i].BasePoints;
562  MaxAffectedTargets = proto->MaxAffectedTargets;
563  RadiusMod = 1.0f;
564  AuraStackAmount = 1;
565  AuraDuration = 0;
566  ForcedCritResult = false;
567 }
568 
569 Spell::Spell(Unit* caster, SpellInfo const* info, TriggerCastFlags triggerFlags, ObjectGuid originalCasterGUID, bool skipCheck) :
570  m_spellInfo(sSpellMgr->GetSpellForDifficultyFromSpell(info, caster)),
571  m_caster((info->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR6_ORIGINATE_FROM_CONTROLLER) && caster->GetCharmerOrOwner()) ? caster->GetCharmerOrOwner() : caster)
572  , m_spellValue(new SpellValue(m_spellInfo)), _spellEvent(nullptr)
573 {
574  m_customError = SPELL_CUSTOM_ERROR_NONE;
575  m_skipCheck = skipCheck;
576  m_selfContainer = nullptr;
577  m_referencedFromCurrentSpell = false;
578  m_executedCurrently = false;
579  m_needComboPoints = m_spellInfo->NeedsComboPoints();
580  m_delayStart = 0;
581  m_delayAtDamageCount = 0;
582 
583  m_applyMultiplierMask = 0;
584  m_auraScaleMask = 0;
585  memset(m_damageMultipliers, 0, sizeof(m_damageMultipliers));
586 
587  // Get data for type of attack
588  switch (m_spellInfo->DmgClass)
589  {
590  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
591  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_REQUIRES_OFF_HAND_WEAPON))
592  m_attackType = OFF_ATTACK;
593  else
594  m_attackType = BASE_ATTACK;
595  break;
596  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
597  m_attackType = m_spellInfo->IsRangedWeaponSpell() ? RANGED_ATTACK : BASE_ATTACK;
598  break;
599  default:
600  // Wands
601  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_AUTO_REPEAT))
602  m_attackType = RANGED_ATTACK;
603  else
604  m_attackType = BASE_ATTACK;
605  break;
606  }
607 
608  m_spellSchoolMask = info->GetSchoolMask(); // Can be override for some spell (wand shoot for example)
609 
610  if (m_attackType == RANGED_ATTACK)
611  // wand case
612  if ((m_caster->getClassMask() & CLASSMASK_WAND_USERS) != 0 && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
613  if (Item* pItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(RANGED_ATTACK))
614  m_spellSchoolMask = SpellSchoolMask(1 << pItem->GetTemplate()->Damage[0].DamageType);
615 
616  if (originalCasterGUID)
617  m_originalCasterGUID = originalCasterGUID;
618  else
619  m_originalCasterGUID = m_caster->GetGUID();
620 
621  if (m_originalCasterGUID == m_caster->GetGUID())
622  m_originalCaster = m_caster;
623  else
624  {
625  m_originalCaster = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, m_originalCasterGUID);
626  if (m_originalCaster && !m_originalCaster->IsInWorld())
627  m_originalCaster = nullptr;
628  }
629 
630  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_NULL;
631  _triggeredCastFlags = triggerFlags;
632  if (info->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_CASTING))
633  _triggeredCastFlags = TriggerCastFlags(uint32(_triggeredCastFlags) | TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CAST_IN_PROGRESS | TRIGGERED_CAST_DIRECTLY);
634 
635  m_CastItem = nullptr;
636 
637  unitTarget = nullptr;
638  itemTarget = nullptr;
639  gameObjTarget = nullptr;
640  destTarget = nullptr;
641  damage = 0;
642  effectHandleMode = SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH;
643  m_diminishLevel = DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1;
644  m_diminishGroup = DIMINISHING_NONE;
645  m_damage = 0;
646  m_healing = 0;
647  m_procAttacker = 0;
648  m_procVictim = 0;
649  m_procEx = 0;
650  focusObject = nullptr;
651  m_cast_count = 0;
652  m_glyphIndex = 0;
653  m_preCastSpell = 0;
654  m_spellAura = nullptr;
655  m_pathFinder = nullptr; // pussywizard
656  _scriptsLoaded = false;
657 
658  //Auto Shot & Shoot (wand)
659  m_autoRepeat = m_spellInfo->IsAutoRepeatRangedSpell();
660 
661  m_runesState = 0;
662  m_powerCost = 0; // setup to correct value in Spell::prepare, must not be used before.
663  m_casttime = 0; // setup to correct value in Spell::prepare, must not be used before.
664  m_timer = 0; // will set to castime in prepare
665  m_channeledDuration = 0; // will be setup in Spell::handle_immediate
666  m_immediateHandled = false;
667 
668  m_channelTargetEffectMask = 0;
669 
670  m_spellFlags = SPELL_FLAG_NORMAL;
671 
672  // Determine if spell can be reflected back to the caster
673  // Patch 1.2 notes: Spell Reflection no longer reflects abilities
674  m_canReflect = m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_IS_ABILITY)
675  && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_NO_REFLECTION) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_NO_IMMUNITIES)
676  && !m_spellInfo->IsPassive() && (!m_spellInfo->IsPositive() || m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_DISPEL));
677 
678  CleanupTargetList();
679  memset(m_effectExecuteData, 0, MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS * sizeof(ByteBuffer*));
680 
681  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
682  m_destTargets[i] = SpellDestination(*m_caster);
683 
684  // xinef:
685  _spellTargetsSelected = false;
686 
687  m_weaponItem = nullptr;
688 }
689 
690 Spell::~Spell()
691 {
692  // unload scripts
693  while (!m_loadedScripts.empty())
694  {
695  std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator itr = m_loadedScripts.begin();
696  (*itr)->_Unload();
697  delete (*itr);
698  m_loadedScripts.erase(itr);
699  }
700 
701  if (m_referencedFromCurrentSpell && m_selfContainer && *m_selfContainer == this)
702  {
703  // Clean the reference to avoid later crash.
704  // If this error is repeating, we may have to add an ASSERT to better track down how we get into this case.
705  LOG_ERROR("spells", "Spell::~Spell: deleting spell for spell ID %u. However, spell still referenced.", m_spellInfo->Id);
706  *m_selfContainer = nullptr;
707  }
708 
709  delete m_spellValue;
710  delete m_pathFinder; // pussywizard
711 
712  CheckEffectExecuteData();
713 }
714 
715 void Spell::InitExplicitTargets(SpellCastTargets const& targets)
716 {
717  m_targets = targets;
718  // this function tries to correct spell explicit targets for spell
719  // client doesn't send explicit targets correctly sometimes - we need to fix such spells serverside
720  // this also makes sure that we correctly send explicit targets to client (removes redundant data)
721  uint32 neededTargets = m_spellInfo->GetExplicitTargetMask();
722 
723  if (WorldObject* target = m_targets.GetObjectTarget())
724  {
725  // check if object target is valid with needed target flags
726  // for unit case allow corpse target mask because player with not released corpse is a unit target
727  if ((target->ToUnit() && !(neededTargets & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MASK | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_MASK)))
728  || (target->ToGameObject() && !(neededTargets & TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT_MASK))
729  || (target->ToCorpse() && !(neededTargets & TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_MASK)))
730  m_targets.RemoveObjectTarget();
731  }
732  else
733  {
734  // try to select correct unit target if not provided by client or by serverside cast
735  if (neededTargets & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MASK))
736  {
737  Unit* unit = nullptr;
738  // try to use player selection as a target
739  if (Player* playerCaster = m_caster->ToPlayer())
740  {
741  // selection has to be found and to be valid target for the spell
742  if (Unit* selectedUnit = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, playerCaster->GetTarget()))
743  if (m_spellInfo->CheckExplicitTarget(m_caster, selectedUnit) == SPELL_CAST_OK)
744  unit = selectedUnit;
745  }
746  // try to use attacked unit as a target
747  else if ((m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT) && neededTargets & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_ENEMY | TARGET_FLAG_UNIT))
748  unit = m_caster->GetVictim();
749 
750  // didn't find anything - let's use self as target
751  if (!unit && neededTargets & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_RAID | TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_PARTY | TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_ALLY))
752  unit = m_caster;
753 
754  m_targets.SetUnitTarget(unit);
755  }
756  }
757 
758  // check if spell needs dst target
759  if (neededTargets & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
760  {
761  // and target isn't set
762  if (!m_targets.HasDst())
763  {
764  // try to use unit target if provided
765  if (WorldObject* target = targets.GetObjectTarget())
766  m_targets.SetDst(*target);
767  // or use self if not available
768  else
769  m_targets.SetDst(*m_caster);
770  }
771  }
772  else
773  m_targets.RemoveDst();
774 
775  if (neededTargets & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)
776  {
777  if (!targets.HasSrc())
778  m_targets.SetSrc(*m_caster);
779  }
780  else
781  m_targets.RemoveSrc();
782 }
783 
784 void Spell::SelectExplicitTargets()
785 {
786  // here go all explicit target changes made to explicit targets after spell prepare phase is finished
787  if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
788  {
789  // check for explicit target redirection, for Grounding Totem for example
790  if (m_spellInfo->GetExplicitTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_ENEMY
791  || (m_spellInfo->GetExplicitTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT
792  && (!m_spellInfo->IsPositive() || (!m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(target) && m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_DISPEL)))))
793  {
794  Unit* redirect;
795  switch (m_spellInfo->DmgClass)
796  {
797  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
798  redirect = m_caster->GetMagicHitRedirectTarget(target, m_spellInfo);
799  break;
800  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
801  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
802  redirect = m_caster->GetMeleeHitRedirectTarget(target, m_spellInfo);
803  break;
804  default:
805  redirect = nullptr;
806  break;
807  }
808  if (redirect && (redirect != target))
809  {
810  m_targets.SetUnitTarget(redirect);
811  m_spellFlags |= SPELL_FLAG_REDIRECTED;
812  }
813  }
814  }
815 }
816 
817 void Spell::SelectSpellTargets()
818 {
819  // select targets for cast phase
820  SelectExplicitTargets();
821 
822  uint32 processedAreaEffectsMask = 0;
823  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
824  {
825  // not call for empty effect.
826  // Also some spells use not used effect targets for store targets for dummy effect in triggered spells
827  if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsEffect())
828  continue;
829 
830  // set expected type of implicit targets to be sent to client
831  uint32 implicitTargetMask = GetTargetFlagMask(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetObjectType()) | GetTargetFlagMask(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetB.GetObjectType());
832  if (implicitTargetMask & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT)
833  m_targets.SetTargetFlag(TARGET_FLAG_UNIT);
834  if (implicitTargetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT | TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT_ITEM))
835  m_targets.SetTargetFlag(TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT);
836 
837  SelectEffectImplicitTargets(SpellEffIndex(i), m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA, processedAreaEffectsMask);
838  SelectEffectImplicitTargets(SpellEffIndex(i), m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetB, processedAreaEffectsMask);
839 
840  // Select targets of effect based on effect type
841  // those are used when no valid target could be added for spell effect based on spell target type
842  // some spell effects use explicit target as a default target added to target map (like SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_SPELL)
843  // some spell effects add target to target map only when target type specified (like SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON)
844  // some spell effects don't add anything to target map (confirmed with sniffs) (like SPELL_EFFECT_DESTROY_ALL_TOTEMS)
845  SelectEffectTypeImplicitTargets(i);
846 
847  if (m_targets.HasDst())
848  AddDestTarget(*m_targets.GetDst(), i);
849 
850  if (m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
851  {
852  // maybe do this for all spells?
853  if (!focusObject && m_UniqueTargetInfo.empty() && m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.empty() && m_UniqueItemInfo.empty() && !m_targets.HasDst())
854  {
855  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS);
856  finish(false);
857  return;
858  }
859 
860  uint8 mask = (1 << i);
861  for (auto ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
862  {
863  if (ihit->effectMask & mask)
864  {
865  m_channelTargetEffectMask |= mask;
866  break;
867  }
868  }
869  }
870  else if (m_auraScaleMask)
871  {
872  bool checkLvl = !m_UniqueTargetInfo.empty();
873  m_UniqueTargetInfo.erase(std::remove_if(std::begin(m_UniqueTargetInfo), std::end(m_UniqueTargetInfo), [&](TargetInfo const& targetInfo) -> bool
874  {
875  // remove targets which did not pass min level check
876  if (m_auraScaleMask && targetInfo.effectMask == m_auraScaleMask)
877  {
878  if (!targetInfo.scaleAura && targetInfo.targetGUID != m_caster->GetGUID())
879  return true;
880  }
881 
882  return false;
883  }), std::end(m_UniqueTargetInfo));
884 
885  if (checkLvl && m_UniqueTargetInfo.empty())
886  {
887  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL);
888  finish(false);
889  }
890  }
891  }
892 
893  if (uint64 dstDelay = CalculateDelayMomentForDst())
894  m_delayMoment = dstDelay;
895 }
896 
897 uint64 Spell::CalculateDelayMomentForDst() const
898 {
899  if (m_targets.HasDst())
900  {
901  if (m_targets.HasTraj())
902  {
903  float speed = m_targets.GetSpeedXY();
904  if (speed > 0.0f)
905  return (uint64)floor(m_targets.GetDist2d() / speed * 1000.0f);
906  }
907  else if (m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f)
908  {
909  // We should not subtract caster size from dist calculation (fixes execution time desync with animation on client, eg. Malleable Goo cast by PP)
910  float dist = m_caster->GetExactDist(*m_targets.GetDstPos());
911  return (uint64)std::floor(dist / m_spellInfo->Speed * 1000.0f);
912  }
913  }
914 
915  return 0;
916 }
917 
918 void Spell::RecalculateDelayMomentForDst()
919 {
920  m_delayMoment = CalculateDelayMomentForDst();
921  m_caster->m_Events.ModifyEventTime(_spellEvent, Milliseconds(GetDelayStart() + m_delayMoment));
922 }
923 
924 void Spell::SelectEffectImplicitTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType, uint32& processedEffectMask)
925 {
926  if (!targetType.GetTarget())
927  return;
928 
929  uint32 effectMask = 1 << effIndex;
930  // set the same target list for all effects
931  // some spells appear to need this, however this requires more research
932  switch (targetType.GetSelectionCategory())
933  {
934  case TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_NEARBY:
935  case TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_CONE:
936  case TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_AREA:
937  {
938  // targets for effect already selected
939  if (effectMask & processedEffectMask)
940  {
941  return;
942  }
943 
944  auto const& effects = GetSpellInfo()->Effects;
945 
946  // choose which targets we can select at once
947  for (uint32 j = effIndex + 1; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
948  {
949  if (effects[j].IsEffect() &&
950  effects[effIndex].TargetA.GetTarget() == effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() &&
951  effects[effIndex].TargetB.GetTarget() == effects[j].TargetB.GetTarget() &&
952  effects[effIndex].ImplicitTargetConditions == effects[j].ImplicitTargetConditions &&
953  effects[effIndex].CalcRadius(m_caster) == effects[j].CalcRadius(m_caster) &&
954  CheckScriptEffectImplicitTargets(effIndex, j))
955  {
956  effectMask |= 1 << j;
957  }
958  }
959  processedEffectMask |= effectMask;
960  break;
961  }
962  default:
963  break;
964  }
965 
966  switch (targetType.GetSelectionCategory())
967  {
968  case TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_CHANNEL:
969  SelectImplicitChannelTargets(effIndex, targetType);
970  break;
971  case TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_NEARBY:
972  SelectImplicitNearbyTargets(effIndex, targetType, effectMask);
973  break;
974  case TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_CONE:
975  SelectImplicitConeTargets(effIndex, targetType, effectMask);
976  break;
977  case TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_AREA:
978  SelectImplicitAreaTargets(effIndex, targetType, effectMask);
979  break;
980  case TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_TRAJ:
981  // just in case there is no dest, explanation in SelectImplicitDestDestTargets
982  CheckDst();
983 
984  SelectImplicitTrajTargets(effIndex, targetType);
985  break;
986  case TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_DEFAULT:
987  switch (targetType.GetObjectType())
988  {
989  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_SRC:
990  switch (targetType.GetReferenceType())
991  {
992  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_CASTER:
993  m_targets.SetSrc(*m_caster);
994  break;
995  default:
996  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectEffectImplicitTargets: received not implemented select target reference type for TARGET_TYPE_OBJECT_SRC");
997  break;
998  }
999  break;
1000  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_DEST:
1001  switch (targetType.GetReferenceType())
1002  {
1003  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_CASTER:
1004  SelectImplicitCasterDestTargets(effIndex, targetType);
1005  break;
1006  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_TARGET:
1007  SelectImplicitTargetDestTargets(effIndex, targetType);
1008  break;
1009  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_DEST:
1010  SelectImplicitDestDestTargets(effIndex, targetType);
1011  break;
1012  default:
1013  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectEffectImplicitTargets: received not implemented select target reference type for TARGET_TYPE_OBJECT_DEST");
1014  break;
1015  }
1016  break;
1017  default:
1018  switch (targetType.GetReferenceType())
1019  {
1020  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_CASTER:
1021  SelectImplicitCasterObjectTargets(effIndex, targetType);
1022  break;
1023  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_TARGET:
1024  SelectImplicitTargetObjectTargets(effIndex, targetType);
1025  break;
1026  default:
1027  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectEffectImplicitTargets: received not implemented select target reference type for TARGET_TYPE_OBJECT");
1028  break;
1029  }
1030  break;
1031  }
1032  break;
1033  case TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_NYI:
1034  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "SPELL: target type %u, found in spellID %u, effect %u is not implemented yet!", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex, targetType.GetTarget());
1035  break;
1036  default:
1037  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectEffectImplicitTargets: received not implemented select target category");
1038  break;
1039  }
1040 }
1041 
1042 void Spell::SelectImplicitChannelTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
1043 {
1044  if (targetType.GetReferenceType() != TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_CASTER)
1045  {
1046  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectImplicitChannelTargets: received not implemented target reference type");
1047  return;
1048  }
1049 
1050  switch (targetType.GetTarget())
1051  {
1052  case TARGET_UNIT_CHANNEL_TARGET:
1053  {
1054  // Xinef: All channel selectors have needed data passed in m_targets structure
1055  WorldObject* target = m_targets.GetObjectTargetChannel(m_caster);
1056  if (target)
1057  {
1058  CallScriptObjectTargetSelectHandlers(target, effIndex, targetType);
1059  // unit target may be no longer avalible - teleported out of map for example
1060  if (target && target->ToUnit())
1061  AddUnitTarget(target->ToUnit(), 1 << effIndex);
1062  }
1063  else
1064  {
1065  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "SPELL: cannot find channel spell target for spell ID %u, effect %u", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex);
1066  }
1067  break;
1068  }
1069  case TARGET_DEST_CHANNEL_TARGET:
1070  if (m_targets.HasDstChannel())
1071  m_targets.SetDst(*m_targets.GetDstChannel());
1072  else if (WorldObject* target = m_targets.GetObjectTargetChannel(m_caster))
1073  {
1074  CallScriptObjectTargetSelectHandlers(target, effIndex, targetType);
1075  if (target)
1076  m_targets.SetDst(*target);
1077  }
1078  else if (Spell* channeledSpell = m_originalCaster->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL))
1079  {
1080  if (channeledSpell->m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
1081  m_targets.SetDst(*channeledSpell->m_targets.GetUnitTarget());
1082  }
1083  else //if (!m_targets.HasDst())
1084  {
1085  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "SPELL: cannot find channel spell destination for spell ID %u, effect %u", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex);
1086  }
1087  break;
1088  case TARGET_DEST_CHANNEL_CASTER:
1089  if (GetOriginalCaster())
1090  m_targets.SetDst(*GetOriginalCaster());
1091  break;
1092  default:
1093  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectImplicitChannelTargets: received not implemented target type");
1094  break;
1095  }
1096 }
1097 
1098 void Spell::SelectImplicitNearbyTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType, uint32 effMask)
1099 {
1100  if (targetType.GetReferenceType() != TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_CASTER)
1101  {
1102  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectImplicitNearbyTargets: received not implemented target reference type");
1103  return;
1104  }
1105 
1106  float range = 0.0f;
1107  switch (targetType.GetCheckType())
1108  {
1109  case TARGET_CHECK_ENEMY:
1110  range = m_spellInfo->GetMaxRange(false, m_caster, this);
1111  break;
1112  case TARGET_CHECK_ALLY:
1113  case TARGET_CHECK_PARTY:
1114  case TARGET_CHECK_RAID:
1115  case TARGET_CHECK_RAID_CLASS:
1116  range = m_spellInfo->GetMaxRange(true, m_caster, this);
1117  break;
1118  case TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY:
1119  case TARGET_CHECK_DEFAULT:
1120  range = m_spellInfo->GetMaxRange(m_spellInfo->IsPositive(), m_caster, this);
1121  break;
1122  default:
1123  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectImplicitNearbyTargets: received not implemented selection check type");
1124  break;
1125  }
1126 
1127  ConditionList* condList = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].ImplicitTargetConditions;
1128 
1129  // handle emergency case - try to use other provided targets if no conditions provided
1130  if (targetType.GetCheckType() == TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY && (!condList || condList->empty()))
1131  {
1132  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell::SelectImplicitNearbyTargets: no conditions entry for target with TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY of spell ID %u, effect %u - selecting default targets", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex);
1133  switch (targetType.GetObjectType())
1134  {
1135  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_GOBJ:
1136  if (m_spellInfo->RequiresSpellFocus)
1137  {
1138  if (focusObject)
1139  AddGOTarget(focusObject, effMask);
1140  return;
1141  }
1142  break;
1143  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_DEST:
1144  if (m_spellInfo->RequiresSpellFocus)
1145  {
1146  if (focusObject)
1147  m_targets.SetDst(*focusObject);
1148  return;
1149  }
1150  break;
1151  default:
1152  break;
1153  }
1154  }
1155 
1156  WorldObject* target = SearchNearbyTarget(range, targetType.GetObjectType(), targetType.GetCheckType(), condList);
1157  if (!target)
1158  {
1159  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell::SelectImplicitNearbyTargets: cannot find nearby target for spell ID %u, effect %u", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex);
1160  return;
1161  }
1162 
1163  CallScriptObjectTargetSelectHandlers(target, effIndex, targetType);
1164  if (!target)
1165  {
1166  //TC_LOG_DEBUG("spells", "Spell::SelectImplicitNearbyTargets: OnObjectTargetSelect script hook for spell Id %u set nullptr target, effect %u", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex);
1167  return;
1168  }
1169 
1170  switch (targetType.GetObjectType())
1171  {
1172  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_UNIT:
1173  {
1174  if (Unit* unit = target->ToUnit())
1175  {
1176  AddUnitTarget(unit, effMask, true, false);
1177  // xinef: important! if channeling spell have nearby entry, it has no unitTarget by default
1178  // and if channeled spell has target 77, it requires unitTarget, set it here!
1179  // xinef: if we have NO unit target
1180  if (!m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
1181  {
1182  m_targets.SetUnitTarget(unit);
1183  }
1184  }
1185  else
1186  {
1187  //TC_LOG_DEBUG("spells", "Spell::SelectImplicitNearbyTargets: OnObjectTargetSelect script hook for spell Id %u set object of wrong type, expected unit, got %s, effect %u", m_spellInfo->Id, target->GetGUID().GetTypeName(), effMask);
1188  return;
1189  }
1190  break;
1191  }
1192  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_GOBJ:
1193  if (GameObject* gobjTarget = target->ToGameObject())
1194  AddGOTarget(gobjTarget, effMask);
1195  else
1196  {
1197  //TC_LOG_DEBUG("spells", "Spell::SelectImplicitNearbyTargets: OnObjectTargetSelect script hook for spell Id %u set object of wrong type, expected gameobject, got %s, effect %u", m_spellInfo->Id, target->GetGUID().GetTypeName(), effMask);
1198  return;
1199  }
1200  break;
1201  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_DEST:
1202  m_targets.SetDst(*target);
1203  break;
1204  default:
1205  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectImplicitNearbyTargets: received not implemented target object type");
1206  break;
1207  }
1208 
1209  SelectImplicitChainTargets(effIndex, targetType, target, effMask);
1210 }
1211 
1212 void Spell::SelectImplicitConeTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType, uint32 effMask)
1213 {
1214  if (targetType.GetReferenceType() != TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_CASTER)
1215  {
1216  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectImplicitConeTargets: received not implemented target reference type");
1217  return;
1218  }
1219  std::list<WorldObject*> targets;
1220  SpellTargetObjectTypes objectType = targetType.GetObjectType();
1221  SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType = targetType.GetCheckType();
1222  ConditionList* condList = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].ImplicitTargetConditions;
1223  float coneAngle = M_PI / 2;
1224  float radius = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcRadius(m_caster) * m_spellValue->RadiusMod;
1225 
1226  if (uint32 containerTypeMask = GetSearcherTypeMask(objectType, condList))
1227  {
1228  Acore::WorldObjectSpellConeTargetCheck check(coneAngle, radius, m_caster, m_spellInfo, selectionType, condList);
1229  Acore::WorldObjectListSearcher<Acore::WorldObjectSpellConeTargetCheck> searcher(m_caster, targets, check, containerTypeMask);
1230  SearchTargets<Acore::WorldObjectListSearcher<Acore::WorldObjectSpellConeTargetCheck> >(searcher, containerTypeMask, m_caster, m_caster, radius);
1231 
1232  CallScriptObjectAreaTargetSelectHandlers(targets, effIndex, targetType);
1233 
1234  if (!targets.empty())
1235  {
1236  // Other special target selection goes here
1237  if (uint32 maxTargets = m_spellValue->MaxAffectedTargets)
1238  {
1239  Unit::AuraEffectList const& Auras = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MAX_AFFECTED_TARGETS);
1240  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator j = Auras.begin(); j != Auras.end(); ++j)
1241  if ((*j)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
1242  maxTargets += (*j)->GetAmount();
1243 
1244  Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, maxTargets);
1245  }
1246 
1247  for (std::list<WorldObject*>::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end(); ++itr)
1248  {
1249  if (Unit* unit = (*itr)->ToUnit())
1250  {
1251  AddUnitTarget(unit, effMask, false);
1252  }
1253  else if (GameObject* gObjTarget = (*itr)->ToGameObject())
1254  {
1255  AddGOTarget(gObjTarget, effMask);
1256  }
1257  }
1258  }
1259  }
1260 }
1261 
1262 void Spell::SelectImplicitAreaTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType, uint32 effMask)
1263 {
1264  Unit* referer = nullptr;
1265  switch (targetType.GetReferenceType())
1266  {
1267  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_SRC:
1268  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_DEST:
1269  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_CASTER:
1270  referer = m_caster;
1271  break;
1272  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_TARGET:
1273  referer = m_targets.GetUnitTarget();
1274  break;
1275  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_LAST:
1276  {
1277  // find last added target for this effect
1278  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::reverse_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.rbegin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.rend(); ++ihit)
1279  {
1280  if (ihit->effectMask & (1 << effIndex))
1281  {
1282  referer = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID);
1283  break;
1284  }
1285  }
1286  break;
1287  }
1288  default:
1289  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectImplicitAreaTargets: received not implemented target reference type");
1290  return;
1291  }
1292  if (!referer)
1293  return;
1294 
1295  Position const* center = nullptr;
1296  switch (targetType.GetReferenceType())
1297  {
1298  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_SRC:
1299  center = m_targets.GetSrcPos();
1300  break;
1301  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_DEST:
1302  center = m_targets.GetDstPos();
1303  break;
1304  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_CASTER:
1305  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_TARGET:
1306  case TARGET_REFERENCE_TYPE_LAST:
1307  center = referer;
1308  break;
1309  default:
1310  ASSERT(false && "Spell::SelectImplicitAreaTargets: received not implemented target reference type");
1311  return;
1312  }
1313 
1314  // Xinef: the distance should be increased by caster size, it is neglected in latter calculations
1315  std::list<WorldObject*> targets;
1316  float radius = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcRadius(m_caster) * m_spellValue->RadiusMod;
1317  SearchAreaTargets(targets, radius, center, referer, targetType.GetObjectType(), targetType.GetCheckType(), m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].ImplicitTargetConditions);
1318 
1319  CallScriptObjectAreaTargetSelectHandlers(targets, effIndex, targetType);
1320 
1321  if (!targets.empty())
1322  {
1323  // Other special target selection goes here
1324  if (uint32 maxTargets = m_spellValue->MaxAffectedTargets)
1325  {
1326  Unit::AuraEffectList const& Auras = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MAX_AFFECTED_TARGETS);
1327  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator j = Auras.begin(); j != Auras.end(); ++j)
1328  if ((*j)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
1329  maxTargets += (*j)->GetAmount();
1330 
1331  Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, maxTargets);
1332  }
1333 
1334  for (std::list<WorldObject*>::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end(); ++itr)
1335  {
1336  if (Unit* unitTarget = (*itr)->ToUnit())
1337  AddUnitTarget(unitTarget, effMask, false);
1338  else if (GameObject* gObjTarget = (*itr)->ToGameObject())
1339  AddGOTarget(gObjTarget, effMask);
1340  }
1341  }
1342 }
1343 
1344 void Spell::SelectImplicitCasterDestTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
1345 {
1346  SpellDestination dest(*m_caster);
1347 
1348  switch (targetType.GetTarget())
1349  {
1350  case TARGET_DEST_CASTER:
1351  case TARGET_DEST_CASTER_36:
1352  break;
1353  case TARGET_DEST_HOME:
1354  if (Player* playerCaster = m_caster->ToPlayer())
1355  dest = SpellDestination(playerCaster->m_homebindX, playerCaster->m_homebindY, playerCaster->m_homebindZ, playerCaster->GetOrientation(), playerCaster->m_homebindMapId);
1356  break;
1357  case TARGET_DEST_DB:
1358  if (SpellTargetPosition const* st = sSpellMgr->GetSpellTargetPosition(m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex))
1359  {
1361  if (m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_TELEPORT_UNITS) || m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_BIND))
1362  dest = SpellDestination(st->target_X, st->target_Y, st->target_Z, st->target_Orientation, (int32)st->target_mapId);
1363  else if (st->target_mapId == m_caster->GetMapId())
1364  dest = SpellDestination(st->target_X, st->target_Y, st->target_Z, st->target_Orientation);
1365  }
1366  else
1367  {
1368  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "SPELL: unknown target coordinates for spell ID %u", m_spellInfo->Id);
1369  if (WorldObject* target = m_targets.GetObjectTarget())
1370  dest = SpellDestination(*target);
1371  }
1372  break;
1373  case TARGET_DEST_CASTER_FISHING:
1374  {
1375  float min_dis = m_spellInfo->GetMinRange(true);
1376  float max_dis = m_spellInfo->GetMaxRange(true);
1377  float dis = (float)rand_norm() * (max_dis - min_dis) + min_dis;
1378  float x, y, z, angle;
1379  angle = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(M_PI * 35.0f / 180.0f) - static_cast<float>(M_PI * 17.5f / 180.0f);
1380  //m_caster->GetClosePoint(x, y, z, DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE, dis, angle); this contains extra code that breaks fishing
1381  m_caster->GetNearPoint(m_caster, x, y, z, DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE, dis, m_caster->GetOrientation() + angle);
1382 
1383  float ground = m_caster->GetMapHeight(x, y, z, true);
1384  float liquidLevel = VMAP_INVALID_HEIGHT_VALUE;
1385  LiquidData const& liquidData = m_caster->GetMap()->GetLiquidData(m_caster->GetPhaseMask(), x, y, z, m_caster->GetCollisionHeight(), MAP_ALL_LIQUIDS);
1386  if (liquidData.Status)
1387  liquidLevel = liquidData.Level;
1388 
1389  if (liquidLevel <= ground) // When there is no liquid Map::GetWaterOrGroundLevel returns ground level
1390  {
1391  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_NOT_HERE);
1392  SendChannelUpdate(0);
1393  finish(false);
1394  return;
1395  }
1396 
1397  if (ground + 0.75 > liquidLevel)
1398  {
1399  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_TOO_SHALLOW);
1400  SendChannelUpdate(0);
1401  finish(false);
1402  return;
1403  }
1404 
1405  if (!m_caster->IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
1406  {
1407  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_LINE_OF_SIGHT);
1408  SendChannelUpdate(0);
1409  finish(false);
1410  return;
1411  }
1412 
1413  dest = SpellDestination(x, y, liquidLevel, m_caster->GetOrientation());
1414  break;
1415  }
1416  case TARGET_DEST_CASTER_FRONT_LEAP:
1417  {
1418  Unit* unitCaster = m_caster->ToUnit();
1419  if (!unitCaster)
1420  {
1421  break;
1422  }
1423 
1424  float dist = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcRadius(unitCaster);
1425  float angle = targetType.CalcDirectionAngle();
1426 
1427  Position pos = dest._position;
1428 
1429  unitCaster->MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, dist, angle);
1430  dest.Relocate(pos);
1431  break;
1432  }
1433  default:
1434  {
1435  float dist = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcRadius(m_caster);
1436  float angle = targetType.CalcDirectionAngle();
1437  float objSize = m_caster->GetCombatReach();
1438 
1439  switch (targetType.GetTarget())
1440  {
1441  case TARGET_DEST_CASTER_SUMMON:
1442  dist = PET_FOLLOW_DIST;
1443  break;
1444  case TARGET_DEST_CASTER_RANDOM:
1445  if (dist > objSize)
1446  dist = objSize + (dist - objSize) * float(rand_norm());
1447  break;
1448  case TARGET_DEST_CASTER_FRONT_LEFT:
1449  case TARGET_DEST_CASTER_BACK_LEFT:
1450  case TARGET_DEST_CASTER_FRONT_RIGHT:
1451  case TARGET_DEST_CASTER_BACK_RIGHT:
1452  {
1453  static float const DefaultTotemDistance = 3.0f;
1454  if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].HasRadius())
1455  dist = DefaultTotemDistance;
1456  break;
1457  }
1458  default:
1459  break;
1460  }
1461 
1462  if (dist < objSize)
1463  {
1464  dist = objSize;
1465  }
1466 
1467  Position pos = dest._position;
1468  m_caster->MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, dist, angle);
1469 
1470  dest.Relocate(pos);
1471  break;
1472  }
1473  }
1474 
1475  CallScriptDestinationTargetSelectHandlers(dest, effIndex, targetType);
1476  m_targets.SetDst(dest);
1477 }
1478 
1479 void Spell::SelectImplicitTargetDestTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
1480 {
1481  WorldObject* target = m_targets.GetObjectTarget();
1482 
1483  SpellDestination dest(*target);
1484 
1485  switch (targetType.GetTarget())
1486  {
1487  case TARGET_DEST_TARGET_ENEMY:
1488  case TARGET_DEST_TARGET_ANY:
1489  break;
1490  default:
1491  {
1492  float angle = targetType.CalcDirectionAngle();
1493  float dist = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcRadius(nullptr);
1494  if (targetType.GetTarget() == TARGET_DEST_TARGET_RANDOM)
1495  {
1496  dist *= float(rand_norm());
1497  }
1498 
1499  Position pos = dest._position;
1500  target->MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, dist, angle);
1501 
1502  dest.Relocate(pos);
1503  break;
1504  }
1505  }
1506 
1507  CallScriptDestinationTargetSelectHandlers(dest, effIndex, targetType);
1508  m_targets.SetDst(dest);
1509 }
1510 
1511 void Spell::SelectImplicitDestDestTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
1512 {
1513  // set destination to caster if no dest provided
1514  // can only happen if previous destination target could not be set for some reason
1515  // (not found nearby target, or channel target for example
1516  // maybe we should abort the spell in such case?
1517  CheckDst();
1518 
1519  SpellDestination dest(*m_targets.GetDst());
1520 
1521  switch (targetType.GetTarget())
1522  {
1523  case TARGET_DEST_DYNOBJ_ENEMY:
1524  case TARGET_DEST_DYNOBJ_ALLY:
1525  case TARGET_DEST_DYNOBJ_NONE:
1526  case TARGET_DEST_DEST:
1527  return;
1528  case TARGET_DEST_TRAJ:
1529  SelectImplicitTrajTargets(effIndex, targetType);
1530  return;
1531  default:
1532  {
1533  float angle = targetType.CalcDirectionAngle();
1534  float dist = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcRadius(m_caster);
1535  if (targetType.GetTarget() == TARGET_DEST_DEST_RANDOM)
1536  dist *= float(rand_norm());
1537 
1538  Position pos = dest._position;
1539  m_caster->MovePosition(pos, dist, angle);
1540 
1541  dest.Relocate(pos);
1542  break;
1543  }
1544  }
1545 
1546  CallScriptDestinationTargetSelectHandlers(dest, effIndex, targetType);
1547  m_targets.ModDst(dest);
1548 }
1549 
1550 void Spell::SelectImplicitCasterObjectTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
1551 {
1552  WorldObject* target = nullptr;
1553  bool checkIfValid = true;
1554 
1555  switch (targetType.GetTarget())
1556  {
1557  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER:
1558  target = m_caster;
1559  checkIfValid = false;
1560  break;
1561  case TARGET_UNIT_MASTER:
1562  target = m_caster->GetCharmerOrOwner();
1563  break;
1564  case TARGET_UNIT_PET:
1565  target = m_caster->GetGuardianPet();
1566  if (!target)
1567  target = m_caster->GetCharm();
1568  break;
1569  case TARGET_UNIT_SUMMONER:
1570  if (m_caster->IsSummon())
1571  target = m_caster->ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerUnit();
1572  break;
1573  case TARGET_UNIT_VEHICLE:
1574  target = m_caster->GetVehicleBase();
1575  break;
1576  case TARGET_UNIT_PASSENGER_0:
1577  case TARGET_UNIT_PASSENGER_1:
1578  case TARGET_UNIT_PASSENGER_2:
1579  case TARGET_UNIT_PASSENGER_3:
1580  case TARGET_UNIT_PASSENGER_4:
1581  case TARGET_UNIT_PASSENGER_5:
1582  case TARGET_UNIT_PASSENGER_6:
1583  case TARGET_UNIT_PASSENGER_7:
1584  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->ToCreature()->IsVehicle())
1585  target = m_caster->GetVehicleKit()->GetPassenger(targetType.GetTarget() - TARGET_UNIT_PASSENGER_0);
1586  break;
1587  default:
1588  break;
1589  }
1590 
1591  CallScriptObjectTargetSelectHandlers(target, effIndex, targetType);
1592 
1593  if (target && target->ToUnit())
1594  AddUnitTarget(target->ToUnit(), 1 << effIndex, checkIfValid);
1595 }
1596 
1597 void Spell::SelectImplicitTargetObjectTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
1598 {
1599  ASSERT((m_targets.GetObjectTarget() || m_targets.GetItemTarget()) && "Spell::SelectImplicitTargetObjectTargets - no explicit object or item target available!");
1600 
1601  WorldObject* target = m_targets.GetObjectTarget();
1602 
1603  CallScriptObjectTargetSelectHandlers(target, effIndex, targetType);
1604 
1605  if (target)
1606  {
1607  if (Unit* unit = target->ToUnit())
1608  AddUnitTarget(unit, 1 << effIndex, true, false);
1609  else if (GameObject* gobj = target->ToGameObject())
1610  AddGOTarget(gobj, 1 << effIndex);
1611 
1612  SelectImplicitChainTargets(effIndex, targetType, target, 1 << effIndex);
1613  }
1614  // Script hook can remove object target and we would wrongly land here
1615  else if (Item* item = m_targets.GetItemTarget())
1616  AddItemTarget(item, 1 << effIndex);
1617 }
1618 
1619 void Spell::SelectImplicitChainTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType, WorldObject* target, uint32 effMask)
1620 {
1621  uint32 maxTargets = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].ChainTarget;
1622  if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
1623  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_JUMP_TARGETS, maxTargets, this);
1624 
1625  if (maxTargets > 1)
1626  {
1627  // mark damage multipliers as used
1628  for (uint32 k = effIndex; k < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++k)
1629  if (effMask & (1 << k))
1630  m_damageMultipliers[k] = 1.0f;
1631  m_applyMultiplierMask |= effMask;
1632 
1633  std::list<WorldObject*> targets;
1634  SearchChainTargets(targets, maxTargets - 1, target, targetType.GetObjectType(), targetType.GetCheckType(), targetType.GetSelectionCategory()
1635  , m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].ImplicitTargetConditions, targetType.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_TARGET_CHAINHEAL_ALLY);
1636 
1637  // Chain primary target is added earlier
1638  CallScriptObjectAreaTargetSelectHandlers(targets, effIndex, targetType);
1639 
1640  for (std::list<WorldObject*>::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end(); ++itr)
1641  if (Unit* unitTarget = (*itr)->ToUnit())
1642  AddUnitTarget(unitTarget, effMask, false);
1643  }
1644 }
1645 
1646 float tangent(float x)
1647 {
1648  x = tan(x);
1649  //if (x < std::numeric_limits<float>::max() && x > -std::numeric_limits<float>::max()) return x;
1650  //if (x >= std::numeric_limits<float>::max()) return std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
1651  //if (x <= -std::numeric_limits<float>::max()) return -std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
1652  if (x < 100000.0f && x > -100000.0f) return x;
1653  if (x >= 100000.0f) return 100000.0f;
1654  if (x <= 100000.0f) return -100000.0f;
1655  return 0.0f;
1656 }
1657 
1658 #define DEBUG_TRAJ(a) //a
1659 
1660 void Spell::SelectImplicitTrajTargets(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
1661 {
1662  if (!m_targets.HasTraj())
1663  return;
1664 
1665  float dist2d = m_targets.GetDist2d();
1666  if (!dist2d)
1667  return;
1668 
1669  float srcToDestDelta = m_targets.GetDstPos()->m_positionZ - m_targets.GetSrcPos()->m_positionZ;
1670 
1671  // xinef: supply correct target type, DEST_DEST and similar are ALWAYS undefined
1672  // xinef: correct target is stored in TRIGGERED SPELL, however as far as i noticed, all checks are ENTRY, ENEMY
1673  std::list<WorldObject*> targets;
1674  Acore::WorldObjectSpellTrajTargetCheck check(dist2d, m_targets.GetSrcPos(), m_caster, m_spellInfo, TARGET_CHECK_ENEMY /*targetCheckType*/, m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].ImplicitTargetConditions);
1675  Acore::WorldObjectListSearcher<Acore::WorldObjectSpellTrajTargetCheck> searcher(m_caster, targets, check, GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_ALL);
1676  SearchTargets<Acore::WorldObjectListSearcher<Acore::WorldObjectSpellTrajTargetCheck> > (searcher, GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_ALL, m_caster, m_targets.GetSrcPos(), dist2d);
1677  if (targets.empty())
1678  return;
1679 
1680  targets.sort(Acore::ObjectDistanceOrderPred(m_caster));
1681 
1682  float b = tangent(m_targets.GetElevation());
1683  float a = (srcToDestDelta - dist2d * b) / (dist2d * dist2d);
1684  if (a > -0.0001f)
1685  a = 0;
1686 
1687  LOG_ERROR("spells", "Spell::SelectTrajTargets: a %f b %f", a, b);
1688 
1689  // Xinef: hack for distance, many trajectory spells have RangeEntry 1 (self)
1690  float bestDist = m_spellInfo->GetMaxRange(false) * 2;
1691  if (bestDist < 1.0f)
1692  bestDist = 300.0f;
1693 
1694  std::list<WorldObject*>::const_iterator itr = targets.begin();
1695  for (; itr != targets.end(); ++itr)
1696  {
1697  if (Unit* unitTarget = (*itr)->ToUnit())
1698  if (m_caster == *itr || m_caster->IsOnVehicle(unitTarget) || (unitTarget)->GetVehicle())//(*itr)->IsOnVehicle(m_caster))
1699  continue;
1700 
1701  const float size = std::max((*itr)->GetObjectSize() * 0.7f, 1.0f); // 1/sqrt(3)
1702  // TODO: all calculation should be based on src instead of m_caster
1703  const float objDist2d = fabs(m_targets.GetSrcPos()->GetExactDist2d(*itr) * cos(m_targets.GetSrcPos()->GetRelativeAngle(*itr)));
1704  const float dz = fabs((*itr)->GetPositionZ() - m_targets.GetSrcPos()->m_positionZ);
1705 
1706  LOG_ERROR("spells", "Spell::SelectTrajTargets: check %u, dist between %f %f, height between %f %f.",
1707  (*itr)->GetEntry(), objDist2d - size, objDist2d + size, dz - size, dz + size);
1708 
1709  float dist = objDist2d - size;
1710  float height = dist * (a * dist + b);
1711 
1712  LOG_ERROR("spells", "Spell::SelectTrajTargets: dist %f, height %f.", dist, height);
1713 
1714  if (dist < bestDist && height < dz + size && height > dz - size)
1715  {
1716  bestDist = dist > 0 ? dist : 0;
1717  break;
1718  }
1719 
1720 #define CHECK_DIST {\
1721  LOG_ERROR("spells", "Spell::SelectTrajTargets: dist %f, height %f.", dist, height);\
1722  if (dist > bestDist)\
1723  continue;\
1724  if (dist < objDist2d + size && dist > objDist2d - size)\
1725  {\
1726  bestDist = dist;\
1727  break;\
1728  }\
1729  }
1730 
1731  // RP-GG only, search in straight line, as item have no trajectory
1732  if (m_CastItem)
1733  {
1734  if (dist < bestDist && fabs(dz) < 6.0f) // closes target, also check Z difference)
1735  {
1736  bestDist = dist;
1737  break;
1738  }
1739 
1740  continue;
1741  }
1742 
1743  if (!a)
1744  {
1745  // Xinef: everything remade
1746  dist = m_targets.GetSrcPos()->GetExactDist(*itr);
1747  height = m_targets.GetSrcPos()->GetExactDist2d(*itr) * b;
1748 
1749  if (height < dz + size * (b + 1) && height > dz - size * (b + 1) && dist < bestDist)
1750  {
1751  bestDist = dist;
1752  break;
1753  }
1754 
1755  continue;
1756  }
1757 
1758  height = dz - size;
1759  float sqrt1 = b * b + 4 * a * height;
1760  if (sqrt1 > 0)
1761  {
1762  sqrt1 = sqrt(sqrt1);
1763  dist = (sqrt1 - b) / (2 * a);
1764  CHECK_DIST;
1765  }
1766 
1767  height = dz + size;
1768  float sqrt2 = b * b + 4 * a * height;
1769  if (sqrt2 > 0)
1770  {
1771  sqrt2 = sqrt(sqrt2);
1772  dist = (sqrt2 - b) / (2 * a);
1773  CHECK_DIST;
1774 
1775  dist = (-sqrt2 - b) / (2 * a);
1776  CHECK_DIST;
1777  }
1778 
1779  if (sqrt1 > 0)
1780  {
1781  dist = (-sqrt1 - b) / (2 * a);
1782  CHECK_DIST;
1783  }
1784  }
1785 
1786  if (m_targets.GetSrcPos()->GetExactDist2d(m_targets.GetDstPos()) > bestDist)
1787  {
1788  float x = m_targets.GetSrcPos()->m_positionX + cos(m_caster->GetOrientation()) * bestDist;
1789  float y = m_targets.GetSrcPos()->m_positionY + sin(m_caster->GetOrientation()) * bestDist;
1790  float z = m_targets.GetSrcPos()->m_positionZ + bestDist * (a * bestDist + b);
1791 
1792  if (itr != targets.end())
1793  {
1794  float distSq = (*itr)->GetExactDistSq(x, y, z);
1795  float sizeSq = (*itr)->GetObjectSize();
1796  sizeSq *= sizeSq;
1797  LOG_ERROR("spells", "Initial %f %f %f %f %f", x, y, z, distSq, sizeSq);
1798  if (distSq > sizeSq)
1799  {
1800  float factor = 1 - sqrt(sizeSq / distSq);
1801  x += factor * ((*itr)->GetPositionX() - x);
1802  y += factor * ((*itr)->GetPositionY() - y);
1803  z += factor * ((*itr)->GetPositionZ() - z);
1804 
1805  distSq = (*itr)->GetExactDistSq(x, y, z);
1806  LOG_ERROR("spells", "Initial %f %f %f %f %f", x, y, z, distSq, sizeSq);
1807  }
1808  }
1809 
1810  Position trajDst;
1811  trajDst.Relocate(x, y, z, m_caster->GetOrientation());
1812  SpellDestination dest(*m_targets.GetDst());
1813  dest.Relocate(trajDst);
1814 
1815  CallScriptDestinationTargetSelectHandlers(dest, effIndex, targetType);
1816  m_targets.ModDst(dest);
1817  }
1818 }
1819 
1820 void Spell::SelectEffectTypeImplicitTargets(uint8 effIndex)
1821 {
1822  // special case for SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_RAF_FRIEND and SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PLAYER
1823  // TODO: this is a workaround - target shouldn't be stored in target map for those spells
1824  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect)
1825  {
1826  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_RAF_FRIEND:
1827  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PLAYER:
1828  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTarget())
1829  {
1830  WorldObject* target = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTarget());
1831 
1832  CallScriptObjectTargetSelectHandlers(target, SpellEffIndex(effIndex), SpellImplicitTargetInfo());
1833 
1834  if (target && target->ToPlayer())
1835  AddUnitTarget(target->ToUnit(), 1 << effIndex, false);
1836  }
1837  return;
1838  default:
1839  break;
1840  }
1841 
1842  // select spell implicit targets based on effect type
1843  if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].GetImplicitTargetType())
1844  return;
1845 
1846  uint32 targetMask = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].GetMissingTargetMask();
1847 
1848  if (!targetMask)
1849  return;
1850 
1851  WorldObject* target = nullptr;
1852 
1853  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].GetImplicitTargetType())
1854  {
1855  // add explicit object target or self to the target map
1856  case EFFECT_IMPLICIT_TARGET_EXPLICIT:
1857  // player which not released his spirit is Unit, but target flag for it is TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_MASK
1858  if (targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MASK | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_MASK))
1859  {
1860  if (Unit* unitTarget = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
1861  target = unitTarget;
1862  else if (targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_MASK)
1863  {
1864  if (Corpse* corpseTarget = m_targets.GetCorpseTarget())
1865  {
1866  // TODO: this is a workaround - corpses should be added to spell target map too, but we can't do that so we add owner instead
1867  if (Player* owner = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(corpseTarget->GetOwnerGUID()))
1868  target = owner;
1869  }
1870  }
1871  else //if (targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MASK)
1872  target = m_caster;
1873  }
1874  if (targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_ITEM_MASK)
1875  {
1876  if (Item* itemTarget = m_targets.GetItemTarget())
1877  AddItemTarget(itemTarget, 1 << effIndex);
1878  return;
1879  }
1880  if (targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT_MASK)
1881  target = m_targets.GetGOTarget();
1882  break;
1883  // add self to the target map
1884  case EFFECT_IMPLICIT_TARGET_CASTER:
1885  if (targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MASK)
1886  target = m_caster;
1887  break;
1888  default:
1889  break;
1890  }
1891 
1892  CallScriptObjectTargetSelectHandlers(target, SpellEffIndex(effIndex), SpellImplicitTargetInfo());
1893 
1894  if (target)
1895  {
1896  if (target->ToUnit())
1897  AddUnitTarget(target->ToUnit(), 1 << effIndex, false);
1898  else if (target->ToGameObject())
1899  AddGOTarget(target->ToGameObject(), 1 << effIndex);
1900  }
1901 }
1902 
1903 uint32 Spell::GetSearcherTypeMask(SpellTargetObjectTypes objType, ConditionList* condList)
1904 {
1905  // this function selects which containers need to be searched for spell target
1906  uint32 retMask = GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_ALL;
1907 
1908  // filter searchers based on searched object type
1909  switch (objType)
1910  {
1911  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_UNIT:
1912  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_UNIT_AND_DEST:
1913  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_CORPSE:
1914  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_CORPSE_ENEMY:
1915  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_CORPSE_ALLY:
1916  retMask &= GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_PLAYER | GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_CORPSE | GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_CREATURE;
1917  break;
1918  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_GOBJ:
1919  case TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_GOBJ_ITEM:
1920  retMask &= GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_GAMEOBJECT;
1921  break;
1922  default:
1923  break;
1924  }
1925  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_ALLOW_DEAD_TARGET))
1926  retMask &= ~GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_CORPSE;
1927  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_ONLY_ON_PLAYER))
1928  retMask &= GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_CORPSE | GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_PLAYER;
1929  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_ONLY_ON_GHOSTS))
1930  retMask &= GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_PLAYER;
1931 
1932  if (condList)
1933  retMask &= sConditionMgr->GetSearcherTypeMaskForConditionList(*condList);
1934  return retMask;
1935 }
1936 
1937 template<class SEARCHER>
1938 void Spell::SearchTargets(SEARCHER& searcher, uint32 containerMask, Unit* referer, Position const* pos, float radius)
1939 {
1940  if (!containerMask)
1941  return;
1942 
1943  // search world and grid for possible targets
1944  bool searchInGrid = containerMask & (GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_CREATURE | GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_GAMEOBJECT);
1945  bool searchInWorld = containerMask & (GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_CREATURE | GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_PLAYER | GRID_MAP_TYPE_MASK_CORPSE);
1946 
1947  if (searchInGrid || searchInWorld)
1948  {
1949  float x, y;
1950  x = pos->GetPositionX();
1951  y = pos->GetPositionY();
1952 
1953  CellCoord p(Acore::ComputeCellCoord(x, y));
1954  Cell cell(p);
1955  cell.SetNoCreate();
1956 
1957  Map* map = referer->GetMap();
1958 
1959  if (searchInWorld)
1960  Cell::VisitWorldObjects(x, y, map, searcher, radius);
1961 
1962  if (searchInGrid)
1963  Cell::VisitGridObjects(x, y, map, searcher, radius);
1964  }
1965 }
1966 
1967 WorldObject* Spell::SearchNearbyTarget(float range, SpellTargetObjectTypes objectType, SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList)
1968 {
1969  WorldObject* target = nullptr;
1970  uint32 containerTypeMask = GetSearcherTypeMask(objectType, condList);
1971  if (!containerTypeMask)
1972  return nullptr;
1973  Acore::WorldObjectSpellNearbyTargetCheck check(range, m_caster, m_spellInfo, selectionType, condList);
1974  Acore::WorldObjectLastSearcher<Acore::WorldObjectSpellNearbyTargetCheck> searcher(m_caster, target, check, containerTypeMask);
1975  SearchTargets<Acore::WorldObjectLastSearcher<Acore::WorldObjectSpellNearbyTargetCheck> > (searcher, containerTypeMask, m_caster, m_caster, range);
1976  return target;
1977 }
1978 
1979 void Spell::SearchAreaTargets(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets, float range, Position const* position, Unit* referer, SpellTargetObjectTypes objectType, SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList)
1980 {
1981  uint32 containerTypeMask = GetSearcherTypeMask(objectType, condList);
1982  if (!containerTypeMask)
1983  return;
1984  Acore::WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck check(range, position, m_caster, referer, m_spellInfo, selectionType, condList);
1985  Acore::WorldObjectListSearcher<Acore::WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck> searcher(m_caster, targets, check, containerTypeMask);
1986  SearchTargets<Acore::WorldObjectListSearcher<Acore::WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck> > (searcher, containerTypeMask, m_caster, position, range);
1987 }
1988 
1989 void Spell::SearchChainTargets(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets, uint32 chainTargets, WorldObject* target, SpellTargetObjectTypes objectType, SpellTargetCheckTypes selectType, SpellTargetSelectionCategories /*selectCategory*/, ConditionList* condList, bool isChainHeal)
1990 {
1991  // max dist for jump target selection
1992  float jumpRadius = 0.0f;
1993  switch (m_spellInfo->DmgClass)
1994  {
1995  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
1996  // 7.5y for multi shot
1997  jumpRadius = 7.5f;
1998  break;
1999  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
2000  // 5y for swipe, cleave and similar
2001  jumpRadius = 5.0f;
2002  break;
2003  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE:
2004  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
2005  // 12.5y for chain heal spell since 3.2 patch
2006  if (isChainHeal)
2007  jumpRadius = 12.5f;
2008  // 10y as default for magic chain spells
2009  else
2010  jumpRadius = 10.0f;
2011  break;
2012  }
2013 
2014  // chain lightning/heal spells and similar - allow to jump at larger distance and go out of los
2015  bool isBouncingFar = (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_BOUNCY_CHAIN_MISSILES)
2016  || m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE
2017  || m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC);
2018 
2019  // max dist which spell can reach
2020  float searchRadius = jumpRadius;
2021  if (isBouncingFar)
2022  searchRadius *= chainTargets;
2023 
2024  std::list<WorldObject*> tempTargets;
2025  SearchAreaTargets(tempTargets, searchRadius, target, m_caster, objectType, selectType, condList);
2026  tempTargets.remove(target);
2027 
2028  // remove targets which are always invalid for chain spells
2029  // for some spells allow only chain targets in front of caster (swipe for example)
2030  if (!isBouncingFar)
2031  {
2032  for (std::list<WorldObject*>::iterator itr = tempTargets.begin(); itr != tempTargets.end();)
2033  {
2034  std::list<WorldObject*>::iterator checkItr = itr++;
2035  if (!m_caster->HasInArc(static_cast<float>(M_PI), *checkItr))
2036  tempTargets.erase(checkItr);
2037  }
2038  }
2039 
2040  while (chainTargets)
2041  {
2042  // try to get unit for next chain jump
2043  std::list<WorldObject*>::iterator foundItr = tempTargets.end();
2044  // get unit with highest hp deficit in dist
2045  if (isChainHeal)
2046  {
2047  uint32 maxHPDeficit = 0;
2048  for (std::list<WorldObject*>::iterator itr = tempTargets.begin(); itr != tempTargets.end(); ++itr)
2049  {
2050  if (Unit* unit = (*itr)->ToUnit())
2051  {
2052  uint32 deficit = unit->GetMaxHealth() - unit->GetHealth();
2053  if ((deficit > maxHPDeficit || foundItr == tempTargets.end()) && target->IsWithinDist(unit, jumpRadius) && target->IsWithinLOSInMap(unit, LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS))
2054  {
2055  foundItr = itr;
2056  maxHPDeficit = deficit;
2057  }
2058  }
2059  }
2060  }
2061  // get closest object
2062  else
2063  {
2064  for (std::list<WorldObject*>::iterator itr = tempTargets.begin(); itr != tempTargets.end(); ++itr)
2065  {
2066  if (foundItr == tempTargets.end())
2067  {
2068  if ((!isBouncingFar || target->IsWithinDist(*itr, jumpRadius)) && target->IsWithinLOSInMap(*itr, LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS))
2069  foundItr = itr;
2070  }
2071  else if (target->GetDistanceOrder(*itr, *foundItr) && target->IsWithinLOSInMap(*itr, LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS))
2072  foundItr = itr;
2073  }
2074  }
2075  // not found any valid target - chain ends
2076  if (foundItr == tempTargets.end())
2077  break;
2078  target = *foundItr;
2079  tempTargets.erase(foundItr);
2080  targets.push_back(target);
2081  --chainTargets;
2082  }
2083 }
2084 
2085 void Spell::prepareDataForTriggerSystem(AuraEffect const* /*triggeredByAura*/)
2086 {
2087  //==========================================================================================
2088  // Now fill data for trigger system, need know:
2089  // can spell trigger another or not (m_canTrigger)
2090  // Create base triggers flags for Attacker and Victim (m_procAttacker, m_procVictim and m_procEx)
2091  //==========================================================================================
2092 
2093  m_procVictim = m_procAttacker = 0;
2094  // Get data for type of attack and fill base info for trigger
2095  switch (m_spellInfo->DmgClass)
2096  {
2097  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
2098  m_procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_MELEE_DMG_CLASS;
2099  if (m_attackType == OFF_ATTACK)
2100  m_procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DONE_OFFHAND_ATTACK;
2101  else
2102  m_procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DONE_MAINHAND_ATTACK;
2103  m_procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_MELEE_DMG_CLASS;
2104  break;
2105  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
2106  // Auto attack
2107  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_AUTO_REPEAT))
2108  {
2109  m_procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DONE_RANGED_AUTO_ATTACK;
2110  m_procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_RANGED_AUTO_ATTACK;
2111  }
2112  else // Ranged spell attack
2113  {
2114  m_procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_RANGED_DMG_CLASS;
2115  m_procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_RANGED_DMG_CLASS;
2116  }
2117  break;
2118  default:
2119  if (m_spellInfo->EquippedItemClass == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON &&
2120  m_spellInfo->EquippedItemSubClassMask & (1 << ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_WAND)
2121  && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_AUTO_REPEAT)) // Wands auto attack
2122  {
2123  m_procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DONE_RANGED_AUTO_ATTACK;
2124  m_procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_RANGED_AUTO_ATTACK;
2125  }
2126  // For other spells trigger procflags are set in Spell::DoAllEffectOnTarget
2127  // Because spell positivity is dependant on target
2128  }
2129  m_procEx = PROC_EX_NONE;
2130 
2131  // Hunter trap spells - activation proc for Lock and Load, Entrapment and Misdirection
2132  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER &&
2133  (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x18 || // Freezing and Frost Trap, Freezing Arrow
2134  m_spellInfo->Id == 57879 || m_spellInfo->Id == 45145 || // Snake Trap - done this way to avoid double proc
2135  m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[2] & 0x00064000)) // Explosive and Immolation Trap
2136  {
2137  m_procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DONE_TRAP_ACTIVATION;
2138  }
2139 
2140  /* Effects which are result of aura proc from triggered spell cannot proc
2141  to prevent chain proc of these spells */
2142 
2143  // Hellfire Effect - trigger as DOT
2144  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x00000040)
2145  {
2146  m_procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DONE_PERIODIC;
2147  m_procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_PERIODIC;
2148  }
2149 
2150  // Ranged autorepeat attack is set as triggered spell - ignore it
2151  if (!(m_procAttacker & PROC_FLAG_DONE_RANGED_AUTO_ATTACK))
2152  {
2153  if (_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_DISALLOW_PROC_EVENTS &&
2154  (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_ACTIVE_THREAT) ||
2155  m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_NOT_A_PROC)))
2156  m_procEx |= PROC_EX_INTERNAL_CANT_PROC;
2157  else if (_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_DISALLOW_PROC_EVENTS)
2158  m_procEx |= PROC_EX_INTERNAL_TRIGGERED;
2159  }
2160  // Totem casts require spellfamilymask defined in spell_proc_event to proc
2161  if (m_originalCaster && m_caster != m_originalCaster && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->ToCreature()->IsTotem() && m_caster->IsControlledByPlayer())
2162  m_procEx |= PROC_EX_INTERNAL_REQ_FAMILY;
2163 }
2164 
2165 void Spell::CleanupTargetList()
2166 {
2167  m_UniqueTargetInfo.clear();
2168  m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.clear();
2169  m_UniqueItemInfo.clear();
2170  m_delayMoment = 0;
2171  m_delayTrajectory = 0;
2172 }
2173 
2174 void Spell::AddUnitTarget(Unit* target, uint32 effectMask, bool checkIfValid /*= true*/, bool implicit /*= true*/)
2175 {
2176  for (uint32 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
2177  if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].IsEffect() || !CheckEffectTarget(target, effIndex))
2178  effectMask &= ~(1 << effIndex);
2179 
2180  // no effects left
2181  if (!effectMask)
2182  return;
2183 
2184  if (checkIfValid)
2185  {
2186  SpellCastResult res = m_spellInfo->CheckTarget(m_caster, target, implicit);
2187  if (res != SPELL_CAST_OK)
2188  return;
2189  }
2190 
2191  // Check for effect immune skip if immuned
2192  for (uint32 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
2193  if (target->IsImmunedToSpellEffect(m_spellInfo, effIndex))
2194  effectMask &= ~(1 << effIndex);
2195 
2196  ObjectGuid targetGUID = target->GetGUID();
2197 
2198  // Lookup target in already in list
2199  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
2200  {
2201  if (targetGUID == ihit->targetGUID) // Found in list
2202  {
2203  ihit->effectMask |= effectMask; // Immune effects removed from mask
2204  ihit->scaleAura = false;
2205  if (m_auraScaleMask && ihit->effectMask == m_auraScaleMask && m_caster != target)
2206  {
2207  SpellInfo const* auraSpell = m_spellInfo->GetFirstRankSpell();
2208  if (uint32(target->getLevel() + 10) >= auraSpell->SpellLevel)
2209  ihit->scaleAura = true;
2210  }
2211 
2212  sScriptMgr->OnScaleAuraUnitAdd(this, target, effectMask, checkIfValid, implicit, m_auraScaleMask, *ihit);
2213  return;
2214  }
2215  }
2216 
2217  // This is new target calculate data for him
2218 
2219  // Get spell hit result on target
2220  TargetInfo targetInfo;
2221  targetInfo.targetGUID = targetGUID; // Store target GUID
2222  targetInfo.effectMask = effectMask; // Store all effects not immune
2223  targetInfo.processed = false; // Effects not apply on target
2224  targetInfo.alive = target->IsAlive();
2225  targetInfo.damage = 0;
2226  targetInfo.crit = false;
2227  targetInfo.scaleAura = false;
2228  if (m_auraScaleMask && targetInfo.effectMask == m_auraScaleMask && m_caster != target)
2229  {
2230  SpellInfo const* auraSpell = m_spellInfo->GetFirstRankSpell();
2231  if (uint32(target->getLevel() + 10) >= auraSpell->SpellLevel)
2232  targetInfo.scaleAura = true;
2233  }
2234 
2235  sScriptMgr->OnScaleAuraUnitAdd(this, target, effectMask, checkIfValid, implicit, m_auraScaleMask, targetInfo);
2236 
2237  // Calculate hit result
2238  if (m_originalCaster)
2239  {
2240  targetInfo.missCondition = m_originalCaster->SpellHitResult(target, m_spellInfo, m_canReflect);
2241  if (m_skipCheck && targetInfo.missCondition != SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE)
2242  targetInfo.missCondition = SPELL_MISS_NONE;
2243  }
2244  else
2245  targetInfo.missCondition = SPELL_MISS_EVADE; //SPELL_MISS_NONE;
2246 
2247  // Spell have speed - need calculate incoming time
2248  // Incoming time is zero for self casts. At least I think so.
2249  if (m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f && m_caster != target)
2250  {
2251  // calculate spell incoming interval
2252  // TODO: this is a hack
2253  float dist = m_caster->GetDistance(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ());
2254 
2255  if (dist < 5.0f)
2256  dist = 5.0f;
2257  targetInfo.timeDelay = (uint64) floor(dist / m_spellInfo->Speed * 1000.0f);
2258 
2259  // Calculate minimum incoming time
2260  if (m_delayMoment == 0 || m_delayMoment > targetInfo.timeDelay)
2261  m_delayMoment = targetInfo.timeDelay;
2262  }
2263  else
2264  targetInfo.timeDelay = 0LL;
2265 
2266  // If target reflect spell back to caster
2267  if (targetInfo.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
2268  {
2269  // Calculate reflected spell result on caster
2270  targetInfo.reflectResult = m_caster->SpellHitResult(m_caster, m_spellInfo, m_canReflect);
2271 
2272  if (targetInfo.reflectResult == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT) // Impossible reflect again, so simply deflect spell
2273  targetInfo.reflectResult = SPELL_MISS_PARRY;
2274 
2275  // Increase time interval for reflected spells by 1.5
2276  m_caster->m_Events.AddEvent(new ReflectEvent(m_caster, targetInfo.targetGUID, m_spellInfo), m_caster->m_Events.CalculateTime(targetInfo.timeDelay));
2277  targetInfo.timeDelay += targetInfo.timeDelay >> 1;
2278 
2279  m_spellFlags |= SPELL_FLAG_REFLECTED;
2280 
2281  // HACK: workaround check for succubus seduction case
2282  // TODO: seduction should be casted only on humanoids (not demons)
2283  if (m_caster->IsPet())
2284  {
2285  CreatureTemplate const* ci = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(m_caster->GetEntry());
2286  switch (ci->family)
2287  {
2288  case CREATURE_FAMILY_SUCCUBUS:
2289  {
2290  if (m_spellInfo->SpellIconID != 694) // Soothing Kiss
2291  cancel();
2292  }
2293  break;
2294  return;
2295  }
2296  }
2297  }
2298  else
2299  targetInfo.reflectResult = SPELL_MISS_NONE;
2300 
2301  // Add target to list
2302  m_UniqueTargetInfo.push_back(targetInfo);
2303 }
2304 
2305 void Spell::AddGOTarget(GameObject* go, uint32 effectMask)
2306 {
2307  for (uint32 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
2308  {
2309  if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].IsEffect())
2310  effectMask &= ~(1 << effIndex);
2311  else
2312  {
2313  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect)
2314  {
2315  case SPELL_EFFECT_GAMEOBJECT_DAMAGE:
2316  case SPELL_EFFECT_GAMEOBJECT_REPAIR:
2317  case SPELL_EFFECT_GAMEOBJECT_SET_DESTRUCTION_STATE:
2318  if (go->GetGoType() != GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DESTRUCTIBLE_BUILDING)
