2319  effectMask &= ~(1 << effIndex);
2320  break;
2321  default:
2322  break;
2323  }
2324  }
2325  }
2326 
2327  if (!effectMask)
2328  return;
2329 
2330  ObjectGuid targetGUID = go->GetGUID();
2331 
2332  // Lookup target in already in list
2333  for (std::list<GOTargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
2334  {
2335  if (targetGUID == ihit->targetGUID) // Found in list
2336  {
2337  ihit->effectMask |= effectMask; // Add only effect mask
2338  return;
2339  }
2340  }
2341 
2342  // This is new target calculate data for him
2343 
2344  GOTargetInfo target;
2345  target.targetGUID = targetGUID;
2346  target.effectMask = effectMask;
2347  target.processed = false; // Effects not apply on target
2348 
2349  // Spell have speed - need calculate incoming time
2350  if (m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f)
2351  {
2352  // calculate spell incoming interval
2353  float dist = m_caster->GetDistance(go->GetPositionX(), go->GetPositionY(), go->GetPositionZ());
2354  if (dist < 5.0f)
2355  dist = 5.0f;
2356  target.timeDelay = uint64(floor(dist / m_spellInfo->Speed * 1000.0f));
2357  if (m_delayMoment == 0 || m_delayMoment > target.timeDelay)
2358  m_delayMoment = target.timeDelay;
2359  }
2360  else
2361  target.timeDelay = 0LL;
2362 
2363  // Add target to list
2364  m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.push_back(target);
2365 }
2366 
2367 void Spell::AddItemTarget(Item* item, uint32 effectMask)
2368 {
2369  for (uint32 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
2370  if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].IsEffect())
2371  effectMask &= ~(1 << effIndex);
2372 
2373  // no effects left
2374  if (!effectMask)
2375  return;
2376 
2377  // Lookup target in already in list
2378  for (std::list<ItemTargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueItemInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueItemInfo.end(); ++ihit)
2379  {
2380  if (item == ihit->item) // Found in list
2381  {
2382  ihit->effectMask |= effectMask; // Add only effect mask
2383  return;
2384  }
2385  }
2386 
2387  // This is new target add data
2388 
2389  ItemTargetInfo target;
2390  target.item = item;
2391  target.effectMask = effectMask;
2392 
2393  m_UniqueItemInfo.push_back(target);
2394 }
2395 
2396 void Spell::AddDestTarget(SpellDestination const& dest, uint32 effIndex)
2397 {
2398  m_destTargets[effIndex] = dest;
2399 }
2400 
2401 void Spell::DoAllEffectOnTarget(TargetInfo* target)
2402 {
2403  if (!target || target->processed)
2404  return;
2405 
2406  target->processed = true; // Target checked in apply effects procedure
2407 
2408  // Get mask of effects for target
2409  uint8 mask = target->effectMask;
2410 
2411  Unit* effectUnit = m_caster->GetGUID() == target->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, target->targetGUID);
2412  if (!effectUnit && !target->targetGUID.IsPlayer()) // only players may be targeted across maps
2413  return;
2414 
2415  if (!effectUnit || m_spellInfo->Id == 45927)
2416  {
2417  uint8 farMask = 0;
2418  // create far target mask
2419  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2420  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsFarUnitTargetEffect())
2421  if ((1 << i) & mask)
2422  farMask |= (1 << i);
2423 
2424  if (!farMask)
2425  return;
2426  // find unit in world
2427  // Xinef: FindUnit Access without Map check!!! Intended
2428  effectUnit = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(target->targetGUID);
2429  if (!effectUnit)
2430  return;
2431 
2432  // do far effects on the unit
2433  // can't use default call because of threading, do stuff as fast as possible
2434  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2435  if (farMask & (1 << i))
2436  HandleEffects(effectUnit, nullptr, nullptr, i, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET);
2437  return;
2438  }
2439 
2440  if (effectUnit->IsAlive() != target->alive)
2441  return;
2442 
2443  // Xinef: absorb delayed projectiles for 500ms
2444  if (getState() == SPELL_STATE_DELAYED && !m_spellInfo->IsTargetingArea() && !m_spellInfo->IsPositive() &&
2445  (World::GetGameTimeMS() - target->timeDelay) <= effectUnit->m_lastSanctuaryTime && World::GetGameTimeMS() < (effectUnit->m_lastSanctuaryTime + 500) &&
2446  effectUnit->FindMap() && !effectUnit->FindMap()->IsDungeon()
2447  )
2448  return; // No missinfo in that case
2449 
2450  // Get original caster (if exist) and calculate damage/healing from him data
2451  Unit* caster = m_originalCaster ? m_originalCaster : m_caster;
2452 
2453  // Skip if m_originalCaster not avaiable
2454  if (!caster)
2455  return;
2456 
2457  SpellMissInfo missInfo = target->missCondition;
2458 
2459  // Need init unitTarget by default unit (can changed in code on reflect)
2460  // Or on missInfo != SPELL_MISS_NONE unitTarget undefined (but need in trigger subsystem)
2461  unitTarget = effectUnit;
2462 
2463  // Reset damage/healing counter
2464  m_damage = target->damage;
2465  m_healing = -target->damage;
2466 
2467  m_spellAura = nullptr; // Set aura to null for every target-make sure that pointer is not used for unit without aura applied
2468 
2469  PrepareScriptHitHandlers();
2470  CallScriptBeforeHitHandlers(missInfo);
2471 
2472  //Spells with this flag cannot trigger if effect is casted on self
2473  bool canEffectTrigger = !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_CASTER_PROCS) && unitTarget->CanProc() && (CanExecuteTriggersOnHit(mask) || missInfo == SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE2);
2474  bool reflectedSpell = missInfo == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT;
2475  Unit* spellHitTarget = nullptr;
2476 
2477  if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_NONE) // In case spell hit target, do all effect on that target
2478  spellHitTarget = unitTarget;
2479  else if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT) // In case spell reflect from target, do all effect on caster (if hit)
2480  {
2481  missInfo = target->reflectResult;
2482  if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_NONE) // If reflected spell hit caster -> do all effect on him
2483  {
2484  spellHitTarget = m_caster;
2485  unitTarget = m_caster;
2486  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2487  m_caster->ToCreature()->LowerPlayerDamageReq(target->damage);
2488  }
2489  }
2490 
2491  if (spellHitTarget)
2492  {
2493  SpellMissInfo missInfo2 = DoSpellHitOnUnit(spellHitTarget, mask, target->scaleAura);
2494  if (missInfo2 != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
2495  {
2496  if (missInfo2 != SPELL_MISS_MISS)
2497  m_caster->SendSpellMiss(spellHitTarget, m_spellInfo->Id, missInfo2);
2498  m_damage = 0;
2499  spellHitTarget = nullptr;
2500 
2501  // Xinef: if missInfo2 is MISS_EVADE, override base missinfo data
2502  if (missInfo2 == SPELL_MISS_EVADE)
2503  missInfo = SPELL_MISS_EVADE;
2504  }
2505  }
2506 
2507  // Do not take combo points on dodge and miss
2508  if (missInfo != SPELL_MISS_NONE && m_needComboPoints && m_targets.GetUnitTargetGUID() == target->targetGUID)
2509  {
2510  m_needComboPoints = false;
2511  // Restore spell mods for a miss/dodge/parry Cold Blood
2512  // TODO: check how broad this rule should be
2513  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_MISS || missInfo == SPELL_MISS_DODGE || missInfo == SPELL_MISS_PARRY))
2514  m_caster->ToPlayer()->RestoreSpellMods(this, 14177);
2515  }
2516 
2517  // Fill base trigger info
2518  uint32 procAttacker = m_procAttacker;
2519  uint32 procVictim = m_procVictim;
2520  uint32 procEx = m_procEx;
2521 
2522  // Trigger info was not filled in spell::preparedatafortriggersystem - we do it now
2523  if (canEffectTrigger && !procAttacker && !procVictim)
2524  {
2525  bool positive = true;
2526  if (m_damage > 0)
2527  positive = false;
2528  else if (!m_healing)
2529  {
2530  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2531  // If at least one effect negative spell is negative hit
2532  // Xinef: if missInfo is immune state check all effects to properly determine positiveness of spell
2533  if ((missInfo == SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE2 || (mask & (1 << i))) && !m_spellInfo->IsPositiveEffect(i))
2534  {
2535  positive = false;
2536  break;
2537  }
2538  }
2539  switch (m_spellInfo->DmgClass)
2540  {
2541  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
2542  if (positive)
2543  {
2544  procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_POS;
2545  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_POS;
2546  }
2547  else
2548  {
2549  procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
2550  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
2551  }
2552  break;
2553  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE:
2554  if (positive)
2555  {
2556  procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_POS;
2557  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_POS;
2558  }
2559  else
2560  {
2561  procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
2562  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
2563  }
2564  break;
2565  }
2566  }
2567  CallScriptOnHitHandlers();
2568 
2569  // All calculated do it!
2570  // Do healing and triggers
2571  if (m_healing > 0)
2572  {
2573  bool crit = target->crit;
2574  uint32 addhealth = m_healing;
2575 
2576  if (crit)
2577  {
2578  procEx |= PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT;
2579  addhealth = Unit::SpellCriticalHealingBonus(caster, m_spellInfo, addhealth, nullptr);
2580  }
2581  else
2582  procEx |= PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT;
2583 
2584  HealInfo healInfo(caster, unitTarget, addhealth, m_spellInfo, m_spellInfo->GetSchoolMask());
2585 
2586  // Xinef: override with forced crit, only visual result
2587  if (GetSpellValue()->ForcedCritResult)
2588  {
2589  crit = true;
2590  procEx |= PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT;
2591  }
2592 
2593  int32 gain = caster->HealBySpell(healInfo, crit);
2594  unitTarget->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(caster, float(gain) * 0.5f, m_spellInfo);
2595  m_healing = gain;
2596 
2597  // Xinef: if heal acutally healed something, add no overheal flag
2598  if (m_healing)
2599  procEx |= PROC_EX_NO_OVERHEAL;
2600 
2601  // Do triggers for unit (reflect triggers passed on hit phase for correct drop charge)
2602  if (canEffectTrigger)
2603  caster->ProcDamageAndSpell(unitTarget, procAttacker, procVictim, procEx, addhealth, m_attackType, m_spellInfo, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo,
2604  m_triggeredByAuraSpell.effectIndex, this, nullptr, &healInfo);
2605  }
2606  // Do damage and triggers
2607  else if (m_damage > 0)
2608  {
2609  // Fill base damage struct (unitTarget - is real spell target)
2610  SpellNonMeleeDamage damageInfo(caster, unitTarget, m_spellInfo, m_spellSchoolMask);
2611 
2612  // Add bonuses and fill damageInfo struct
2613  // Dancing Rune Weapon...
2614  if (m_caster->GetEntry() == 27893)
2615  {
2616  if (Unit* owner = m_caster->GetOwner())
2617  owner->CalculateSpellDamageTaken(&damageInfo, m_damage, m_spellInfo, m_attackType, target->crit);
2618  }
2619  else
2620  caster->CalculateSpellDamageTaken(&damageInfo, m_damage, m_spellInfo, m_attackType, target->crit);
2621 
2622  // xinef: override miss info after absorb / block calculations
2623  if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_NONE && damageInfo.damage == 0)
2624  {
2625  //if (damageInfo.absorb > 0)
2626  // missInfo = SPELL_MISS_ABSORB;
2627  if (damageInfo.blocked)
2628  missInfo = SPELL_MISS_BLOCK;
2629  }
2630 
2631  // Xinef: override with forced crit, only visual result
2632  if (GetSpellValue()->ForcedCritResult)
2633  {
2634  damageInfo.HitInfo |= SPELL_HIT_TYPE_CRIT;
2635  }
2636 
2637  Unit::DealDamageMods(damageInfo.target, damageInfo.damage, &damageInfo.absorb);
2638 
2639  // xinef: health leech handling
2640  if (m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_HEALTH_LEECH))
2641  {
2642  uint8 effIndex = EFFECT_0;
2643  for (; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
2644  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEALTH_LEECH)
2645  break;
2646 
2647  float healMultiplier = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcValueMultiplier(m_originalCaster, this);
2648 
2649  // get max possible damage, don't count overkill for heal
2650  uint32 healthGain = uint32(-unitTarget->GetHealthGain(-int32(damageInfo.damage)) * healMultiplier);
2651 
2652  if (m_caster->IsAlive())
2653  {
2654  healthGain = m_caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(m_caster, m_spellInfo, healthGain, HEAL);
2655  healthGain = m_caster->SpellHealingBonusTaken(m_caster, m_spellInfo, healthGain, HEAL);
2656 
2657  HealInfo healInfo(m_caster, m_caster, healthGain, m_spellInfo, m_spellInfo->GetSchoolMask());
2658  m_caster->HealBySpell(healInfo);
2659  }
2660  }
2661 
2662  // Send log damage message to client
2663  caster->SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(&damageInfo);
2664  // Xinef: send info to target about reflect
2665  if (reflectedSpell)
2666  effectUnit->SendSpellNonMeleeReflectLog(&damageInfo, effectUnit);
2667 
2668  procEx |= createProcExtendMask(&damageInfo, missInfo);
2669  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_DAMAGE;
2670 
2671  caster->DealSpellDamage(&damageInfo, true);
2672 
2673  // do procs after damage, eg healing effects
2674  // no need to check if target is alive, done in procdamageandspell
2675 
2676  // Do triggers for unit (reflect triggers passed on hit phase for correct drop charge)
2677  if (canEffectTrigger)
2678  {
2679  DamageInfo dmgInfo(damageInfo, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
2680  caster->ProcDamageAndSpell(unitTarget, procAttacker, procVictim, procEx, damageInfo.damage, m_attackType, m_spellInfo, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo,
2681  m_triggeredByAuraSpell.effectIndex, this, &dmgInfo);
2682 
2683  if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CANCELS_AUTO_ATTACK_COMBAT) == 0 &&
2684  m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_SUPRESS_WEAPON_PROCS) == 0 && (m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE || m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED))
2685  caster->ToPlayer()->CastItemCombatSpell(unitTarget, m_attackType, procVictim, procEx);
2686  }
2687 
2688  m_damage = damageInfo.damage;
2689  }
2690  // Passive spell hits/misses or active spells only misses (only triggers)
2691  else
2692  {
2693  // Fill base damage struct (unitTarget - is real spell target)
2694  SpellNonMeleeDamage damageInfo(caster, unitTarget, m_spellInfo, m_spellSchoolMask);
2695  procEx |= createProcExtendMask(&damageInfo, missInfo);
2696  // Do triggers for unit (reflect triggers passed on hit phase for correct drop charge)
2697  if (canEffectTrigger)
2698  {
2699  DamageInfo dmgInfo(damageInfo, NODAMAGE);
2700  caster->ProcDamageAndSpell(unitTarget, procAttacker, procVictim, procEx, 0, m_attackType, m_spellInfo, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo,
2701  m_triggeredByAuraSpell.effectIndex, this, &dmgInfo);
2702 
2703  // Xinef: eg. rogue poisons can proc off cheap shot, etc. so this block should be here also
2704  // Xinef: ofc count only spells that HIT the target, little hack used to fool the system
2705  if ((procEx & PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT || procEx & PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT) && caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CANCELS_AUTO_ATTACK_COMBAT) == 0 &&
2706  m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_SUPRESS_WEAPON_PROCS) == 0 && (m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE || m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED))
2707  caster->ToPlayer()->CastItemCombatSpell(unitTarget, m_attackType, procVictim | PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_DAMAGE, procEx);
2708  }
2709 
2710  // Failed Pickpocket, reveal rogue
2711  if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_RESIST && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_PICKPOCKET) && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster)
2712  {
2713  m_caster->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_TALK);
2714  if (unitTarget->ToCreature()->IsAIEnabled)
2715  unitTarget->ToCreature()->AI()->AttackStart(m_caster);
2716  }
2717  }
2718 
2719  if (m_caster)
2720  {
2721  if (missInfo != SPELL_MISS_EVADE && !m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(effectUnit) && (!m_spellInfo->IsPositive() || m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_DISPEL)))
2722  {
2723  m_caster->CombatStart(effectUnit, !(m_spellInfo->AttributesEx3 & SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS));
2724 
2725  // Unsure if there are more spells that are not supposed to stop enemy from
2726  // regenerating HP from food, so for now it stays as an ID.
2727  const uint32 SPELL_PREMEDITATION = 14183;
2728  if (m_spellInfo->Id != SPELL_PREMEDITATION)
2729  {
2730  if (!effectUnit->IsStandState())
2731  {
2732  effectUnit->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
2733  }
2734  }
2735  }
2736  }
2737 
2738  if (missInfo != SPELL_MISS_EVADE && effectUnit != m_caster && m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(effectUnit) && m_spellInfo->IsPositive() &&
2739  effectUnit->IsInCombat() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_NO_THREAT))
2740  {
2741  m_caster->SetInCombatWith(effectUnit);
2742  }
2743 
2744  // Check for SPELL_ATTR7_CAN_CAUSE_INTERRUPT
2745  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR7_CAN_CAUSE_INTERRUPT) && effectUnit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2746  caster->CastSpell(effectUnit, SPELL_INTERRUPT_NONPLAYER, true);
2747 
2748  if (spellHitTarget)
2749  {
2750  //AI functions
2751  if (spellHitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2752  {
2753  if (spellHitTarget->ToCreature()->IsAIEnabled)
2754  spellHitTarget->ToCreature()->AI()->SpellHit(m_caster, m_spellInfo);
2755  }
2756 
2757  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->ToCreature()->IsAIEnabled)
2758  m_caster->ToCreature()->AI()->SpellHitTarget(spellHitTarget, m_spellInfo);
2759 
2760  // Needs to be called after dealing damage/healing to not remove breaking on damage auras
2761  DoTriggersOnSpellHit(spellHitTarget, mask);
2762 
2763  // if target is fallged for pvp also flag caster if a player
2764  // xinef: do not flag spells with aura bind sight (no special attribute)
2765  if (effectUnit->IsPvP() && effectUnit != m_caster && effectUnit->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID() &&
2766  m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_NO_PVP_FLAG))
2767  {
2768  m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdatePvP(true);
2769  }
2770 
2771  CallScriptAfterHitHandlers();
2772  }
2773 }
2774 
2775 SpellMissInfo Spell::DoSpellHitOnUnit(Unit* unit, uint32 effectMask, bool scaleAura)
2776 {
2777  if (!unit || !effectMask)
2778  return SPELL_MISS_EVADE;
2779 
2780  // For delayed spells immunity may be applied between missile launch and hit - check immunity for that case
2781  if (m_spellInfo->Speed && ((m_damage > 0 && unit->IsImmunedToDamage(m_spellInfo)) || unit->IsImmunedToSchool(m_spellInfo) || unit->IsImmunedToSpell(m_spellInfo)))
2782  return SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
2783 
2784  // disable effects to which unit is immune
2785  SpellMissInfo returnVal = SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
2786  for (uint32 effectNumber = 0; effectNumber < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effectNumber)
2787  {
2788  if (effectMask & (1 << effectNumber))
2789  {
2790  if (unit->IsImmunedToSpellEffect(m_spellInfo, effectNumber))
2791  effectMask &= ~(1 << effectNumber);
2792  // Xinef: Buggs out polymorph
2793  // Xinef: And this is checked in MagicSpellHitResult, why we check resistance twice?
2794  // Xinef: And why we check every spell effect basing on rand and generic dispel info? some effects will be appliend and some wont? WTF?
2795  /*else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effectNumber].IsAura() && !m_spellInfo->IsPositiveEffect(effectNumber))
2796  {
2797  int32 debuff_resist_chance = unit->GetMaxPositiveAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DEBUFF_RESISTANCE, int32(m_spellInfo->Dispel));
2798  debuff_resist_chance += unit->GetMaxNegativeAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DEBUFF_RESISTANCE, int32(m_spellInfo->Dispel));
2799 
2800  if (debuff_resist_chance > 0)
2801  if (irand(0,10000) <= (debuff_resist_chance * 100))
2802  {
2803  effectMask &= ~(1 << effectNumber);
2804  returnVal = SPELL_MISS_RESIST;
2805  }
2806  }*/
2807  }
2808  }
2809  if (!effectMask)
2810  return returnVal;
2811 
2812  if (unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2813  {
2814  unit->ToPlayer()->StartTimedAchievement(ACHIEVEMENT_TIMED_TYPE_SPELL_TARGET, m_spellInfo->Id);
2815  unit->ToPlayer()->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET, m_spellInfo->Id, 0, m_caster);
2816  unit->ToPlayer()->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET2, m_spellInfo->Id, 0, m_caster);
2817  }
2818 
2819  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2820  {
2821  m_caster->ToPlayer()->StartTimedAchievement(ACHIEVEMENT_TIMED_TYPE_SPELL_CASTER, m_spellInfo->Id);
2822  m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL2, m_spellInfo->Id, 0, unit);
2823  }
2824 
2825  if (m_caster != unit)
2826  {
2827  // Recheck UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE for delayed spells
2828  // Xinef: Also check evade state
2829  if (m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f)
2830  {
2831  if (unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && unit->ToCreature()->IsInEvadeMode())
2832  return SPELL_MISS_EVADE;
2833 
2834  if (unit->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE) && unit->GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
2835  return SPELL_MISS_EVADE;
2836  }
2837 
2838  if (m_caster->_IsValidAttackTarget(unit, m_spellInfo) && /*Intervene Trigger*/ m_spellInfo->Id != 59667)
2839  {
2840  unit->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_HITBYSPELL);
2841  }
2842  else if (m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(unit))
2843  {
2844  // for delayed spells ignore negative spells (after duel end) for friendly targets
2845  // TODO: this cause soul transfer bugged
2846  if(!IsTriggered() && m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f && unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_spellInfo->IsPositive())
2847  return SPELL_MISS_EVADE;
2848 
2849  // assisting case, healing and resurrection
2850  if (unit->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ATTACK_PLAYER))
2851  {
2852  m_caster->SetContestedPvP();
2853  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_NO_PVP_FLAG))
2854  m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdatePvP(true);
2855  }
2856 
2857  // xinef: triggered spells should not prolong combat
2858  if (unit->IsInCombat() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS) && !m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
2859  {
2860  m_caster->SetInCombatState(unit->GetCombatTimer() > 0, unit);
2861  unit->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(m_caster, 0.0f);
2862  }
2863  }
2864  }
2865 
2866  uint8 aura_effmask = 0;
2867  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2868  if (effectMask & (1 << i) && m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsUnitOwnedAuraEffect())
2869  aura_effmask |= 1 << i;
2870 
2871  Unit* originalCaster = GetOriginalCaster();
2872  if (!originalCaster)
2873  originalCaster = m_caster;
2874 
2875  // Get Data Needed for Diminishing Returns, some effects may have multiple auras, so this must be done on spell hit, not aura add
2876  // Xinef: Do not increase diminishing level for self cast
2877  m_diminishGroup = GetDiminishingReturnsGroupForSpell(m_spellInfo, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo);
2878  // xinef: do not increase diminish level for bosses (eg. Void Reaver silence is never diminished)
2879  if (((m_spellFlags & SPELL_FLAG_REFLECTED) && !(unit->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_REFLECT_SPELLS))) || (aura_effmask && m_diminishGroup && unit != m_caster && (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || !m_caster->ToCreature()->isWorldBoss())))
2880  {
2881  m_diminishLevel = unit->GetDiminishing(m_diminishGroup);
2882  DiminishingReturnsType type = GetDiminishingReturnsGroupType(m_diminishGroup);
2883 
2884  uint32 flagsExtra = unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT ? unit->ToCreature()->GetCreatureTemplate()->flags_extra : 0;
2885 
2886  // Increase Diminishing on unit, current informations for actually casts will use values above
2887  if ((type == DRTYPE_PLAYER && (
2888  unit->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself() || flagsExtra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_ALL_DIMINISH || (m_diminishGroup == DIMINISHING_TAUNT && (flagsExtra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_OBEYS_TAUNT_DIMINISHING_RETURNS))
2889  )) || type == DRTYPE_ALL)
2890  unit->IncrDiminishing(m_diminishGroup);
2891  }
2892 
2893  if (m_caster != unit && m_caster->IsHostileTo(unit) && !m_spellInfo->IsPositive() && !m_triggeredByAuraSpell && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_DONT_BREAK_STEALTH))
2894  {
2895  unit->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH);
2896  }
2897 
2898  if (aura_effmask)
2899  {
2900  // Select rank for aura with level requirements only in specific cases
2901  // Unit has to be target only of aura effect, both caster and target have to be players, target has to be other than unit target
2902  SpellInfo const* aurSpellInfo = m_spellInfo;
2903  int32 basePoints[3];
2904  if (scaleAura)
2905  {
2906  aurSpellInfo = m_spellInfo->GetAuraRankForLevel(unitTarget->getLevel());
2907  ASSERT(aurSpellInfo);
2908  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2909  {
2910  basePoints[i] = aurSpellInfo->Effects[i].BasePoints;
2911  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect != aurSpellInfo->Effects[i].Effect)
2912  {
2913  aurSpellInfo = m_spellInfo;
2914  break;
2915  }
2916  }
2917  }
2918 
2919  if (m_originalCaster)
2920  {
2921  bool refresh = false;
2922  m_spellAura = Aura::TryRefreshStackOrCreate(aurSpellInfo, effectMask, unit, m_originalCaster,
2923  (aurSpellInfo == m_spellInfo) ? &m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[0] : &basePoints[0], m_CastItem, ObjectGuid::Empty, &refresh, !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_NO_PERIODIC_RESET));
2924 
2925  // xinef: if aura was not refreshed, add proc ex
2926  if (!refresh)
2927  m_procEx |= PROC_EX_NO_AURA_REFRESH;
2928 
2929  if (m_spellAura)
2930  {
2931  // Set aura stack amount to desired value
2932  if (m_spellValue->AuraStackAmount > 1)
2933  {
2934  if (!refresh)
2935  m_spellAura->SetStackAmount(m_spellValue->AuraStackAmount);
2936  else
2937  m_spellAura->ModStackAmount(m_spellValue->AuraStackAmount);
2938  }
2939 
2940  // Now Reduce spell duration using data received at spell hit
2941  int32 duration = m_spellAura->GetMaxDuration();
2942  int32 limitduration = GetDiminishingReturnsLimitDuration(m_diminishGroup, aurSpellInfo);
2943 
2944  // Xinef: if unit == caster - test versus original unit if available
2945  float diminishMod = 1.0f;
2946  if (unit == m_caster && m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
2947  diminishMod = m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->ApplyDiminishingToDuration(m_diminishGroup, duration, m_originalCaster, m_diminishLevel, limitduration);
2948  else
2949  diminishMod = unit->ApplyDiminishingToDuration(m_diminishGroup, duration, m_originalCaster, m_diminishLevel, limitduration);
2950 
2951  // unit is immune to aura if it was diminished to 0 duration
2952  if (diminishMod == 0.0f)
2953  {
2954  m_spellAura->Remove();
2955  bool found = false;
2956  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2957  if (effectMask & (1 << i) && m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect != SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA)
2958  found = true;
2959  if (!found)
2960  return SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
2961  }
2962  else
2963  {
2964  ((UnitAura*)m_spellAura)->SetDiminishGroup(m_diminishGroup);
2965 
2966  bool positive = m_spellAura->GetSpellInfo()->IsPositive();
2967  if (AuraApplication* aurApp = m_spellAura->GetApplicationOfTarget(m_originalCaster->GetGUID()))
2968  positive = aurApp->IsPositive();
2969 
2970  duration = m_originalCaster->ModSpellDuration(aurSpellInfo, unit, duration, positive, effectMask);
2971 
2972  // xinef: haste affects duration of those spells twice
2973  if (m_originalCaster->HasAuraTypeWithAffectMask(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HASTE, aurSpellInfo) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_SPELL_HASTE_AFFECTS_PERIODIC))
2974  duration = int32(duration * m_originalCaster->GetFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED));
2975 
2976  if (m_spellValue->AuraDuration != 0)
2977  {
2978  if (m_spellAura->GetMaxDuration() != -1)
2979  {
2980  m_spellAura->SetMaxDuration(m_spellValue->AuraDuration);
2981  }
2982 
2983  m_spellAura->SetDuration(m_spellValue->AuraDuration);
2984  }
2985  else if (duration != m_spellAura->GetMaxDuration())
2986  {
2987  m_spellAura->SetMaxDuration(duration);
2988  m_spellAura->SetDuration(duration);
2989  }
2990 
2991  // xinef: apply relic cooldown, imo best place to add this
2992  if (m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetTemplate()->InventoryType == INVTYPE_RELIC && m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
2993  m_caster->AddSpellCooldown(SPELL_RELIC_COOLDOWN, m_CastItem->GetEntry(), duration);
2994 
2995  m_spellAura->SetTriggeredByAuraSpellInfo(m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo);
2996  m_spellAura->_RegisterForTargets();
2997  }
2998  }
2999  }
3000  }
3001 
3002  int8 sanct_effect = -1;
3003 
3004  for (uint32 effectNumber = 0; effectNumber < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effectNumber)
3005  {
3006  // handle sanctuary effects after aura apply!
3007  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effectNumber].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_SANCTUARY)
3008  {
3009  sanct_effect = effectNumber;
3010  continue;
3011  }
3012 
3013  if (effectMask & (1 << effectNumber))
3014  HandleEffects(unit, nullptr, nullptr, effectNumber, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET);
3015  }
3016 
3017  if( sanct_effect >= 0 && (effectMask & (1 << sanct_effect)) )
3018  HandleEffects(unit, nullptr, nullptr, sanct_effect, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET);
3019 
3020  return SPELL_MISS_NONE;
3021 }
3022 
3023 void Spell::DoTriggersOnSpellHit(Unit* unit, uint8 effMask)
3024 {
3025  // Apply additional spell effects to target
3026  // TODO: move this code to scripts
3027  if (m_preCastSpell)
3028  {
3029  // Paladin immunity shields
3030  if (m_preCastSpell == 61988)
3031  {
3032  // Cast Forbearance
3033  m_caster->CastSpell(unit, 25771, true);
3034  // Cast Avenging Wrath Marker
3035  unit->CastSpell(unit, 61987, true);
3036  }
3037 
3038  // Avenging Wrath
3039  if (m_preCastSpell == 61987)
3040  // Cast the serverside immunity shield marker
3041  m_caster->CastSpell(unit, 61988, true);
3042 
3043  // Fearie Fire (Feral) - damage
3044  if( m_preCastSpell == 60089 )
3045  m_caster->CastSpell(unit, m_preCastSpell, true);
3046  else if (sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_preCastSpell))
3047  // Blizz seems to just apply aura without bothering to cast
3048  m_caster->AddAura(m_preCastSpell, unit);
3049  }
3050 
3051  // handle SPELL_AURA_ADD_TARGET_TRIGGER auras
3052  // this is executed after spell proc spells on target hit
3053  // spells are triggered for each hit spell target
3054  // info confirmed with retail sniffs of permafrost and shadow weaving
3055  if (!m_hitTriggerSpells.empty())
3056  {
3057  int _duration = 0;
3058  for (HitTriggerSpellList::const_iterator i = m_hitTriggerSpells.begin(); i != m_hitTriggerSpells.end(); ++i)
3059  {
3060  if (CanExecuteTriggersOnHit(effMask, i->triggeredByAura) && roll_chance_i(i->chance))
3061  {
3062  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell %d triggered spell %d by SPELL_AURA_ADD_TARGET_TRIGGER aura", m_spellInfo->Id, i->triggeredSpell->Id);
3063 
3064  // SPELL_AURA_ADD_TARGET_TRIGGER auras shouldn't trigger auras without duration
3065  // set duration of current aura to the triggered spell
3066  if (i->triggeredSpell->GetDuration() == -1)
3067  {
3068  // get duration from aura-only once
3069  if (!_duration)
3070  {
3071  Aura* aur = unit->GetAura(m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetGUID());
3072  _duration = aur ? aur->GetDuration() : -1;
3073  }
3074 
3075  if (Aura* triggeredAur = unit->GetAura(i->triggeredSpell->Id, m_caster->GetGUID()))
3076  {
3077  triggeredAur->SetDuration(std::max(triggeredAur->GetDuration(), _duration));
3078  }
3079  else
3080  {
3081  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(i->triggeredSpell->Id, SPELLVALUE_AURA_DURATION, _duration, unit, true);
3082  }
3083  }
3084  else
3085  {
3086  m_caster->CastSpell(unit, i->triggeredSpell, true);
3087  }
3088  }
3089  }
3090  }
3091 
3092  // trigger linked auras remove/apply
3093  // TODO: remove/cleanup this, as this table is not documented and people are doing stupid things with it
3094  if (std::vector<int32> const* spellTriggered = sSpellMgr->GetSpellLinked(m_spellInfo->Id + SPELL_LINK_HIT))
3095  {
3096  for (std::vector<int32>::const_iterator i = spellTriggered->begin(); i != spellTriggered->end(); ++i)
3097  if (*i < 0)
3098  {
3099  unit->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(-(*i));
3100  }
3101  else
3102  {
3103  unit->CastSpell(unit, *i, true, 0, 0, m_caster->GetGUID());
3104  }
3105  }
3106 }
3107 
3108 void Spell::DoAllEffectOnTarget(GOTargetInfo* target)
3109 {
3110  if (target->processed) // Check target
3111  return;
3112  target->processed = true; // Target checked in apply effects procedure
3113 
3114  uint32 effectMask = target->effectMask;
3115  if (!effectMask)
3116  return;
3117 
3118  GameObject* go = m_caster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(target->targetGUID);
3119  if (!go)
3120  return;
3121 
3122  PrepareScriptHitHandlers();
3123  CallScriptBeforeHitHandlers(SPELL_MISS_NONE);
3124 
3125  for (uint32 effectNumber = 0; effectNumber < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effectNumber)
3126  if (effectMask & (1 << effectNumber))
3127  HandleEffects(nullptr, nullptr, go, effectNumber, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET);
3128 
3129  // xinef: inform ai about spellhit
3130  go->AI()->SpellHit(m_caster, m_spellInfo);
3131 
3132  CallScriptOnHitHandlers();
3133 
3134  CallScriptAfterHitHandlers();
3135 }
3136 
3137 void Spell::DoAllEffectOnTarget(ItemTargetInfo* target)
3138 {
3139  uint32 effectMask = target->effectMask;
3140  if (!target->item || !effectMask)
3141  return;
3142 
3143  PrepareScriptHitHandlers();
3144  CallScriptBeforeHitHandlers(SPELL_MISS_NONE);
3145 
3146  for (uint32 effectNumber = 0; effectNumber < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effectNumber)
3147  if (effectMask & (1 << effectNumber))
3148  HandleEffects(nullptr, target->item, nullptr, effectNumber, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET);
3149 
3150  CallScriptOnHitHandlers();
3151 
3152  CallScriptAfterHitHandlers();
3153 }
3154 
3155 bool Spell::UpdateChanneledTargetList()
3156 {
3157  // Not need check return true
3158  if (m_channelTargetEffectMask == 0)
3159  return true;
3160 
3161  uint8 channelTargetEffectMask = m_channelTargetEffectMask;
3162  uint8 channelAuraMask = 0;
3163  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
3164  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA)
3165  channelAuraMask |= 1 << i;
3166 
3167  channelAuraMask &= channelTargetEffectMask;
3168 
3169  float range = 0;
3170  if (channelAuraMask)
3171  {
3172  range = m_spellInfo->GetMaxRange(m_spellInfo->IsPositive());
3173  if (range == 0)
3174  for(int i = EFFECT_0; i <= EFFECT_2; ++i)
3175  if (channelAuraMask & (1 << i) && m_spellInfo->Effects[i].RadiusEntry)
3176  {
3177  range = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].CalcRadius(nullptr, nullptr);
3178  break;
3179  }
3180 
3181  if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
3182  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_RANGE, range, this);
3183 
3184  // xinef: add little tolerance level
3185  range += std::min(3.0f, range * 0.1f); // 10% but no more than 3yd
3186  }
3187 
3188  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3189  {
3190  if (ihit->missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE && (channelTargetEffectMask & ihit->effectMask))
3191  {
3192  Unit* unit = m_caster->GetGUID() == ihit->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID);
3193 
3194  if (!unit)
3195  continue;
3196 
3197  if (IsValidDeadOrAliveTarget(unit))
3198  {
3199  if (channelAuraMask & ihit->effectMask)
3200  {
3201  if (AuraApplication* aurApp = unit->GetAuraApplication(m_spellInfo->Id, m_originalCasterGUID))
3202  {
3203  if (m_caster != unit)
3204  {
3205  if (!m_caster->IsWithinDistInMap(unit, range))
3206  {
3207  ihit->effectMask &= ~aurApp->GetEffectMask();
3208  unit->RemoveAura(aurApp);
3209  continue;
3210  }
3211  // Xinef: Update Orientation server side (non players wont sent appropriate packets)
3212  else if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_TRACK_TARGET_IN_CHANNEL))
3213  m_caster->UpdateOrientation(m_caster->GetAngle(unit));
3214  }
3215  }
3216  else // aura is dispelled
3217  continue;
3218  }
3219 
3220  channelTargetEffectMask &= ~ihit->effectMask; // remove from need alive mask effect that have alive target
3221  }
3222  }
3223  }
3224 
3225  // Xinef: not all effects are covered, remove applications from all targets
3226  if (channelTargetEffectMask != 0)
3227  {
3228  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3229  if (ihit->missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE && (channelAuraMask & ihit->effectMask))
3230  if (Unit* unit = m_caster->GetGUID() == ihit->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID))
3231  if (IsValidDeadOrAliveTarget(unit))
3232  if (AuraApplication* aurApp = unit->GetAuraApplication(m_spellInfo->Id, m_originalCasterGUID))
3233  {
3234  ihit->effectMask &= ~aurApp->GetEffectMask();
3235  unit->RemoveAura(aurApp);
3236  }
3237  }
3238 
3239  // is all effects from m_needAliveTargetMask have alive targets
3240  return channelTargetEffectMask == 0;
3241 }
3242 
3243 SpellCastResult Spell::prepare(SpellCastTargets const* targets, AuraEffect const* triggeredByAura)
3244 {
3245  if (m_CastItem)
3246  {
3247  m_castItemGUID = m_CastItem->GetGUID();
3248  }
3249  else
3250  {
3251  m_castItemGUID = ObjectGuid::Empty;
3252  }
3253 
3254  InitExplicitTargets(*targets);
3255 
3256  if (!sScriptMgr->CanPrepare(this, targets, triggeredByAura))
3257  {
3258  finish(false);
3259  return SPELL_FAILED_UNKNOWN;
3260  }
3261 
3262  // Fill aura scaling information
3263  if (sScriptMgr->CanScalingEverything(this) || m_caster->IsTotem() || (m_caster->IsControlledByPlayer() && !m_spellInfo->IsPassive() && m_spellInfo->SpellLevel && !m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_AURA_SCALING)))
3264  {
3265  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
3266  {
3267  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA ||
3268  m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AREA_AURA_PARTY ||
3269  m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AREA_AURA_RAID)
3270  {
3271  // Change aura with ranks only if basepoints are taken from spellInfo and aura is positive
3272  if (m_spellInfo->IsPositiveEffect(i))
3273  {
3274  m_auraScaleMask |= (1 << i);
3275  if (m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[i] != m_spellInfo->Effects[i].BasePoints)
3276  {
3277  m_auraScaleMask = 0;
3278  break;
3279  }
3280  }
3281  }
3282  }
3283  }
3284 
3285  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_PREPARING;
3286 
3287  if (triggeredByAura)
3288  {
3289  m_triggeredByAuraSpell.Init(triggeredByAura);
3290  }
3291 
3292  // create and add update event for this spell
3293  _spellEvent = new SpellEvent(this);
3294  m_caster->m_Events.AddEvent(_spellEvent, m_caster->m_Events.CalculateTime(1));
3295 
3296  if (DisableMgr::IsDisabledFor(DISABLE_TYPE_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster))
3297  {
3298  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_UNAVAILABLE);
3299  finish(false);
3300  return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_UNAVAILABLE;
3301  }
3302 
3303  //Prevent casting at cast another spell (ServerSide check)
3304  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CAST_IN_PROGRESS) && m_caster->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false, true, true, m_spellInfo->Id == 75) && m_cast_count)
3305  {
3306  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS);
3307  finish(false);
3308  return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS;
3309  }
3310 
3311  LoadScripts();
3312 
3313  OnSpellLaunch();
3314 
3315  m_powerCost = m_CastItem ? 0 : m_spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(m_caster, m_spellSchoolMask, this);
3316 
3317  // Set combo point requirement
3318  if ((_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_COMBO_POINTS) || m_CastItem || !m_caster->m_movedByPlayer)
3319  m_needComboPoints = false;
3320 
3321  SpellCastResult result = CheckCast(true);
3322  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK && !IsAutoRepeat()) //always cast autorepeat dummy for triggering
3323  {
3324  // Periodic auras should be interrupted when aura triggers a spell which can't be cast
3325  // for example bladestorm aura should be removed on disarm as of patch 3.3.5
3326  // channeled periodic spells should be affected by this (arcane missiles, penance, etc)
3327  // a possible alternative sollution for those would be validating aura target on unit state change
3328  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && triggeredByAura && triggeredByAura->IsPeriodic() && !triggeredByAura->GetBase()->IsPassive())
3329  {
3330  SendChannelUpdate(0);
3331  triggeredByAura->GetBase()->SetDuration(0);
3332  }
3333 
3334  // Allows to cast melee attack spell if result is SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE
3335  if (!IsNextMeleeSwingSpell() || result != SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE)
3336  {
3337  SendCastResult(result);
3338 
3339  finish(false);
3340  return result;
3341  }
3342  }
3343 
3344  // Prepare data for triggers
3345  prepareDataForTriggerSystem(triggeredByAura);
3346 
3347  // calculate cast time (calculated after first CheckCast check to prevent charge counting for first CheckCast fail)
3348  m_casttime = (_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_CAST_DIRECTLY) ? 0 : m_spellInfo->CalcCastTime(m_caster, this);
3349 
3350  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3351  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_CASTTIME))
3352  m_casttime = 0;
3353 
3354  // don't allow channeled spells / spells with cast time to be casted while moving
3355  // (even if they are interrupted on moving, spells with almost immediate effect get to have their effect processed before movement interrupter kicks in)
3356  if ((m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() || m_casttime) && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->isMoving() && m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_MOVEMENT && !IsTriggered())
3357  {
3358  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_MOVING);
3359  finish(false);
3360  return SPELL_FAILED_MOVING;
3361  }
3362 
3363  // xinef: if spell have nearby target entry only, do not allow to cast if no targets are found
3364  if (m_CastItem)
3365  {
3366  bool selectTargets = false;
3367  bool nearbyDest = false;
3368 
3369  for (uint8 i = EFFECT_0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
3370  {
3371  if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsEffect())
3372  continue;
3373 
3374  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetSelectionCategory() != TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_NEARBY || m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetCheckType() != TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY)
3375  {
3376  selectTargets = false;
3377  break;
3378  }
3379 
3380  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetObjectType() == TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_DEST)
3381  {
3382  nearbyDest = true;
3383  }
3384 
3385  // xinef: by default set it to false, and to true if any valid target is found
3386  selectTargets = true;
3387  }
3388 
3389  if (selectTargets)
3390  {
3391  SelectSpellTargets();
3392  _spellTargetsSelected = true;
3393  bool spellFailed = false;
3394 
3395  if (m_UniqueTargetInfo.empty() && m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.empty())
3396  {
3397  // no valid nearby target unit or game object found; check if nearby destination type
3398  if (nearbyDest)
3399  {
3400  if (!m_targets.HasDst())
3401  {
3402  // no valid target destination
3403  spellFailed = true;
3404  }
3405  }
3406  else
3407  {
3408  spellFailed = true;
3409  }
3410  }
3411 
3412  if (spellFailed)
3413  {
3414  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE);
3415  finish(false);
3416  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
3417  }
3418  }
3419  }
3420 
3421  // set timer base at cast time
3422  ReSetTimer();
3423 
3424  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell::prepare: spell id %u source %u caster %d customCastFlags %u mask %u", m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetEntry(), m_originalCaster ? m_originalCaster->GetEntry() : -1, _triggeredCastFlags, m_targets.GetTargetMask());
3425 
3426  if (!(m_spellInfo->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_NOT_SEATED) && !(m_spellInfo->Attributes & SPELL_ATTR0_ALLOW_WHILE_SITTING) && !m_triggeredByAuraSpell && m_caster->IsSitState())
3427  {
3428  m_caster->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
3429  }
3430 
3431  //Containers for channeled spells have to be set
3432  //TODO:Apply this to all casted spells if needed
3433  // Why check duration? 29350: channelled triggers channelled
3434  if ((_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_CAST_DIRECTLY) && (!m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() || !m_spellInfo->GetMaxDuration()))
3435  cast(true);
3436  else
3437  {
3438  // stealth must be removed at cast starting (at show channel bar)
3439  // skip triggered spell (item equip spell casting and other not explicit character casts/item uses)
3440  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAGS) && m_spellInfo->IsBreakingStealth())
3441  {
3442  m_caster->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_CAST);
3443  m_caster->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_SPELL_ATTACK);
3444  }
3445 
3446  m_caster->SetCurrentCastedSpell(this);
3447  SendSpellStart();
3448 
3449  // set target for proper facing
3450  if ((m_casttime || m_spellInfo->IsChanneled()) && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SET_FACING))
3451  {
3452  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !m_caster->ToCreature()->IsInEvadeMode() &&
3453  ((m_targets.GetObjectTarget() && m_caster != m_targets.GetObjectTarget()) || m_spellInfo->IsPositive()))
3454  {
3455  // Xinef: Creature should focus to cast target if there is explicit target or self if casting positive spell
3456  // Xinef: Creature should not rotate when casting spell... based on halion behavior
3457  m_caster->ToCreature()->FocusTarget(this, m_targets.GetObjectTarget() != nullptr ? m_targets.GetObjectTarget() : m_caster);
3458  }
3459  }
3460 
3461  //item: first cast may destroy item and second cast causes crash
3462  // xinef: removed !m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime
3463  // second los check failed in events
3464  // xinef: removed itemguid check, currently there is no such item in database
3465  if (!m_casttime && GetCurrentContainer() == CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL)
3466  cast(true);
3467 
3468  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_GCD))
3469  TriggerGlobalCooldown();
3470  }
3471 
3472  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
3473 }
3474 
3475 void Spell::cancel(bool bySelf)
3476 {
3477  if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
3478  return;
3479 
3480  uint32 oldState = m_spellState;
3481  bool autoRepeat = m_autoRepeat;
3482  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_FINISHED;
3483 
3484  m_autoRepeat = false;
3485  switch (oldState)
3486  {
3487  case SPELL_STATE_PREPARING:
3488  CancelGlobalCooldown();
3489  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3490  {
3491  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->NeedSendSpectatorData())
3492  ArenaSpectator::SendCommand_Spell(m_caster->FindMap(), m_caster->GetGUID(), "SPE", m_spellInfo->Id, bySelf ? 99998 : 99999);
3493  }
3494  [[fallthrough]]; // TODO: Not sure whether the fallthrough was a mistake (forgetting a break) or intended. This should be double-checked.
3495  case SPELL_STATE_DELAYED:
3496  SendInterrupted(0);
3497  // xinef: fixes bugged gcd reset in some cases
3498  if (!autoRepeat)
3499  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_INTERRUPTED);
3500  break;
3501 
3502  case SPELL_STATE_CASTING:
3503  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3504  if ((*ihit).missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
3505  if (Unit* unit = m_caster->GetGUID() == ihit->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID))
3506  unit->RemoveOwnedAura(m_spellInfo->Id, m_originalCasterGUID, 0, AURA_REMOVE_BY_CANCEL);
3507 
3508  SendChannelUpdate(0);
3509  SendInterrupted(0);
3510  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_INTERRUPTED);
3511 
3512  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->ToPlayer()->NeedSendSpectatorData())
3513  ArenaSpectator::SendCommand_Spell(m_caster->FindMap(), m_caster->GetGUID(), "SPE", m_spellInfo->Id, bySelf ? 99998 : 99999);
3514 
3515  // spell is canceled-take mods and clear list
3516  if (Player* player = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
3517  player->RemoveSpellMods(this);
3518 
3519  m_appliedMods.clear();
3520  break;
3521 
3522  default:
3523  break;
3524  }
3525 
3526  SetReferencedFromCurrent(false);
3527  if (m_selfContainer && *m_selfContainer == this)
3528  *m_selfContainer = nullptr;
3529 
3530  m_caster->RemoveDynObject(m_spellInfo->Id);
3531  if (m_spellInfo->IsChanneled()) // if not channeled then the object for the current cast wasn't summoned yet
3532  m_caster->RemoveGameObject(m_spellInfo->Id, true);
3533 
3534  //set state back so finish will be processed
3535  m_spellState = oldState;
3536 
3537  finish(false);
3538 }
3539 
3540 void Spell::cast(bool skipCheck)
3541 {
3542  Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner();
3543  Spell* lastMod = nullptr;
3544  if (modOwner)
3545  {
3546  lastMod = modOwner->m_spellModTakingSpell;
3547  if (lastMod)
3548  modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(lastMod, false);
3549  }
3550 
3551  _cast(skipCheck);
3552 
3553  if (lastMod)
3554  modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(lastMod, true);
3555 }
3556 
3557 void Spell::_cast(bool skipCheck)
3558 {
3559  // update pointers base at GUIDs to prevent access to non-existed already object
3560  if (!UpdatePointers())
3561  {
3562  // cancel the spell if UpdatePointers() returned false, something wrong happened there
3563  cancel();
3564  return;
3565  }
3566 
3567  // cancel at lost explicit target during cast
3568  if (m_targets.GetObjectTargetGUID() && !m_targets.GetObjectTarget())
3569  {
3570  cancel();
3571  return;
3572  }
3573 
3574  // Xinef: implement attribute SPELL_ATTR1_DISMISS_PET_FIRST, on spell cast current pet is dismissed and charms are removed
3575  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
3576  {
3577  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PET))
3578  if (Pet* pet = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet())
3579  m_caster->ToPlayer()->RemovePet(pet, PET_SAVE_AS_CURRENT);
3580 
3581  if (Unit* charm = m_caster->GetCharm())
3582  charm->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM, m_caster->GetGUID());
3583  }
3584 
3585  if (Player* playerCaster = m_caster->ToPlayer())
3586  {
3587  // now that we've done the basic check, now run the scripts
3588  // should be done before the spell is actually executed
3589 #ifdef ELUNA
3590  sEluna->OnSpellCast(playerCaster, this, skipCheck);
3591 #endif
3592 
3593  // As of 3.0.2 pets begin attacking their owner's target immediately
3594  // Let any pets know we've attacked something. Check DmgClass for harmful spells only
3595  // This prevents spells such as Hunter's Mark from triggering pet attack
3596  // xinef: take into account SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS
3597  if ((m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT) && GetSpellInfo()->DmgClass != SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE && !GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS))
3598  if (!playerCaster->m_Controlled.empty())
3599  for (Unit::ControlSet::iterator itr = playerCaster->m_Controlled.begin(); itr != playerCaster->m_Controlled.end(); ++itr)
3600  if (Unit* pet = *itr)
3601  if (pet->IsAlive() && pet->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
3602  pet->ToCreature()->AI()->OwnerAttacked(m_targets.GetUnitTarget());
3603  }
3604 
3605  SetExecutedCurrently(true);
3606 
3607  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SET_FACING))
3608  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_targets.GetObjectTarget() && m_caster != m_targets.GetObjectTarget())
3609  m_caster->SetInFront(m_targets.GetObjectTarget());
3610 
3611  CallScriptBeforeCastHandlers();
3612 
3613  Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner();
3614  // skip check if done already (for instant cast spells for example)
3615  if (!skipCheck)
3616  {
3617  SpellCastResult castResult = CheckCast(false);
3618  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
3619  {
3620  SendCastResult(castResult);
3621  SendInterrupted(0);
3622 
3623  finish(false);
3624  SetExecutedCurrently(false);
3625  return;
3626  }
3627 
3628  // additional check after cast bar completes (must not be in CheckCast)
3629  // if trade not complete then remember it in trade data
3630  if (m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
3631  {
3632  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3633  {
3634  if (TradeData* my_trade = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTradeData())
3635  {
3636  if (!my_trade->IsInAcceptProcess())
3637  {
3638  // Spell will be casted at completing the trade. Silently ignore at this place
3639  my_trade->SetSpell(m_spellInfo->Id, m_CastItem);
3640  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT);
3641  SendInterrupted(0);
3642 
3643  finish(false);
3644  SetExecutedCurrently(false);
3645  return;
3646  }
3647  }
3648  }
3649  }
3650  }
3651 
3652  if (modOwner)
3653  modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, true);
3654 
3655  if (!_spellTargetsSelected)
3656  SelectSpellTargets();
3657 
3658  if (modOwner)
3659  modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, false);
3660 
3661  // Spell may be finished after target map check
3662  if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
3663  {
3664  SendInterrupted(0);
3665  finish(false);
3666  SetExecutedCurrently(false);
3667  return;
3668  }
3669 
3670  if (modOwner)
3671  modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, true);
3672 
3673  PrepareTriggersExecutedOnHit();
3674 
3675  CallScriptOnCastHandlers();
3676 
3677  if (modOwner)
3678  modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, false);
3679 
3680  // traded items have trade slot instead of guid in m_itemTargetGUID
3681  // set to real guid to be sent later to the client
3682  m_targets.UpdateTradeSlotItem();
3683 
3684  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3685  {
3686  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CAST_ITEM) && m_CastItem)
3687  {
3688  m_caster->ToPlayer()->StartTimedAchievement(ACHIEVEMENT_TIMED_TYPE_ITEM, m_CastItem->GetEntry());
3689  m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_ITEM, m_CastItem->GetEntry());
3690  }
3691 
3692  m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id, 0, (m_targets.GetUnitTarget() ? m_targets.GetUnitTarget() : m_caster));
3693  }
3694 
3695  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_POWER_AND_REAGENT_COST))
3696  {
3697  // Powers have to be taken before SendSpellGo
3698  TakePower();
3699  TakeReagents(); // we must remove reagents before HandleEffects to allow place crafted item in same slot
3700  }
3701  else if (Item* targetItem = m_targets.GetItemTarget())
3702  {
3704  if (targetItem->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
3705  TakeReagents();
3706  }
3707 
3708  SendSpellCooldown();
3709 
3710  // CAST SPELL
3711  if (modOwner)
3712  modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, true);
3713 
3714  PrepareScriptHitHandlers();
3715 
3716  HandleLaunchPhase();
3717 
3718  // we must send smsg_spell_go packet before m_castItem delete in TakeCastItem()...
3719  SendSpellGo();
3720 
3721  // Okay, everything is prepared. Now we need to distinguish between immediate and evented delayed spells
3722  if ((m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f && !m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())/* xinef: we dont need this shit || m_spellInfo->Id == 14157*/)
3723  {
3724  // Remove used for cast item if need (it can be already nullptr after TakeReagents call
3725  // in case delayed spell remove item at cast delay start
3726  TakeCastItem();
3727 
3728  // Okay, maps created, now prepare flags
3729  m_immediateHandled = false;
3730  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_DELAYED;
3731  SetDelayStart(0);
3732 
3733  if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING) && !m_caster->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false, false, true))
3734  m_caster->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING);
3735 
3736  // remove all applied mods at this point
3737  // dont allow user to use them twice in case spell did not reach current target
3738  if (modOwner)
3739  modOwner->RemoveSpellMods(this);
3740 
3741  // Xinef: why do we keep focus after spell is sent to air?
3742  // Xinef: Because of this, in the middle of some animation after setting targetguid to 0 etc
3743  // Xinef: we get focused to it out of nowhere...
3744  if (Creature* creatureCaster = m_caster->ToCreature())
3745  creatureCaster->ReleaseFocus(this);
3746  }
3747  else
3748  {
3749  // Immediate spell, no big deal
3750  handle_immediate();
3751  }
3752 
3753  CallScriptAfterCastHandlers();
3754 
3755  if (modOwner)
3756  modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, false);
3757 
3758  if (const std::vector<int32>* spell_triggered = sSpellMgr->GetSpellLinked(m_spellInfo->Id))
3759  {
3760  for (std::vector<int32>::const_iterator i = spell_triggered->begin(); i != spell_triggered->end(); ++i)
3761  if (*i < 0)
3762  m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(-(*i));
3763  else
3764  m_caster->CastSpell(m_targets.GetUnitTarget() ? m_targets.GetUnitTarget() : m_caster, *i, true);
3765  }
3766 
3767  // Interrupt Spell casting
3768  // handle this here, in other places SpellHitTarget can be set to nullptr, if there is an error in this function
3769  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR7_CAN_CAUSE_INTERRUPT))
3770  if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
3771  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
3772  m_caster->CastSpell(target, 32747, true);
3773 
3774  // xinef: start combat at cast for delayed spells, only for explicit target
3775  if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
3776  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || (m_caster->IsPet() && m_caster->IsControlledByPlayer()))
3777  if (GetDelayMoment() > 0 && !m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(target) && !m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_BIND_SIGHT) && (!m_spellInfo->IsPositive() || m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_DISPEL)))
3778  m_caster->CombatStartOnCast(target, !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS), GetDelayMoment() + 500); // xinef: increase this time so we dont leave and enter combat in a moment
3779 
3780  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3781  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_COOLDOWN))
3782  m_caster->ToPlayer()->RemoveSpellCooldown(m_spellInfo->Id, true);
3783 
3784  SetExecutedCurrently(false);
3785 }
3786 
3787 void Spell::handle_immediate()
3788 {
3789  // start channeling if applicable
3790  if (m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
3791  {
3792  int32 duration = m_spellInfo->GetDuration();
3793  if (duration > 0)
3794  {
3795  // First mod_duration then haste - see Missile Barrage
3796  // Apply duration mod
3797  if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
3798  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_DURATION, duration);
3799 
3800  // Apply haste mods
3801  if (m_caster->HasAuraTypeWithAffectMask(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HASTE, m_spellInfo) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_SPELL_HASTE_AFFECTS_PERIODIC))
3802  duration = int32(duration * m_caster->GetFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED));
3803 
3804  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_CASTING;
3805  m_caster->AddInterruptMask(m_spellInfo->ChannelInterruptFlags);
3806  m_channeledDuration = duration;
3807  SendChannelStart(duration);
3808  }
3809  else if (duration == -1)
3810  {
3811  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_CASTING;
3812  m_caster->AddInterruptMask(m_spellInfo->ChannelInterruptFlags);
3813  SendChannelStart(duration);
3814  }
3815  }
3816 
3817  PrepareTargetProcessing();
3818 
3819  // process immediate effects (items, ground, etc.) also initialize some variables
3820  _handle_immediate_phase();
3821 
3822  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3823  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&(*ihit));
3824 
3825  for (std::list<GOTargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3826  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&(*ihit));
3827 
3828  FinishTargetProcessing();
3829 
3830  // spell is finished, perform some last features of the spell here
3831  _handle_finish_phase();
3832 
3833  // Remove used for cast item if need (it can be already nullptr after TakeReagents call
3834  TakeCastItem();
3835 
3836  // handle ammo consumption for Hunter's volley spell
3837  if (m_spellInfo->IsRangedWeaponSpell() && m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
3838  TakeAmmo();
3839 
3840  if (m_spellState != SPELL_STATE_CASTING)
3841  finish(true); // successfully finish spell cast (not last in case autorepeat or channel spell)
3842 }
3843 
3844 uint64 Spell::handle_delayed(uint64 t_offset)
3845 {
3846  if (!UpdatePointers())
3847  {
3848  // finish the spell if UpdatePointers() returned false, something wrong happened there
3849  finish(false);
3850  return 0;
3851  }
3852 
3853  Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner();
3854  if (modOwner)
3855  modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, true);
3856 
3857  uint64 next_time = m_delayTrajectory;
3858 
3859  PrepareTargetProcessing();
3860 
3861  if (!m_immediateHandled && m_delayTrajectory <= t_offset)
3862  {
3863  _handle_immediate_phase();
3864  m_immediateHandled = true;
3865  m_delayTrajectory = 0;
3866  next_time = 0;
3867  }
3868 
3869  bool single_missile = (m_targets.HasDst());
3870 
3871  // now recheck units targeting correctness (need before any effects apply to prevent adding immunity at first effect not allow apply second spell effect and similar cases)
3872  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3873  {
3874  if (ihit->processed == false)
3875  {
3876  if (single_missile || ihit->timeDelay <= t_offset)
3877  {
3878  ihit->timeDelay = t_offset;
3879  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&(*ihit));
3880  }
3881  else if (next_time == 0 || ihit->timeDelay < next_time)
3882  next_time = ihit->timeDelay;
3883  }
3884  }
3885 
3886  // now recheck gameobject targeting correctness
3887  for (std::list<GOTargetInfo>::iterator ighit = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); ighit != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end(); ++ighit)
3888  {
3889  if (ighit->processed == false)
3890  {
3891  if (single_missile || ighit->timeDelay <= t_offset)
3892  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&(*ighit));
3893  else if (next_time == 0 || ighit->timeDelay < next_time)
3894  next_time = ighit->timeDelay;
3895  }
3896  }
3897 
3898  FinishTargetProcessing();
3899 
3900  if (modOwner)
3901  modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, false);
3902 
3903  // All targets passed - need finish phase
3904  if (next_time == 0)
3905  {
3906  // spell is finished, perform some last features of the spell here
3907  _handle_finish_phase();
3908 
3909  finish(true); // successfully finish spell cast
3910 
3911  // return zero, spell is finished now
3912  return 0;
3913  }
3914  else
3915  {
3916  // spell is unfinished, return next execution time
3917  return next_time;
3918  }
3919 }
3920 
3921 void Spell::_handle_immediate_phase()
3922 {
3923  m_spellAura = nullptr;
3924  // initialize Diminishing Returns Data
3925  m_diminishLevel = DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1;
3926  m_diminishGroup = DIMINISHING_NONE;
3927 
3928  // handle some immediate features of the spell here
3929  HandleThreatSpells();
3930 
3931  PrepareScriptHitHandlers();
3932 
3933  // handle effects with SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT mode
3934  for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
3935  {
3936  // don't do anything for empty effect
3937  if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[j].IsEffect())
3938  continue;
3939 
3940  // call effect handlers to handle destination hit
3941  HandleEffects(nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, j, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT);
3942  }
3943 
3944  // process items
3945  for (std::list<ItemTargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueItemInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueItemInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3946  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&(*ihit));
3947 }
3948 
3949 void Spell::_handle_finish_phase()
3950 {
3951  if (m_caster->m_movedByPlayer && m_needComboPoints)
3952  {
3953  // Take for real after all targets are processed
3954  m_caster->m_movedByPlayer->ToPlayer()->ClearComboPoints();
3955 
3956  // Real add combo points from effects
3957  if( m_targets.GetUnitTarget() && m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->IsInWorld() && m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->IsAlive() )
3958  m_caster->m_movedByPlayer->ToPlayer()->AddComboPoints(m_targets.GetUnitTarget(), m_caster->m_movedByPlayer->ToPlayer()->GetComboPointGain());
3959 
3960  m_caster->m_movedByPlayer->ToPlayer()->SetComboPointGain(0);
3961  }
3962 
3963  if (m_caster->m_extraAttacks && GetSpellInfo()->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_ADD_EXTRA_ATTACKS))
3964  m_caster->HandleProcExtraAttackFor(m_caster->GetVictim());
3965 
3966  if (!IsAutoRepeat() && !IsNextMeleeSwingSpell())
3967  if (m_caster->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself())
3968  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3969  {
3970  // Xinef: Properly clear infinite cooldowns in some cases
3971  if (ihit->targetGUID == m_caster->GetGUID() && ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
3972  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_spellInfo->IsCooldownStartedOnEvent())
3973  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SendCooldownEvent(m_spellInfo);
3974  }
3975 }
3976 
3977 void Spell::SendSpellCooldown()
3978 {
3979  // xinef: properly add creature cooldowns
3980  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3981  {
3982  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SPELL_AND_CATEGORY_CD))
3983  {
3984  // xinef: this should be added here
3985  //m_caster->AddSpellCooldown(m_spellInfo->Id, 0, 0);
3986 
3987  // xinef: this adds cooldowns to vehicle spells which misses them client-side (when we overwrote dbc info in eg.)
3988  if (m_spellInfo->RequireCooldownInfo())
3989  if (Player* player = m_caster->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself())
3990  {
3991  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_COOLDOWN, 8 + 1 + 4 + 4);
3992  data << m_caster->GetGUID();
3993  data << uint8(SPELL_COOLDOWN_FLAG_INCLUDE_GCD);
3994  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
3995  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->RecoveryTime);
3996  player->SendDirectMessage(&data);
3997  }
3998  }
3999  return;
4000  }
4001 
4002  Player* _player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
4003 
4004  // mana/health/etc potions, disabled by client (until combat out as declarate)
4005  if (m_CastItem && (m_CastItem->IsPotion() || m_spellInfo->IsCooldownStartedOnEvent()))
4006  {
4007  // need in some way provided data for Spell::finish SendCooldownEvent
4008  _player->SetLastPotionId(m_CastItem->GetEntry());
4009  return;
4010  }
4011 
4012  // have infinity cooldown but set at aura apply // do not set cooldown for triggered spells (needed by reincarnation)
4013  if (m_spellInfo->IsCooldownStartedOnEvent() || m_spellInfo->IsPassive() || ((_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SPELL_AND_CATEGORY_CD) && !m_CastItem))
4014  return;
4015 
4016  _player->AddSpellAndCategoryCooldowns(m_spellInfo, m_CastItem ? m_CastItem->GetEntry() : 0, this);
4017 }
4018 
4019 void Spell::update(uint32 difftime)
4020 {
4021  // update pointers based at it's GUIDs
4022  if (!UpdatePointers())
4023  {
4024  // cancel the spell if UpdatePointers() returned false, something wrong happened there
4025  cancel();
4026  return;
4027  }
4028 
4029  if (m_targets.GetUnitTargetGUID() && !m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
4030  {
4031  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell %u is cancelled due to removal of target.", m_spellInfo->Id);
4032  cancel();
4033  return;
4034  }
4035 
4036  // check if the player caster has moved before the spell finished
4037  // xinef: added preparing state (real cast, skip channels as they have other flags for this)
4038  if ((m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_timer != 0) &&
4039  m_caster->isMoving() && (m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_MOVEMENT) && m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_PREPARING &&
4040  (m_spellInfo->Effects[0].Effect != SPELL_EFFECT_STUCK || !m_caster->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING_FAR)))
4041  {
4042  // don't cancel for melee, autorepeat, triggered and instant spells
4043  if (!IsNextMeleeSwingSpell() && !IsAutoRepeat() && !IsTriggered())
4044  cancel(true);
4045  }
4046 
4047  switch (m_spellState)
4048  {
4049  case SPELL_STATE_PREPARING:
4050  {
4051  if (m_timer > 0)
4052  {
4053  if (difftime >= (uint32)m_timer)
4054  m_timer = 0;
4055  else
4056  m_timer -= difftime;
4057  }
4058 
4059  if (m_timer == 0 && !IsNextMeleeSwingSpell() && !IsAutoRepeat())
4060  // don't CheckCast for instant spells - done in spell::prepare, skip duplicate checks, needed for range checks for example
4061  cast(!m_casttime);
4062  break;
4063  }
4064  case SPELL_STATE_CASTING:
4065  {
4066  if (m_timer)
4067  {
4068  if (m_timer > 0)
4069  {
4070  if (difftime >= (uint32)m_timer)
4071  m_timer = 0;
4072  else
4073  m_timer -= difftime;
4074  }
4075  }
4076 
4077  if (m_timer == 0)
4078  {
4079  SendChannelUpdate(0);
4080 
4081  finish();
4082  }
4083  // Xinef: Dont update channeled target list on last tick, allow auras to update duration properly
4084  // Xinef: Added this strange check because of diffrent update routines for players / creatures
4085  // Xinef: If creature gets new aura in 800ms and in 840ms its updated with diff 270, not 40 is removed from duration but 270
4086  // Xinef: so the aura can be removed in different updates for all units
4087  else if ((m_timer < 0 || m_timer > 300) && !UpdateChanneledTargetList())
4088  {
4089  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Channeled spell %d is removed due to lack of targets", m_spellInfo->Id);
4090  SendChannelUpdate(0);
4091  finish();
4092  }
4093  break;
4094  }
4095  default:
4096  break;
4097  }
4098 }
4099 
4100 void Spell::finish(bool ok)
4101 {
4102  if (!m_caster)
4103  return;
4104 
4105  if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
4106  return;
4107  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_FINISHED;
4108 
4109  if (m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
4110  m_caster->UpdateInterruptMask();
4111 
4112  if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING) && !m_caster->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false, false, true))
4113  m_caster->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING);
4114 
4115  // Unsummon summon as possessed creatures on spell cancel
4116  if (m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4117  {
4118  if (Unit* charm = m_caster->GetCharm())
4119  if (charm->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT
4120  && charm->ToCreature()->HasUnitTypeMask(UNIT_MASK_PUPPET)
4121  && charm->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_CREATED_BY_SPELL) == m_spellInfo->Id)
4122  ((Puppet*)charm)->UnSummon();
4123  }
4124 
4125  if (Creature* creatureCaster = m_caster->ToCreature())
4126  creatureCaster->ReleaseFocus(this);
4127 
4128  if (!ok)
4129  {
4130  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4131  {
4132  // Xinef: Restore spell mods in case of fail cast
4133  m_caster->ToPlayer()->RestoreSpellMods(this);
4134 
4135  // Xinef: Reset cooldown event in case of fail cast
4136  if (m_spellInfo->IsCooldownStartedOnEvent())
4137  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SendCooldownEvent(m_spellInfo, 0, 0, false);
4138  }
4139  return;
4140  }
4141 
4142  // pussywizard:
4143  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_ENCOUNTER_REWARD) && m_caster->FindMap())
4144  m_caster->FindMap()->UpdateEncounterState(ENCOUNTER_CREDIT_CAST_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster);
4145 
4146  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->ToCreature()->IsSummon())
4147  {
4148  // Unsummon statue
4149  uint32 spell = m_caster->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_CREATED_BY_SPELL);
4150  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spell);
4151  if (spellInfo && spellInfo->SpellIconID == 2056)
4152  {
4153  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Statue %s is unsummoned in spell %d finish", m_caster->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), m_spellInfo->Id);
4154  m_caster->setDeathState(JUST_DIED);
4155  return;
4156  }
4157  }
4158 
4159  if (IsAutoActionResetSpell())
4160  {
4161  bool found = false;
4162  Unit::AuraEffectList const& vIgnoreReset = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_MELEE_RESET);
4163  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = vIgnoreReset.begin(); i != vIgnoreReset.end(); ++i)
4164  {
4165  if ((*i)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
4166  {
4167  found = true;
4168  break;
4169  }
4170  }
4171  if (!found && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_DO_NOT_RESET_COMBAT_TIMERS))
4172  {
4173  bool allow = true;
4174  if (m_casttime == 0 && m_spellInfo->CalcCastTime())
4175  allow = false;
4176 
4177  if (allow)
4178  {
4179  m_caster->resetAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK);
4180  if (m_caster->haveOffhandWeapon())
4181  m_caster->resetAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK);
4182  m_caster->resetAttackTimer(RANGED_ATTACK);
4183  }
4184  }
4185  }
4186 
4187  // potions disabled by client, send event "not in combat" if need
4188  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
4189  m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdatePotionCooldown(this);
4190 
4191  // Take mods after trigger spell (needed for 14177 to affect 48664)
4192  // mods are taken only on succesfull cast and independantly from targets of the spell
4193  if (Player* player = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
4194  player->RemoveSpellMods(this);
4195 
4196  // xinef: clear reactive auras states after spell cast
4197  if (m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState == AURA_STATE_DEFENSE || m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState == AURA_STATE_HUNTER_PARRY)
4198  m_caster->ModifyAuraState(AuraStateType(m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState), false);
4199 
4200  // Stop Attack for some spells
4201  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CANCELS_AUTO_ATTACK_COMBAT))
4202  m_caster->AttackStop();
4203 }
4204 
4205 void Spell::WriteCastResultInfo(WorldPacket& data, Player* caster, SpellInfo const* spellInfo, uint8 castCount, SpellCastResult result, SpellCustomErrors customError)
4206 {
4207  data << uint8(castCount); // single cast or multi 2.3 (0/1)
4208  data << uint32(spellInfo->Id);
4209  data << uint8(result); // problem
4210  switch (result)
4211  {
4212  case SPELL_FAILED_REQUIRES_SPELL_FOCUS:
4213  data << uint32(spellInfo->RequiresSpellFocus); // SpellFocusObject.dbc id
4214  break;
4215  case SPELL_FAILED_REQUIRES_AREA: // AreaTable.dbc id
4216  // hardcode areas limitation case
4217  switch (spellInfo->Id)
4218  {
4219  case 41617: // Cenarion Mana Salve
4220  case 41619: // Cenarion Healing Salve
4221  data << uint32(3905);
4222  break;
4223  case 41618: // Bottled Nethergon Energy
4224  case 41620: // Bottled Nethergon Vapor
4225  data << uint32(3842);
4226  break;
4227  case 45373: // Bloodberry Elixir
4228  data << uint32(4075);
4229  break;
4230  default: // default case (don't must be)
4231  data << uint32(0);
4232  break;
4233  }
4234  break;
4235  case SPELL_FAILED_TOTEMS:
4236  if (spellInfo->Totem[0])
4237  data << uint32(spellInfo->Totem[0]);
4238  if (spellInfo->Totem[1])
4239  data << uint32(spellInfo->Totem[1]);
4240  break;
4241  case SPELL_FAILED_TOTEM_CATEGORY:
4242  if (spellInfo->TotemCategory[0])
4243  data << uint32(spellInfo->TotemCategory[0]);
4244  if (spellInfo->TotemCategory[1])
4245  data << uint32(spellInfo->TotemCategory[1]);
4246  break;
4247  case SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS:
4248  case SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_MAINHAND:
4249  case SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_OFFHAND:
4250  data << uint32(spellInfo->EquippedItemClass);
4251  data << uint32(spellInfo->EquippedItemSubClassMask);
4252  break;
4253  case SPELL_FAILED_TOO_MANY_OF_ITEM:
4254  {
4255  uint32 item = 0;
4256  for (int8 eff = 0; eff < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; eff++)
4257  if (spellInfo->Effects[eff].ItemType)
4258  item = spellInfo->Effects[eff].ItemType;
4259  ItemTemplate const* proto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(item);
4260  if (proto && proto->ItemLimitCategory)
4261  data << uint32(proto->ItemLimitCategory);
4262  break;
4263  }
4264  case SPELL_FAILED_CUSTOM_ERROR:
4265  data << uint32(customError);
4266  break;
4267  case SPELL_FAILED_REAGENTS:
4268  {
4269  uint32 missingItem = 0;
4270  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_REAGENTS; i++)
4271  {
4272  if (spellInfo->Reagent[i] <= 0)
4273  continue;
4274 
4275  uint32 itemid = spellInfo->Reagent[i];
4276  uint32 itemcount = spellInfo->ReagentCount[i];
4277 
4278  if (!caster->HasItemCount(itemid, itemcount))
4279  {
4280  missingItem = itemid;
4281  break;
4282  }
4283  }
4284 
4285  data << uint32(missingItem); // first missing item
4286  break;
4287  }
4288  case SPELL_FAILED_PREVENTED_BY_MECHANIC:
4289  data << uint32(spellInfo->Mechanic);
4290  break;
4291  case SPELL_FAILED_NEED_EXOTIC_AMMO:
4292  data << uint32(spellInfo->EquippedItemSubClassMask);
4293  break;
4294  case SPELL_FAILED_NEED_MORE_ITEMS:
4295  data << uint32(0); // Item entry
4296  data << uint32(0); // Count
4297  break;
4298  case SPELL_FAILED_MIN_SKILL:
4299  data << uint32(0); // SkillLine.dbc Id
4300  data << uint32(0); // Amount
4301  break;
4302  case SPELL_FAILED_FISHING_TOO_LOW:
4303  data << uint32(0); // Skill level
4304  break;
4305  default:
4306  break;
4307  }
4308 }
4309 
4310 void Spell::SendCastResult(Player* caster, SpellInfo const* spellInfo, uint8 castCount, SpellCastResult result, SpellCustomErrors customError /*= SPELL_CUSTOM_ERROR_NONE*/)
4311 {
4312  if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK)
4313  return;
4314 
4315  WorldPacket data(SMSG_CAST_FAILED, 1 + 4 + 1);
4316  WriteCastResultInfo(data, caster, spellInfo, castCount, result, customError);
4317 
4318  caster->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
4319 }
4320 
4321 void Spell::SendCastResult(SpellCastResult result)
4322 {
4323  if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK)
4324  return;
4325 
4326  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || m_caster->IsCharmed())
4327  return;
4328 
4329  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->PlayerLoading()) // don't send cast results at loading time
4330  return;
4331 
4332  // Xinef: override every possible result, except for gm fail result... breaks many things and goes unnoticed because of this and makes me rage when i find this out
4333  if ((_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_DONT_REPORT_CAST_ERROR) && result != SPELL_FAILED_BM_OR_INVISGOD)
4334  result = SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
4335 
4336  SendCastResult(m_caster->ToPlayer(), m_spellInfo, m_cast_count, result, m_customError);
4337 }
4338 
4339 void Spell::SendPetCastResult(SpellCastResult result)
4340 {
4341  if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK)
4342  return;
4343 
4344  Unit* owner = m_caster->GetCharmerOrOwner();
4345  if (!owner)
4346  return;
4347 
4348  Player* player = owner->ToPlayer();
4349  if (!player)
4350  return;
4351 
4352  WorldPacket data(SMSG_PET_CAST_FAILED, 1 + 4 + 1);
4353  WriteCastResultInfo(data, player, m_spellInfo, m_cast_count, result, m_customError);
4354 
4355  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
4356 }
4357 
4358 void Spell::SendSpellStart()
4359 {
4360  if (!IsNeedSendToClient(false))
4361  return;
4362 
4363  //LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Sending SMSG_SPELL_START id=%u", m_spellInfo->Id);
4364 
4365  uint32 castFlags = CAST_FLAG_HAS_TRAJECTORY;
4366 
4367  if (((IsTriggered() && !m_spellInfo->IsAutoRepeatRangedSpell()) || m_triggeredByAuraSpell) && !m_cast_count && !m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
4368  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PENDING;
4369 
4370  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_USES_RANGED_SLOT) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_NEEDS_AMMO_DATA))
4371  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PROJECTILE;
4372  if ((m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ||
4373  (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->IsPet()))
4374  && m_spellInfo->PowerType != POWER_HEALTH)
4375  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_POWER_LEFT_SELF;
4376 
4377  if (m_spellInfo->RuneCostID && m_spellInfo->PowerType == POWER_RUNE)
4378  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_NO_GCD; // not needed, but Blizzard sends it
4379 
4380  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_START, (8 + 8 + 4 + 4 + 2));
4381  if (m_CastItem)
4382  data << m_CastItem->GetPackGUID();
4383  else
4384  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4385 
4386  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4387  data << uint8(m_cast_count); // pending spell cast?
4388  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // spellId
4389  data << uint32(castFlags); // cast flags
4390  data << int32(m_timer); // delay?
4391 
4392  m_targets.Write(data);
4393 
4394  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_POWER_LEFT_SELF)
4395  data << uint32(m_caster->GetPower((Powers)m_spellInfo->PowerType));
4396 
4397  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_PROJECTILE)
4398  WriteAmmoToPacket(&data);
4399 
4400  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_UNKNOWN_23)
4401  {
4402  data << uint32(0);
4403  data << uint32(0);
4404  }
4405 
4406  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
4407 
4408  if (!m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->ToPlayer()->NeedSendSpectatorData())
4409  ArenaSpectator::SendCommand_Spell(m_caster->FindMap(), m_caster->GetGUID(), "SPE", m_spellInfo->Id, m_timer);
4410 }
4411 
4412 void Spell::SendSpellGo()
4413 {
4414  // not send invisible spell casting
4415  if (!IsNeedSendToClient(true))
4416  return;
4417
