4418  //LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Sending SMSG_SPELL_GO id=%u", m_spellInfo->Id);
4419 
4420  uint32 castFlags = CAST_FLAG_UNKNOWN_9;
4421 
4422  // triggered spells with spell visual != 0
4423  if (((IsTriggered() && !m_spellInfo->IsAutoRepeatRangedSpell()) || m_triggeredByAuraSpell) && !m_cast_count && !m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
4424  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PENDING;
4425 
4426  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_USES_RANGED_SLOT) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_NEEDS_AMMO_DATA))
4427  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PROJECTILE; // arrows/bullets visual
4428 
4429  if ((m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ||
4430  (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->IsPet()))
4431  && m_spellInfo->PowerType != POWER_HEALTH)
4432  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_POWER_LEFT_SELF; // should only be sent to self, but the current messaging doesn't make that possible
4433 
4434  if ((m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4435  && (m_caster->getClass() == CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
4436  && m_spellInfo->RuneCostID
4437  && m_spellInfo->PowerType == POWER_RUNE)
4438  {
4439  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_NO_GCD; // not needed, but Blizzard sends it
4440  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_RUNE_LIST; // rune cooldowns list
4441  }
4442 
4443  if (m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_ACTIVATE_RUNE))
4444  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_RUNE_LIST; // rune cooldowns list
4445 
4446  if (m_targets.HasTraj())
4447  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_ADJUST_MISSILE;
4448 
4449  if (!m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime)
4450  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_NO_GCD;
4451 
4452  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_GO, 150); // guess size
4453 
4454  if (m_CastItem)
4455  data << m_CastItem->GetPackGUID();
4456  else
4457  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4458 
4459  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4460  data << uint8(m_cast_count); // pending spell cast?
4461  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // spellId
4462  data << uint32(castFlags); // cast flags
4463  data << uint32(World::GetGameTimeMS()); // timestamp
4464 
4465  WriteSpellGoTargets(&data);
4466 
4467  m_targets.Write(data);
4468 
4469  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_POWER_LEFT_SELF)
4470  data << uint32(m_caster->GetPower((Powers)m_spellInfo->PowerType));
4471 
4472  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_RUNE_LIST) // rune cooldowns list
4473  {
4474  //TODO: There is a crash caused by a spell with CAST_FLAG_RUNE_LIST casted by a creature
4475  //The creature is the mover of a player, so HandleCastSpellOpcode uses it as the caster
4476  if (Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer())
4477  {
4478  uint8 runeMaskInitial = m_runesState;
4479  uint8 runeMaskAfterCast = player->GetRunesState();
4480  data << uint8(runeMaskInitial); // runes state before
4481  data << uint8(runeMaskAfterCast); // runes state after
4482  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
4483  {
4484  uint8 mask = (1 << i);
4485  if (mask & runeMaskInitial && !(mask & runeMaskAfterCast)) // usable before andon cooldown now...
4486  {
4487  // float casts ensure the division is performed on floats as we need float result
4488  float baseCd = float(player->GetRuneBaseCooldown(i, true));
4489  data << uint8((baseCd - float(player->GetRuneCooldown(i))) / baseCd * 255); // rune cooldown passed
4490  }
4491  }
4492  }
4493  }
4494  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_ADJUST_MISSILE)
4495  {
4496  data << m_targets.GetElevation();
4497  data << uint32(m_delayTrajectory ? m_delayTrajectory : m_delayMoment);
4498  }
4499 
4500  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_PROJECTILE)
4501  WriteAmmoToPacket(&data);
4502 
4503  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_VISUAL_CHAIN)
4504  {
4505  data << uint32(0);
4506  data << uint32(0);
4507  }
4508 
4509  if (m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
4510  {
4511  data << uint8(0);
4512  }
4513 
4514  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
4515 }
4516 
4517 void Spell::WriteAmmoToPacket(WorldPacket* data)
4518 {
4519  uint32 ammoInventoryType = 0;
4520  uint32 ammoDisplayID = 0;
4521 
4522  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4523  {
4524  Item* pItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(RANGED_ATTACK);
4525  if (pItem)
4526  {
4527  ammoInventoryType = pItem->GetTemplate()->InventoryType;
4528  if (ammoInventoryType == INVTYPE_THROWN)
4529  ammoDisplayID = pItem->GetTemplate()->DisplayInfoID;
4530  else
4531  {
4532  uint32 ammoID = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_AMMO_ID);
4533  if (ammoID)
4534  {
4535  ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(ammoID);
4536  if (pProto)
4537  {
4538  ammoDisplayID = pProto->DisplayInfoID;
4539  ammoInventoryType = pProto->InventoryType;
4540  }
4541  }
4542  else if (m_caster->HasAura(46699)) // Requires No Ammo
4543  {
4544  ammoDisplayID = 5996; // normal arrow
4545  ammoInventoryType = INVTYPE_AMMO;
4546  }
4547  }
4548  }
4549  }
4550  else
4551  {
4552  uint32 nonRangedAmmoDisplayID = 0;
4553  uint32 nonRangedAmmoInventoryType = 0;
4554  for (uint8 i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
4555  {
4556  if (uint32 item_id = m_caster->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_ID + i))
4557  {
4558  if (ItemTemplate const* itemEntry = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(item_id))
4559  {
4560  if (itemEntry->Class == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON)
4561  {
4562  switch (itemEntry->SubClass)
4563  {
4564  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_THROWN:
4565  ammoDisplayID = itemEntry->DisplayInfoID;
4566  ammoInventoryType = itemEntry->InventoryType;
4567  break;
4568  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_BOW:
4569  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_CROSSBOW:
4570  ammoDisplayID = 5996; // is this need fixing?
4571  ammoInventoryType = INVTYPE_AMMO;
4572  break;
4573  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_GUN:
4574  ammoDisplayID = 5998; // is this need fixing?
4575  ammoInventoryType = INVTYPE_AMMO;
4576  break;
4577  default:
4578  nonRangedAmmoDisplayID = itemEntry->DisplayInfoID;
4579  nonRangedAmmoInventoryType = itemEntry->InventoryType;
4580  break;
4581  }
4582 
4583  if (ammoDisplayID)
4584  break;
4585  }
4586  }
4587  }
4588  }
4589 
4590  if (!ammoDisplayID && !ammoInventoryType)
4591  {
4592  ammoDisplayID = nonRangedAmmoDisplayID;
4593  ammoInventoryType = nonRangedAmmoInventoryType;
4594  }
4595  }
4596 
4597  *data << uint32(ammoDisplayID);
4598  *data << uint32(ammoInventoryType);
4599 }
4600 
4602 void Spell::WriteSpellGoTargets(WorldPacket* data)
4603 {
4604  // This function also fill data for channeled spells:
4605  // m_needAliveTargetMask req for stop channelig if one target die
4606  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4607  {
4608  if ((*ihit).effectMask == 0) // No effect apply - all immuned add state
4609  // possibly SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE2 for this??
4610  ihit->missCondition = SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE2;
4611  }
4612 
4613  // Hit and miss target counts are both uint8, that limits us to 255 targets for each
4614  // sending more than 255 targets crashes the client (since count sent would be wrong)
4615  // Spells like 40647 (with a huge radius) can easily reach this limit (spell might need
4616  // target conditions but we still need to limit the number of targets sent and keeping
4617  // correct count for both hit and miss).
4618 
4619  uint32 hit = 0;
4620  size_t hitPos = data->wpos();
4621  *data << (uint8)0; // placeholder
4622  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end() && hit < 255; ++ihit)
4623  {
4624  if ((*ihit).missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE) // Add only hits
4625  {
4626  *data << ihit->targetGUID;
4627  // Xinef: WTF is this? No channeled spell checked, no anything
4628  //m_channelTargetEffectMask |=ihit->effectMask;
4629  ++hit;
4630  }
4631  }
4632 
4633  for (std::list<GOTargetInfo>::const_iterator ighit = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); ighit != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end() && hit < 255; ++ighit)
4634  {
4635  *data << ighit->targetGUID; // Always hits
4636  ++hit;
4637  }
4638 
4639  uint32 miss = 0;
4640  size_t missPos = data->wpos();
4641  *data << (uint8)0; // placeholder
4642  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end() && miss < 255; ++ihit)
4643  {
4644  if (ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE) // Add only miss
4645  {
4646  *data << ihit->targetGUID;
4647  *data << uint8(ihit->missCondition);
4648  if (ihit->missCondition == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
4649  *data << uint8(ihit->reflectResult);
4650  ++miss;
4651  }
4652  }
4653  // Reset m_needAliveTargetMask for non channeled spell
4654  // Xinef: Why do we reset something that is not set??????
4655  //if (!m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
4656  // m_channelTargetEffectMask = 0;
4657 
4658  data->put<uint8>(hitPos, (uint8)hit);
4659  data->put<uint8>(missPos, (uint8)miss);
4660 }
4661 
4662 void Spell::SendLogExecute()
4663 {
4664  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELLLOGEXECUTE, (8 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 8));
4665 
4666  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4667 
4668  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
4669 
4670  uint8 effCount = 0;
4671  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
4672  {
4673  if (m_effectExecuteData[i])
4674  ++effCount;
4675  }
4676 
4677  if (!effCount)
4678  return;
4679 
4680  data << uint32(effCount);
4681  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
4682  {
4683  if (!m_effectExecuteData[i])
4684  continue;
4685 
4686  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect); // spell effect
4687 
4688  data.append(*m_effectExecuteData[i]);
4689 
4690  delete m_effectExecuteData[i];
4691  m_effectExecuteData[i] = nullptr;
4692  }
4693  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
4694 }
4695 
4696 void Spell::ExecuteLogEffectTakeTargetPower(uint8 effIndex, Unit* target, uint32 PowerType, uint32 powerTaken, float gainMultiplier)
4697 {
4698  InitEffectExecuteData(effIndex);
4699  *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << target->GetPackGUID();
4700  *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << uint32(powerTaken);
4701  *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << uint32(PowerType);
4702  *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << float(gainMultiplier);
4703 }
4704

4709  *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << uint32(attCount);
4710 }

4762 
4763 void Spell::SendInterrupted(uint8 result)
4764 {
4765  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_FAILURE, (8 + 1 + 4 + 1));
4766  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4767  data << uint8(m_cast_count);
4768  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
4769  data << uint8(result);
4770  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
4771 
4772  data.Initialize(SMSG_SPELL_FAILED_OTHER, (8 + 1 + 4 + 1));
4773  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4774  data << uint8(m_cast_count);
4775  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
4776  data << uint8(result);
4777  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
4778 }
4779 
4780 void Spell::SendChannelUpdate(uint32 time)
4781 {
4782  if (time == 0)
4783  {
4784  m_caster->SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_CHANNEL_OBJECT, ObjectGuid::Empty);
4785  m_caster->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_CHANNEL_SPELL, 0);
4786  }
4787 
4788  WorldPacket data(MSG_CHANNEL_UPDATE, 8 + 4);
4789  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4790  data << uint32(time);
4791 
4792  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
4793 }
4794 
4795 void Spell::SendChannelStart(uint32 duration)
4796 {
4797  ObjectGuid channelTarget = m_targets.GetObjectTargetGUID();
4798  if (!channelTarget && !m_spellInfo->NeedsExplicitUnitTarget())
4799  if (m_UniqueTargetInfo.size() + m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.size() == 1) // this is for TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_NEARBY
4800  channelTarget = !m_UniqueTargetInfo.empty() ? m_UniqueTargetInfo.front().targetGUID : m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.front().targetGUID;
4801 
4802  WorldPacket data(MSG_CHANNEL_START, (8 + 4 + 4));
4803  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4804  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
4805  data << uint32(duration);
4806 
4807  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
4808 
4809  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->ToPlayer()->NeedSendSpectatorData())
4810  ArenaSpectator::SendCommand_Spell(m_caster->FindMap(), m_caster->GetGUID(), "SPE", m_spellInfo->Id, -((int32)duration));
4811 
4812  m_timer = duration;
4813  if (channelTarget)
4814  m_caster->SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_CHANNEL_OBJECT, channelTarget);
4815 
4816  m_caster->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_CHANNEL_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id);
4817 }
4818 
4819 void Spell::SendResurrectRequest(Player* target)
4820 {
4821  // get resurrector name for creature resurrections, otherwise packet will be not accepted
4822  // for player resurrections the name is looked up by guid
4823  std::string const sentName(m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER
4824  ? ""
4825  : m_caster->GetNameForLocaleIdx(target->GetSession()->GetSessionDbLocaleIndex()));
4826 
4827  WorldPacket data(SMSG_RESURRECT_REQUEST, (8 + 4 + sentName.size() + 1 + 1 + 1 + 4));
4828  data << m_caster->GetGUID();
4829  data << uint32(sentName.size() + 1);
4830 
4831  data << sentName;
4832  data << uint8(0); // null terminator
4833 
4834  data << uint8(m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? 0 : 1); // "you'll be afflicted with resurrection sickness"
4835  // override delay sent with SMSG_CORPSE_RECLAIM_DELAY, set instant resurrection for spells with this attribute
4836  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_NO_RES_TIMER))
4837  data << uint32(0);
4838  target->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
4839 }
4840 
4841 void Spell::TakeCastItem()
4842 {
4843  if (!m_CastItem || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4844  return;
4845 
4846  // not remove cast item at triggered spell (equipping, weapon damage, etc)
4847  if (_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CAST_ITEM)
4848  return;
4849 
4850  ItemTemplate const* proto = m_CastItem->GetTemplate();
4851 
4852  if (!proto)
4853  {
4854  // This code is to avoid a crash
4855  // I'm not sure, if this is really an error, but I guess every item needs a prototype
4856  LOG_ERROR("spells", "Cast item has no item prototype %s", m_CastItem->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
4857  return;
4858  }
4859 
4860  bool expendable = false;
4861  bool withoutCharges = false;
4862 
4863  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++i)
4864  {
4865  if (proto->Spells[i].SpellId)
4866  {
4867  // item has limited charges
4868  if (proto->Spells[i].SpellCharges)
4869  {
4870  if (proto->Spells[i].SpellCharges < 0)
4871  expendable = true;
4872 
4873  int32 charges = m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(i);
4874 
4875  // item has charges left
4876  if (charges)
4877  {
4878  (charges > 0) ? --charges : ++charges; // abs(charges) less at 1 after use
4879  if (proto->Stackable == 1)
4880  m_CastItem->SetSpellCharges(i, charges);
4881  m_CastItem->SetState(ITEM_CHANGED, m_caster->ToPlayer());
4882  }
4883 
4884  // all charges used
4885  withoutCharges = (charges == 0);
4886  }
4887  }
4888  }
4889 
4890  if (expendable && withoutCharges)
4891  {
4892  uint32 count = 1;
4893  m_caster->ToPlayer()->DestroyItemCount(m_CastItem, count, true);
4894 
4895  // prevent crash at access to deleted m_targets.GetItemTarget
4896  if (m_CastItem == m_targets.GetItemTarget())
4897  m_targets.SetItemTarget(nullptr);
4898 
4899  m_CastItem = nullptr;
4900  m_castItemGUID.Clear();
4901  }
4902 }
4903 
4904 void Spell::TakePower()
4905 {
4906  if (m_CastItem || m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
4907  return;
4908 
4909  //Don't take power if the spell is cast while .cheat power is enabled.
4910  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4911  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_POWER))
4912  return;
4913 
4914  Powers PowerType = Powers(m_spellInfo->PowerType);
4915  bool hit = true;
4916  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4917  {
4918  if (PowerType == POWER_RAGE || PowerType == POWER_ENERGY || PowerType == POWER_RUNE || PowerType == POWER_RUNIC_POWER)
4919  if (ObjectGuid targetGUID = m_targets.GetUnitTargetGUID())
4920  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4921  if (ihit->targetGUID == targetGUID)
4922  {
4923  if (ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE && ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_BLOCK && ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_ABSORB && ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
4924  {
4925  hit = false;
4926  //lower spell cost on fail (by talent aura)
4927  if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSpellModOwner())
4928  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_SPELL_COST_REFUND_ON_FAIL, m_powerCost, this);
4929  }
4930  break;
4931  }
4932  }
4933 
4934  if (PowerType == POWER_RUNE)
4935  {
4936  TakeRunePower(hit);
4937  return;
4938  }
4939 
4940  if (!m_powerCost)
4941  return;
4942 
4943  // health as power used
4944  if (PowerType == POWER_HEALTH)
4945  {
4946  m_caster->ModifyHealth(-(int32)m_powerCost);
4947  return;
4948  }
4949 
4950  if (PowerType >= MAX_POWERS)
4951  {
4952  LOG_ERROR("spells", "Spell::TakePower: Unknown power type '%d'", PowerType);
4953  return;
4954  }
4955 
4956  if (hit)
4957  m_caster->ModifyPower(PowerType, -m_powerCost);
4958  else
4959  m_caster->ModifyPower(PowerType, -irand(0, m_powerCost / 4));
4960 
4961  // Set the five second timer
4962  if (PowerType == POWER_MANA && m_powerCost > 0)
4963  m_caster->SetLastManaUse(World::GetGameTimeMS());
4964 }
4965 
4966 void Spell::TakeAmmo()
4967 {
4968  if (m_attackType == RANGED_ATTACK && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4969  {
4970  Item* pItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(RANGED_ATTACK);
4971 
4972  // wands don't have ammo
4973  if (!pItem || pItem->IsBroken() || pItem->GetTemplate()->SubClass == ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_WAND)
4974  return;
4975 
4976  if (pItem->GetTemplate()->InventoryType == INVTYPE_THROWN)
4977  {
4978  if (pItem->GetMaxStackCount() == 1)
4979  {
4980  // decrease durability for non-stackable throw weapon
4981  m_caster->ToPlayer()->DurabilityPointLossForEquipSlot(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED);
4982  }
4983  else
4984  {
4985  // decrease items amount for stackable throw weapon
4986  uint32 count = 1;
4987  m_caster->ToPlayer()->DestroyItemCount(pItem, count, true);
4988  }
4989  }
4990  else if (uint32 ammo = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_AMMO_ID))
4991  m_caster->ToPlayer()->DestroyItemCount(ammo, 1, true);
4992  }
4993 }
4994 
4995 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckRuneCost(uint32 RuneCostID)
4996 {
4997  if (m_spellInfo->PowerType != POWER_RUNE || !RuneCostID)
4998  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
4999 
5000  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5001  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5002 
5003  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5004  //If we are in .cheat power mode we dont need to check the cost as we are expected to be able to use it anyways (infinite power)
5005  if (player->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_POWER))
5006  {
5007  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5008  }
5009 
5010  if (player->getClass() != CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
5011  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5012 
5013  SpellRuneCostEntry const* src = sSpellRuneCostStore.LookupEntry(RuneCostID);
5014 
5015  if (!src)
5016  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5017 
5018  if (src->NoRuneCost())
5019  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5020 
5021  int32 runeCost[NUM_RUNE_TYPES]; // blood, frost, unholy, death
5022 
5023  for (uint32 i = 0; i < RUNE_DEATH; ++i)
5024  {
5025  runeCost[i] = src->RuneCost[i];
5026  if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
5027  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COST, runeCost[i], this);
5028  }
5029 
5030  runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] = MAX_RUNES; // calculated later
5031 
5032  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
5033  {
5034  RuneType rune = player->GetCurrentRune(i);
5035  if ((player->GetRuneCooldown(i) == 0) && (runeCost[rune] > 0))
5036  runeCost[rune]--;
5037  }
5038 
5039  for (uint32 i = 0; i < RUNE_DEATH; ++i)
5040  if (runeCost[i] > 0)
5041  runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] += runeCost[i];
5042 
5043  if (runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] > MAX_RUNES)
5044  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_POWER; // not sure if result code is correct
5045 
5046  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5047 }
5048 
5049 void Spell::TakeRunePower(bool didHit)
5050 {
5051  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || m_caster->getClass() != CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
5052  return;
5053 
5054  SpellRuneCostEntry const* runeCostData = sSpellRuneCostStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->RuneCostID);
5055  if (!runeCostData || (runeCostData->NoRuneCost() && runeCostData->NoRunicPowerGain()))
5056  return;
5057 
5058  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5059  m_runesState = player->GetRunesState(); // store previous state
5060 
5061  int32 runeCost[NUM_RUNE_TYPES]; // blood, frost, unholy, death
5062 
5063  for (uint32 i = 0; i < RUNE_DEATH; ++i)
5064  {
5065  runeCost[i] = runeCostData->RuneCost[i];
5066  if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
5067  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COST, runeCost[i], this);
5068  }
5069 
5070  runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] = 0; // calculated later
5071 
5072  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
5073  {
5074  RuneType rune = player->GetCurrentRune(i);
5075  if (!player->GetRuneCooldown(i) && runeCost[rune] > 0)
5076  {
5077  player->SetRuneCooldown(i, didHit ? player->GetRuneBaseCooldown(i, false) : uint32(RUNE_MISS_COOLDOWN));
5078  player->SetLastUsedRune(rune);
5079  runeCost[rune]--;
5080  }
5081  }
5082 
5083  // Xinef: firstly consume death runes of base type
5084  // Xinef: in second loop consume all available
5085  for (uint8 loop = 0; loop < 2; ++loop)
5086  {
5087  runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] = runeCost[RUNE_BLOOD] + runeCost[RUNE_UNHOLY] + runeCost[RUNE_FROST];
5088  if (runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] > 0)
5089  {
5090  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
5091  {
5092  RuneType rune = player->GetCurrentRune(i);
5093  if (!player->GetRuneCooldown(i) && rune == RUNE_DEATH && (loop ? true : (runeCost[player->GetBaseRune(i)] > 0)))
5094  {
5095  player->SetRuneCooldown(i, didHit ? player->GetRuneBaseCooldown(i, false) : uint32(RUNE_MISS_COOLDOWN));
5096  player->SetLastUsedRune(rune);
5097  runeCost[rune]--;
5098  if (!loop)
5099  runeCost[player->GetBaseRune(i)]--;
5100 
5101  // keep Death Rune type if missed
5102  if (didHit)
5103  player->RestoreBaseRune(i);
5104 
5105  if (runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] == 0)
5106  break;
5107  }
5108  }
5109  }
5110  }
5111 
5112  // you can gain some runic power when use runes
5113  if (didHit)
5114  if (int32 rp = int32(runeCostData->runePowerGain * sWorld->getRate(RATE_POWER_RUNICPOWER_INCOME)))
5115  player->ModifyPower(POWER_RUNIC_POWER, int32(rp));
5116 }
5117 
5118 void Spell::TakeReagents()
5119 {
5120  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5121  return;
5122 
5123  ItemTemplate const* castItemTemplate = m_CastItem ? m_CastItem->GetTemplate() : nullptr;
5124 
5125  // do not take reagents for these item casts
5126  if (castItemTemplate && castItemTemplate->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_NO_REAGENT_COST)
5127  return;
5128 
5129  Player* p_caster = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5130  if (p_caster->CanNoReagentCast(m_spellInfo))
5131  return;
5132 
5133  for (uint32 x = 0; x < MAX_SPELL_REAGENTS; ++x)
5134  {
5135  if (m_spellInfo->Reagent[x] <= 0)
5136  continue;
5137 
5138  uint32 itemid = m_spellInfo->Reagent[x];
5139  uint32 itemcount = m_spellInfo->ReagentCount[x];
5140 
5141  // if CastItem is also spell reagent
5142  if (castItemTemplate && castItemTemplate->ItemId == itemid)
5143  {
5144  for (int s = 0; s < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++s)
5145  {
5146  // CastItem will be used up and does not count as reagent
5147  int32 charges = m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(s);
5148  if (castItemTemplate->Spells[s].SpellCharges < 0 && abs(charges) < 2)
5149  {
5150  ++itemcount;
5151  break;
5152  }
5153  }
5154 
5155  m_CastItem = nullptr;
5156  m_castItemGUID.Clear();
5157  }
5158 
5159  // if GetItemTarget is also spell reagent
5160  if (m_targets.GetItemTargetEntry() == itemid)
5161  m_targets.SetItemTarget(nullptr);
5162 
5163  p_caster->DestroyItemCount(itemid, itemcount, true);
5164  }
5165 }
5166 
5167 void Spell::HandleThreatSpells()
5168 {
5169  if (m_UniqueTargetInfo.empty())
5170  return;
5171 
5172  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_NO_THREAT) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS))
5173  return;
5174 
5175  float threat = 0.0f;
5176  if (SpellThreatEntry const* threatEntry = sSpellMgr->GetSpellThreatEntry(m_spellInfo->Id))
5177  {
5178  if (threatEntry->apPctMod != 0.0f)
5179  threat += threatEntry->apPctMod * m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK);
5180 
5181  threat += threatEntry->flatMod;
5182  }
5183  else if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_NO_INITIAL_THREAT))
5184  threat += m_spellInfo->SpellLevel;
5185 
5186  // past this point only multiplicative effects occur
5187  if (threat == 0.0f)
5188  return;
5189 
5190  // since 2.0.1 threat from positive effects also is distributed among all targets, so the overall caused threat is at most the defined bonus
5191  threat /= m_UniqueTargetInfo.size();
5192 
5193  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
5194  {
5195  float threatToAdd = threat;
5196  if (ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
5197  threatToAdd = 0.0f;
5198 
5199  Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID);
5200  if (!target)
5201  continue;
5202 
5203  bool IsFriendly = m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(target);
5204  // positive spells distribute threat among all units that are in combat with target, like healing
5205  if (m_spellInfo->_IsPositiveSpell() && IsFriendly)
5206  target->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(m_caster, threatToAdd, m_spellInfo);
5207  // for negative spells threat gets distributed among affected targets
5208  else if (!m_spellInfo->_IsPositiveSpell() && !IsFriendly && target->CanHaveThreatList())
5209  target->AddThreat(m_caster, threatToAdd, m_spellInfo->GetSchoolMask(), m_spellInfo);
5210  }
5211  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell %u, added an additional %f threat for %s %u target(s)", m_spellInfo->Id, threat, m_spellInfo->_IsPositiveSpell() ? "assisting" : "harming", uint32(m_UniqueTargetInfo.size()));
5212 }
5213 
5214 void Spell::HandleEffects(Unit* pUnitTarget, Item* pItemTarget, GameObject* pGOTarget, uint32 i, SpellEffectHandleMode mode)
5215 {
5216  effectHandleMode = mode;
5217  unitTarget = pUnitTarget;
5218  itemTarget = pItemTarget;
5219  gameObjTarget = pGOTarget;
5220  destTarget = &m_destTargets[i]._position;
5221 
5222  uint8 eff = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect;
5223 
5224  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell: %u Effect : %u", m_spellInfo->Id, eff);
5225 
5226  // we do not need DamageMultiplier here.
5227  damage = CalculateSpellDamage(i, nullptr);
5228 
5229  bool preventDefault = CallScriptEffectHandlers((SpellEffIndex)i, mode);
5230 
5231  if (!preventDefault && eff < TOTAL_SPELL_EFFECTS)
5232  {
5233  (this->*SpellEffects[eff])((SpellEffIndex)i);
5234  }
5235 }
5236 
5237 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckCast(bool strict)
5238 {
5239  // check death state
5240  if (!m_caster->IsAlive() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_PASSIVE) && !(m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_DEAD) || (IsTriggered() && !m_triggeredByAuraSpell)))
5241  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_DEAD;
5242 
5243  // Spectator check
5244  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5245  if (((const Player*)m_caster)->IsSpectator() && m_spellInfo->Id != SPECTATOR_SPELL_BINDSIGHT)
5246  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_HERE;
5247 
5248  SpellCastResult res = SPELL_CAST_OK;
5249 
5250  sScriptMgr->OnSpellCheckCast(this, strict, res);
5251 
5252  if (res != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5253  return res;
5254 
5255  // check cooldowns to prevent cheating
5256  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_PASSIVE))
5257  {
5258  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5259  {
5260  //can cast triggered (by aura only?) spells while have this flag
5261  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_AURASTATE) && m_caster->ToPlayer()->HasFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_ALLOW_ONLY_ABILITY))
5262  return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS;
5263 
5264  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SPELL_AND_CATEGORY_CD) && m_caster->ToPlayer()->HasSpellCooldown(m_spellInfo->Id))
5265  {
5266  if (m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
5267  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5268  else
5269  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
5270  }
5271 
5272  // check if we are using a potion in combat for the 2nd+ time. Cooldown is added only after caster gets out of combat
5273  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetLastPotionId() && m_CastItem && (m_CastItem->IsPotion() || m_spellInfo->IsCooldownStartedOnEvent()))
5274  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
5275  }
5276  else if (!IsTriggered() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->ToCreature()->IsSpellProhibited(m_spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()))
5277  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
5278  }
5279 
5280  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR7_DEBUG_SPELL) && !m_caster->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_ALLOW_CHEAT_SPELLS))
5281  {
5282  m_customError = SPELL_CUSTOM_ERROR_GM_ONLY;
5283  return SPELL_FAILED_CUSTOM_ERROR;
5284  }
5285 
5286  // Check global cooldown
5287  if (strict && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_GCD) && HasGlobalCooldown())
5288  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
5289 
5290  // only triggered spells can be processed an ended battleground
5291  if (!IsTriggered() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5292  if (Battleground* bg = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetBattleground())
5293  if (bg->GetStatus() == STATUS_WAIT_LEAVE)
5294  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5295 
5296  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER /*&& VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapMgr()->isLineOfSightCalcEnabled()*/) // pussywizard: optimization (commented)
5297  {
5298  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ONLY_OUTDOORS) &&
5299  !m_caster->IsOutdoors())
5300  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_OUTDOORS;
5301 
5302  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ONLY_INDOORS) &&
5303  m_caster->IsOutdoors())
5304  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_INDOORS;
5305  }
5306 
5307  // only check at first call, Stealth auras are already removed at second call
5308  // for now, ignore triggered spells
5309  if (strict && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SHAPESHIFT))
5310  {
5311  bool checkForm = true;
5312  // Ignore form req aura
5313  Unit::AuraEffectList const& ignore = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_SHAPESHIFT);
5314  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = ignore.begin(); i != ignore.end(); ++i)
5315  {
5316  if (!(*i)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
5317  continue;
5318  checkForm = false;
5319  break;
5320  }
5321  if (checkForm)
5322  {
5323  // Cannot be used in this stance/form
5324  SpellCastResult shapeError = m_spellInfo->CheckShapeshift(m_caster->GetShapeshiftForm());
5325  if (shapeError != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5326  return shapeError;
5327 
5328  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ONLY_STEALTHED) && !(m_caster->HasStealthAura()))
5329  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_STEALTHED;
5330  }
5331  }
5332 
5333  Unit::AuraEffectList const& blockSpells = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_BLOCK_SPELL_FAMILY);
5334  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator blockItr = blockSpells.begin(); blockItr != blockSpells.end(); ++blockItr)
5335  if (uint32((*blockItr)->GetMiscValue()) == m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
5336  return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_UNAVAILABLE;
5337 
5338  bool reqCombat = true;
5339  Unit::AuraEffectList const& stateAuras = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_ABILITY_IGNORE_AURASTATE);
5340  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator j = stateAuras.begin(); j != stateAuras.end(); ++j)
5341  {
5342  if ((*j)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
5343  {
5344  m_needComboPoints = false;
5345  if ((*j)->GetMiscValue() == 1)
5346  {
5347  reqCombat = false;
5348  break;
5349  }
5350  }
5351  }
5352 
5353  // caster state requirements
5354  // not for triggered spells (needed by execute)
5355  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_AURASTATE))
5356  {
5357  if (m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState && !m_caster->HasAuraState(AuraStateType(m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState), m_spellInfo, m_caster))
5358  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5359  if (m_spellInfo->CasterAuraStateNot && m_caster->HasAuraState(AuraStateType(m_spellInfo->CasterAuraStateNot), m_spellInfo, m_caster))
5360  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5361 
5362  // Note: spell 62473 requres CasterAuraSpell = triggering spell
5363  if (m_spellInfo->CasterAuraSpell && !m_caster->HasAura(sSpellMgr->GetSpellIdForDifficulty(m_spellInfo->CasterAuraSpell, m_caster)))
5364  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5365  if (m_spellInfo->ExcludeCasterAuraSpell && m_caster->HasAura(sSpellMgr->GetSpellIdForDifficulty(m_spellInfo->ExcludeCasterAuraSpell, m_caster)))
5366  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5367 
5368  if (reqCombat && m_caster->IsInCombat() && !m_spellInfo->CanBeUsedInCombat())
5369  return SPELL_FAILED_AFFECTING_COMBAT;
5370  }
5371 
5372  // Xinef: exploit protection
5373  if (reqCombat && !m_spellInfo->CanBeUsedInCombat() && (m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_RESURRECT) || m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_RESURRECT_NEW)))
5374  {
5375  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->GetMap()->IsDungeon())
5376  if (InstanceScript* instanceScript = m_caster->GetInstanceScript())
5377  if (instanceScript->IsEncounterInProgress())
5378  {
5379  if (Group* group = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetGroup())
5380  for (GroupReference* itr = group->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr; itr = itr->next())
5381  if (Player* member = itr->GetSource())
5382  if (member->IsInMap(m_caster))
5383  if (Unit* victim = member->GetVictim())
5384  if (victim->IsInCombat() && m_caster->GetDistance(victim) < m_caster->GetVisibilityRange())
5385  {
5386  m_caster->CombatStart(victim);
5387  victim->AddThreat(m_caster, 1.0f);
5388  break;
5389  }
5390  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_RESURRECTED;
5391  }
5392  }
5393 
5394  // cancel autorepeat spells if cast start when moving
5395  // (not wand currently autorepeat cast delayed to moving stop anyway in spell update code)
5396  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->ToPlayer()->isMoving() && !IsTriggered())
5397  {
5398  // skip stuck spell to allow use it in falling case and apply spell limitations at movement
5399  if ((!m_caster->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING_FAR) || m_spellInfo->Effects[0].Effect != SPELL_EFFECT_STUCK) &&
5400  (IsAutoRepeat() || (m_spellInfo->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_NOT_SEATED) != 0))
5401  return SPELL_FAILED_MOVING;
5402  }
5403 
5404  Vehicle* vehicle = m_caster->GetVehicle();
5405  if (vehicle && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_MOUNTED_OR_ON_VEHICLE))
5406  {
5407  uint16 checkMask = 0;
5408  for (uint8 effIndex = EFFECT_0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
5409  {
5410  SpellEffectInfo const* effInfo = &m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex];
5411  if (effInfo->ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT)
5412  {
5413  SpellShapeshiftEntry const* shapeShiftEntry = sSpellShapeshiftStore.LookupEntry(effInfo->MiscValue);
5414  if (shapeShiftEntry && (shapeShiftEntry->flags1 & 1) == 0) // unk flag
5415  checkMask |= VEHICLE_SEAT_FLAG_UNCONTROLLED;
5416  break;
5417  }
5418  }
5419 
5420  if (m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED))
5421  checkMask |= VEHICLE_SEAT_FLAG_CAN_CAST_MOUNT_SPELL;
5422 
5423  if (!checkMask)
5424  checkMask = VEHICLE_SEAT_FLAG_CAN_ATTACK;
5425 
5426  // All creatures should be able to cast as passengers freely, restriction and attribute are only for players
5427  VehicleSeatEntry const* vehicleSeat = vehicle->GetSeatForPassenger(m_caster);
5428  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR6_ALLOW_WHILE_RIDING_VEHICLE) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ALLOW_WHILE_MOUNTED)
5429  && (vehicleSeat->m_flags & checkMask) != checkMask && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5430  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5431  }
5432 
5433  // check spell cast conditions from database
5434  {
5435  ConditionSourceInfo condInfo = ConditionSourceInfo(m_caster);
5436  condInfo.mConditionTargets[1] = m_targets.GetObjectTarget();
5437  ConditionList conditions = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForNotGroupedEntry(CONDITION_SOURCE_TYPE_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id);
5438  if (!conditions.empty() && !sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions(condInfo, conditions))
5439  {
5440  // mLastFailedCondition can be nullptr if there was an error processing the condition in Condition::Meets (i.e. wrong data for ConditionTarget or others)
5441  if (condInfo.mLastFailedCondition && condInfo.mLastFailedCondition->ErrorType)
5442  {
5443  if (condInfo.mLastFailedCondition->ErrorType == SPELL_FAILED_CUSTOM_ERROR)
5444  m_customError = SpellCustomErrors(condInfo.mLastFailedCondition->ErrorTextId);
5445  return SpellCastResult(condInfo.mLastFailedCondition->ErrorType);
5446  }
5447  if (!condInfo.mLastFailedCondition || !condInfo.mLastFailedCondition->ConditionTarget)
5448  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5449  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5450  }
5451  }
5452 
5453  // Don't check explicit target for passive spells (workaround) (check should be skipped only for learn case)
5454  // those spells may have incorrect target entries or not filled at all (for example 15332)
5455  // such spells when learned are not targeting anyone using targeting system, they should apply directly to caster instead
5456  // also, such casts shouldn't be sent to client
5457  // Xinef: do not check explicit casts for self cast of triggered spells (eg. reflect case)
5458  if (!(m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_PASSIVE) && (!m_targets.GetUnitTarget() || m_targets.GetUnitTarget() == m_caster)))
5459  {
5460  // Check explicit target for m_originalCaster - todo: get rid of such workarounds
5461  // Xinef: do not check explicit target for triggered spell casted on self with targetflag enemy
5462  if (!m_triggeredByAuraSpell || m_targets.GetUnitTarget() != m_caster || !(m_spellInfo->GetExplicitTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_ENEMY))
5463  {
5464  SpellCastResult castResult = m_spellInfo->CheckExplicitTarget((m_originalCaster && m_caster->GetEntry() != WORLD_TRIGGER) ? m_originalCaster : m_caster, m_targets.GetObjectTarget(), m_targets.GetItemTarget());
5465  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5466  return castResult;
5467  }
5468  }
5469 
5470  if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
5471  {
5472  SpellCastResult castResult = m_spellInfo->CheckTarget(m_caster, target, false);
5473  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5474  return castResult;
5475 
5476  if (target != m_caster)
5477  {
5478  // Must be behind the target
5479  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_REQ_CASTER_BEHIND_TARGET) && target->HasInArc(static_cast<float>(M_PI), m_caster))
5480  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_BEHIND;
5481 
5482  // Target must be facing you
5483  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_REQ_TARGET_FACING_CASTER) && !target->HasInArc(static_cast<float>(M_PI), m_caster))
5484  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_INFRONT;
5485 
5486  if (m_caster->GetEntry() != WORLD_TRIGGER) // Ignore LOS for gameobjects casts (wrongly casted by a trigger)
5487  if ((!m_caster->IsTotem() || !m_spellInfo->IsPositive()) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_IGNORE_LINE_OF_SIGHT) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALWAYS_AOE_LINE_OF_SIGHT) && !m_caster->IsWithinLOSInMap(target, LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS) && !(m_spellFlags & SPELL_FLAG_REDIRECTED))
5488  return SPELL_FAILED_LINE_OF_SIGHT;
5489  }
5490  }
5491 
5492  // Check for line of sight for spells with dest
5493  if (m_targets.HasDst())
5494  {
5495  float x, y, z;
5496  m_targets.GetDstPos()->GetPosition(x, y, z);
5497 
5498  if ((!m_caster->IsTotem() || !m_spellInfo->IsPositive()) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_IGNORE_LINE_OF_SIGHT) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALWAYS_AOE_LINE_OF_SIGHT) && !m_caster->IsWithinLOS(x, y, z, LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS))
5499  return SPELL_FAILED_LINE_OF_SIGHT;
5500  }
5501 
5502  // check pet presence
5503  for (int j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
5504  {
5505  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_PET)
5506  {
5507  if (!m_caster->GetGuardianPet() && !m_caster->GetCharm())
5508  {
5509  if (m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo) // not report pet not existence for triggered spells
5510  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5511  else
5512  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
5513  }
5514  break;
5515  }
5516  }
5517  // Spell casted only on battleground
5518  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_ONLY_BATTLEGROUNDS) && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5519  if (!m_caster->ToPlayer()->InBattleground())
5520  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_BATTLEGROUNDS;
5521 
5522  // do not allow spells to be cast in arenas
5523  // - with greater than 10 min CD without SPELL_ATTR4_IGNORE_DEFAULT_ARENA_RESTRICTIONS flag
5524  // - with SPELL_ATTR4_NOT_IN_ARENA_OR_RATED_BATTLEGROUND flag
5525  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_NOT_IN_ARENA_OR_RATED_BATTLEGROUND) ||
5526  (m_spellInfo->GetRecoveryTime() >= 10 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_IGNORE_DEFAULT_ARENA_RESTRICTIONS)))
5527  if (MapEntry const* mapEntry = sMapStore.LookupEntry(m_caster->GetMapId()))
5528  if (mapEntry->IsBattleArena())
5529  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_IN_ARENA;
5530 
5531  // zone check
5532  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT || !m_caster->ToPlayer()->IsGameMaster())
5533  {
5534  uint32 zone, area;
5535  m_caster->GetZoneAndAreaId(zone, area);
5536 
5537  SpellCastResult locRes = m_spellInfo->CheckLocation(m_caster->GetMapId(), zone, area,
5538  m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? m_caster->ToPlayer() : nullptr);
5539  if (locRes != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5540  return locRes;
5541  }
5542 
5543  // not let players cast spells at mount (and let do it to creatures)
5544  if (m_caster->IsMounted() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_MOUNTED_OR_ON_VEHICLE) &&
5545  !m_spellInfo->IsPassive() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ALLOW_WHILE_MOUNTED))
5546  {
5547  if (m_caster->IsInFlight())
5548  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_ON_TAXI;
5549  else
5550  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_MOUNTED;
5551  }
5552 
5553  SpellCastResult castResult = SPELL_CAST_OK;
5554 
5555  // always (except passive spells) check items (focus object can be required for any type casts)
5556  if (!m_spellInfo->IsPassive())
5557  {
5558  // spell focus needs to be checked not only for players! there are vehicle spells that require spell focus
5559  castResult = CheckSpellFocus();
5560  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5561  return castResult;
5562 
5563  castResult = CheckItems();
5564  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5565  return castResult;
5566  }
5567 
5568  // Triggered spells also have range check
5569  // TODO: determine if there is some flag to enable/disable the check
5570  castResult = CheckRange(strict);
5571  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5572  return castResult;
5573 
5574  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_POWER_AND_REAGENT_COST))
5575  {
5576  castResult = CheckPower();
5577  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5578  return castResult;
5579  }
5580 
5581  // xinef: do not skip triggered spells if they posses prevention type (eg. Bladestorm vs Hand of Protection)
5582  if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_AURAS) || (m_spellInfo->PreventionType > SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_NONE && m_triggeredByAuraSpell && m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo->IsPositive()))
5583  {
5584  castResult = CheckCasterAuras(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_AURAS);
5585  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5586  return castResult;
5587 
5588  // xinef: Enraged Regeneration: While this is active, the warrior is blocked from using abilities that trigger being enraged (which would do nothing and waste the cooldowns).
5589  if (m_spellInfo->Mechanic && m_spellInfo->IsSelfCast())
5590  {
5591  SpellImmuneList const& mechanicList = m_caster->m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_MECHANIC];
5592  for (SpellImmuneList::const_iterator itr = mechanicList.begin(); itr != mechanicList.end(); ++itr)
5593  if (itr->type == m_spellInfo->Mechanic)
5594  return SPELL_FAILED_DAMAGE_IMMUNE;
5595  }
5596  }
5597 
5598  // script hook
5599  castResult = CallScriptCheckCastHandlers();
5600  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5601  return castResult;
5602 
5603  bool hasDispellableAura = false;
5604  bool hasNonDispelEffect = false;
5605  uint32 dispelMask = 0;
5606  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
5607  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_DISPEL)
5608  {
5609  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsTargetingArea() || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_INITIATE_COMBAT))
5610  {
5611  hasDispellableAura = true;
5612  break;
5613  }
5614 
5615  dispelMask |= SpellInfo::GetDispelMask(DispelType(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue));
5616  }
5617  else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsEffect())
5618  {
5619  hasNonDispelEffect = true;
5620  break;
5621  }
5622 
5623  if (!hasNonDispelEffect && !hasDispellableAura && dispelMask && !IsTriggered())
5624  {
5625  if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
5626  {
5627  // Xinef: do not allow to cast on hostile targets in sanctuary
5628  if (!m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(target))
5629  {
5630  if (m_caster->IsInSanctuary() || target->IsInSanctuary())
5631  {
5632  // Xinef: fix for duels
5633  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5634  if (!player || !player->duel || target != player->duel->opponent)
5635  return SPELL_FAILED_NOTHING_TO_DISPEL;
5636  }
5637  }
5638 
5639  DispelChargesList dispelList;
5640  target->GetDispellableAuraList(m_caster, dispelMask, dispelList);
5641  if (dispelList.empty())
5642  return SPELL_FAILED_NOTHING_TO_DISPEL;
5643  }
5644  }
5645 
5646  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
5647  {
5648  // for effects of spells that have only one target
5649  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect)
5650  {
5651  case SPELL_EFFECT_DUMMY:
5652  {
5653  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT)
5654  {
5655  // Raise Ally
5656  if( m_spellInfo->Id == 61999 )
5657  {
5658  Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget();
5659  if (!target)
5660  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5661 
5662  if (target->IsAlive()) // not discovered attributeEx5?
5663  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_DEAD;
5664  }
5665  }
5666  break;
5667  }
5668  case SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_SPELL:
5669  {
5670  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5671  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5672 
5673  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() != TARGET_UNIT_PET)
5674  break;
5675 
5676  Pet* pet = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet();
5677 
5678  if (!pet)
5679  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
5680 
5681  SpellInfo const* learn_spellproto = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TriggerSpell);
5682 
5683  if (!learn_spellproto)
5684  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_KNOWN;
5685 
5686  if (m_spellInfo->SpellLevel > pet->getLevel())
5687  return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
5688 
5689  break;
5690  }
5691  case SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_PET_SPELL:
5692  {
5693  // check target only for unit target case
5694  if (Unit* unitTarget = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
5695  {
5696  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5697  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5698 
5699  Pet* pet = unitTarget->ToPet();
5700  if (!pet || pet->GetOwner() != m_caster)
5701  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5702 
5703  SpellInfo const* learn_spellproto = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TriggerSpell);
5704 
5705  if (!learn_spellproto)
5706  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_KNOWN;
5707 
5708  if (m_spellInfo->SpellLevel > pet->getLevel())
5709  return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
5710  }
5711  break;
5712  }
5713  case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_GLYPH:
5714  {
5715  uint32 glyphId = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue;
5716  if (GlyphPropertiesEntry const* gp = sGlyphPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(glyphId))
5717  if (m_caster->HasAura(gp->SpellId))
5718  return SPELL_FAILED_UNIQUE_GLYPH;
5719  break;
5720  }
5721  case SPELL_EFFECT_FEED_PET:
5722  {
5723  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5724  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5725 
5726  Item* foodItem = m_targets.GetItemTarget();
5727  if (!foodItem)
5728  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5729 
5730  Pet* pet = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet();
5731 
5732  if (!pet)
5733  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
5734 
5735  if (!pet->HaveInDiet(foodItem->GetTemplate()))
5736  return SPELL_FAILED_WRONG_PET_FOOD;
5737 
5738  if (!pet->GetCurrentFoodBenefitLevel(foodItem->GetTemplate()->ItemLevel))
5739  return SPELL_FAILED_FOOD_LOWLEVEL;
5740 
5741  if (m_caster->IsInCombat() || pet->IsInCombat())
5742  return SPELL_FAILED_AFFECTING_COMBAT;
5743 
5744  break;
5745  }
5746  case SPELL_EFFECT_POWER_BURN:
5747  case SPELL_EFFECT_POWER_DRAIN:
5748  {
5749  // Can be area effect, Check only for players and not check if target - caster (spell can have multiply drain/burn effects)
5750  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5751  if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
5752  if (target != m_caster && target->getPowerType() != Powers(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue))
5753  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5754  break;
5755  }
5756  case SPELL_EFFECT_CHARGE:
5757  {
5758  if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CHARGING))
5759  {
5760  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5761  }
5762 
5763  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR)
5764  {
5765  // Warbringer - can't be handled in proc system - should be done before checkcast root check and charge effect process
5766  if (strict && m_caster->IsScriptOverriden(m_spellInfo, 6953))
5767  m_caster->RemoveMovementImpairingAuras(true);
5768  }
5769  if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROOT))
5770  {
5771  // Exception for Master's Call
5772  if (m_spellInfo->Id != 54216)
5773  {
5774  return SPELL_FAILED_ROOTED;
5775  }
5776  }
5777  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5778  if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
5779  if (!target->IsAlive())
5780  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5781  // Xinef: Pass only explicit unit target spells
5782  // pussywizard:
5783  if (DisableMgr::IsPathfindingEnabled(m_caster->FindMap()) && m_spellInfo->NeedsExplicitUnitTarget())
5784  {
5785  Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget();
5786  if (!target)
5787  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5788 
5789  Position pos;
5790  target->GetChargeContactPoint(m_caster, pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ);
5791 
5792  if (m_caster->GetMapId() == 618) // pussywizard: 618 Ring of Valor
5793  pos.m_positionZ = std::max(pos.m_positionZ, 28.28f);
5794 
5795  float maxdist = m_caster->GetMeleeRange(target);
5796  if (!target->IsInDist(&pos, maxdist))
5797  return SPELL_FAILED_NOPATH;
5798 
5799  if (m_caster->GetMapId() == 618) // pussywizard: 618 Ring of Valor
5800  {
5801  if (!((target->GetPositionZ() > 32.0f) ^ (m_caster->GetPositionZ() > 32.0f)))
5802  break;
5803  return SPELL_FAILED_NOPATH;
5804  }
5805  else if (m_caster->GetMapId() == 572) // pussywizard: 572 Ruins of Lordaeron
5806  {
5807  if (pos.GetPositionX() < 1275.0f || m_caster->GetPositionX() < 1275.0f) // special case (acid)
5808  break; // can't force path because the way is around and the path is too long
5809  }
5810 
5811  if (m_caster->GetTransport() != target->GetTransport())
5812  return SPELL_FAILED_NOPATH;
5813  if (m_caster->GetTransport())
5814  break;
5815 
5816  m_pathFinder = new PathGenerator(m_caster);
5817  m_pathFinder->CalculatePath(pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ + 0.15f, false);
5818  G3D::Vector3 endPos = m_pathFinder->GetEndPosition(); // also check distance between target and the point calculated by mmaps
5819  if (m_pathFinder->GetPathType() & (PATHFIND_NOPATH | PATHFIND_INCOMPLETE) || target->GetExactDistSq(endPos.x, endPos.y, endPos.z) > maxdist * maxdist || m_pathFinder->getPathLength() > (40.0f + (m_caster->HasAura(58097) ? 5.0f : 0.0f)))
5820  return SPELL_FAILED_NOPATH;
5821  }
5822  break;
5823  }
5824  case SPELL_EFFECT_SKINNING:
5825  {
5826  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !m_targets.GetUnitTarget() || m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
5827  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5828 
5829  if (!(m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS) & UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE))
5830  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_UNSKINNABLE;
5831 
5832  Creature* creature = m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->ToCreature();
5833  if (!creature->IsCritter() && !creature->loot.isLooted())
5834  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_LOOTED;
5835 
5836  uint32 skill = creature->GetCreatureTemplate()->GetRequiredLootSkill();
5837 
5838  int32 skillValue = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSkillValue(skill);
5839  int32 TargetLevel = m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->getLevel();
5840  int32 ReqValue = (skillValue < 100 ? (TargetLevel - 10) * 10 : TargetLevel * 5);
5841  if (ReqValue > skillValue)
5842  return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
5843 
5844  break;
5845  }
5846  case SPELL_EFFECT_OPEN_LOCK:
5847  {
5848  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() != TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_TARGET &&
5849  m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() != TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_ITEM_TARGET)
5850  break;
5851 
5852  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER // only players can open locks, gather etc.
5853  // we need a go target in case of TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_TARGET
5854  || (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_TARGET && !m_targets.GetGOTarget()))
5855  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5856 
5857  Item* pTempItem = nullptr;
5858  if (m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
5859  {
5860  if (TradeData* pTrade = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTradeData())
5861  pTempItem = pTrade->GetTraderData()->GetItem(TradeSlots(m_targets.GetItemTargetGUID().GetRawValue()));
5862  }
5863  else if (m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_ITEM)
5864  pTempItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetItemByGuid(m_targets.GetItemTargetGUID());
5865 
5866  // we need a go target, or an openable item target in case of TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_ITEM_TARGET
5867  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_ITEM_TARGET &&
5868  !m_targets.GetGOTarget() &&
5869  (!pTempItem || !pTempItem->GetTemplate()->LockID || !pTempItem->IsLocked()))
5870  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5871 
5872  // We must also ensure the gameobject we are opening is still closed by the time the spell finishes.
5873  if (GameObject* go = m_targets.GetGOTarget())
5874  {
5875  if (go->GetGoState() != GO_STATE_READY)
5876  {
5877  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5878  }
5879  }
5880  if (m_spellInfo->Id != 1842 || (m_targets.GetGOTarget() &&
5881  m_targets.GetGOTarget()->GetGOInfo()->type != GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_TRAP))
5882  {
5883  if (m_targets.GetGOTarget() && m_targets.GetGOTarget()->GetEntry() == 179697)
5884  {
5885  if (!m_caster->ToPlayer()->CanUseBattlegroundObject(nullptr))
5886  return SPELL_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN;
5887  }
5888  else if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->InBattleground() && // In Battleground players can use only flags and banners, or Gurubashi chest
5889  !m_caster->ToPlayer()->CanUseBattlegroundObject(m_targets.GetGOTarget()))
5890  return SPELL_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN;
5891  }
5892 
5893  // get the lock entry
5894  uint32 lockId = 0;
5895  if (GameObject* go = m_targets.GetGOTarget())
5896  {
5897  lockId = go->GetGOInfo()->GetLockId();
5898  if (!lockId)
5899  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5900  }
5901  else if (Item* itm = m_targets.GetItemTarget())
5902  lockId = itm->GetTemplate()->LockID;
5903 
5904  SkillType skillId = SKILL_NONE;
5905  int32 reqSkillValue = 0;
5906  int32 skillValue = 0;
5907 
5908  // check lock compatibility
5909  SpellCastResult res = CanOpenLock(i, lockId, skillId, reqSkillValue, skillValue);
5910  if (res != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5911  return res;
5912 
5913  // chance for fail at lockpicking attempt
5914  // second check prevent fail at rechecks
5915  if (skillId != SKILL_NONE && (!m_selfContainer || ((*m_selfContainer) != this)))
5916  {
5917  // chance for failure in orange lockpick
5918  if (skillId == SKILL_LOCKPICKING && reqSkillValue > irand(skillValue - 25, skillValue + 37))
5919  {
5920  return SPELL_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN;
5921  }
5922  }
5923  break;
5924  }
5925  case SPELL_EFFECT_RESURRECT_PET:
5926  {
5927  if (Creature* pet = m_caster->GetGuardianPet())
5928  {
5929  if (pet->IsAlive())
5930  {
5931  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
5932  }
5933  }
5934  else if (Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer())
5935  {
5936  SpellCastResult loadResult = Pet::TryLoadFromDB(player, false, MAX_PET_TYPE, true);
5937  if (loadResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5938  {
5939  return loadResult;
5940  }
5941  }
5942 
5943  break;
5944  }
5945  // This is generic summon effect
5946  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON:
5947  {
5948  SummonPropertiesEntry const* SummonProperties = sSummonPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValueB);
5949  if (!SummonProperties || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
5950  break;
5951  switch (SummonProperties->Category)
5952  {
5953  case SUMMON_CATEGORY_PET:
5954  if (m_caster->GetPetGUID())
5955  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
5956  [[fallthrough]];
5957  case SUMMON_CATEGORY_PUPPET:
5958  if (m_caster->GetCharmGUID())
5959  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
5960  break;
5961  }
5962  break;
5963  }
5964  case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_TAMED_PET:
5965  {
5966  if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
5967  {
5968  if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5969  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5970  if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetPetGUID())
5971  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
5972  }
5973  break;
5974  }
5975  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PET:
5976  {
5977  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
5978  {
5979  if (m_caster->GetPetGUID())
5980  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
5981  if (m_caster->GetCharmGUID())
5982  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
5983  }
5984 
5985  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->getClass() == CLASS_WARLOCK && strict)
5986  if (Pet* pet = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet())
5987  pet->CastSpell(pet, 32752, true, nullptr, nullptr, pet->GetGUID()); //starting cast, trigger pet stun (cast by pet so it doesn't attack player)
5988  break;
5989  }
5990  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PLAYER:
5991  {
5992  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5993  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5994  if (!m_caster->GetTarget())
5995  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5996 
5997  Player* target = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTarget());
5998  if (!target || m_caster->ToPlayer() == target || (!target->IsInSameRaidWith(m_caster->ToPlayer()) && m_spellInfo->Id != 48955)) // refer-a-friend spell
5999  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6000 
6001  // Xinef: Implement summon pending error
6002  if (target->GetSummonExpireTimer() > time(nullptr))
6003  return SPELL_FAILED_SUMMON_PENDING;
6004 
6005  // check if our map is dungeon
6006  MapEntry const* map = sMapStore.LookupEntry(m_caster->GetMapId());
6007  if (map->IsDungeon())
6008  {
6009  uint32 mapId = m_caster->GetMap()->GetId();
6010  Difficulty difficulty = m_caster->GetMap()->GetDifficulty();
6011  /*if (map->IsRaid())
6012  if (InstancePlayerBind* targetBind = target->GetBoundInstance(mapId, difficulty))
6013  if (targetBind->perm && targetBind != m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetBoundInstance(mapId, difficulty))
6014  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_LOCKED_TO_RAID_INSTANCE;*/
6015 
6016  InstanceTemplate const* instance = sObjectMgr->GetInstanceTemplate(mapId);
6017  if (!instance)
6018  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_IN_INSTANCE;
6019  if (!target->Satisfy(sObjectMgr->GetAccessRequirement(mapId, difficulty), mapId))
6020  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6021  }
6022  break;
6023  }
6024  // RETURN HERE
6025  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_RAF_FRIEND:
6026  {
6027  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6028  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6029 
6030  Player* playerCaster = m_caster->ToPlayer();
6031  //
6032  if (!(playerCaster->GetTarget()))
6033  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6034 
6035  Player* target = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTarget());
6036 
6037  if (!target ||
6038  !(target->GetSession()->GetRecruiterId() == playerCaster->GetSession()->GetAccountId() || target->GetSession()->GetAccountId() == playerCaster->GetSession()->GetRecruiterId()))
6039  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6040 
6041  // Xinef: Implement summon pending error
6042  if (target->GetSummonExpireTimer() > time(nullptr))
6043  return SPELL_FAILED_SUMMON_PENDING;
6044 
6045  break;
6046  }
6047  case SPELL_EFFECT_LEAP:
6048  case SPELL_EFFECT_TELEPORT_UNITS_FACE_CASTER:
6049  {
6050  //Do not allow to cast it before BG starts.
6051  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6052  if (Battleground const* bg = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetBattleground())
6053  if (bg->GetStatus() != STATUS_IN_PROGRESS)
6054  return SPELL_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN;
6055  break;
6056  }
6057  case SPELL_EFFECT_STEAL_BENEFICIAL_BUFF:
6058  {
6059  if( !m_targets.GetUnitTarget() || m_targets.GetUnitTarget() == m_caster)
6060  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6061 
6062  bool found = false;
6063  Unit::VisibleAuraMap const* visibleAuras = m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetVisibleAuras();
6064  for(Unit::VisibleAuraMap::const_iterator itr = visibleAuras->begin(); itr != visibleAuras->end(); ++itr)
6065  {
6066  if( itr->second->GetBase()->IsPassive() )
6067  continue;
6068 
6069  if( !itr->second->IsPositive() )
6070  continue;
6071 
6072  found = true;
6073  break;
6074  }
6075 
6076  if( !found )
6077  return SPELL_FAILED_NOTHING_TO_STEAL;
6078 
6079  break;
6080  }
6081  case SPELL_EFFECT_LEAP_BACK:
6082  {
6083  if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROOT))
6084  {
6085  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6086  return SPELL_FAILED_ROOTED;
6087  else
6088  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6089  }
6090  break;
6091  }
6092  // xinef: do not allow to use leaps while rooted
6093  case SPELL_EFFECT_JUMP:
6094  case SPELL_EFFECT_JUMP_DEST:
6095  {
6096  if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROOT))
6097  return SPELL_FAILED_ROOTED;
6098  break;
6099  }
6100  case SPELL_EFFECT_TALENT_SPEC_SELECT:
6101  if (!sScriptMgr->CanSelectSpecTalent(this))
6102  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6103  // can't change during already started arena/battleground
6104  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6105  if (Battleground const* bg = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetBattleground())
6106  if (bg->GetStatus() == STATUS_IN_PROGRESS)
6107  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_IN_BATTLEGROUND;
6108  break;
6109  default:
6110  break;
6111  }
6112  }
6113 
6114  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
6115  {
6116  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName)
6117  {
6118  case SPELL_AURA_DUMMY:
6119  break;
6120  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS_PET:
6121  {
6122  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6123  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6124 
6125  Pet* pet = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet();
6126  if (!pet)
6127  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6128 
6129  if (pet->GetCharmerGUID())
6130  return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6131  break;
6132  }
6133  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS:
6134  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM:
6135  case SPELL_AURA_AOE_CHARM:
6136  {
6137  if (m_caster->GetCharmerGUID())
6138  return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6139 
6140  // Xinef: allow SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS to posses target if caster has some pet
6141  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
6142  {
6143  if (m_caster->GetPetGUID())
6144  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6145 
6146  if (m_caster->GetCharmGUID())
6147  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
6148  }
6149  else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS)
6150  {
6151  if (m_caster->GetCharmGUID())
6152  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
6153  }
6154 
6155  if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6156  {
6157  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->ToCreature()->IsVehicle())
6158  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6159 
6160  if (target->IsMounted())
6161  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_CHARMED;
6162 
6163  if (target->GetCharmerGUID())
6164  return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6165 
6166  if (target->GetOwnerGUID() && target->GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
6167  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_IS_PLAYER_CONTROLLED;
6168 
6169  if (target->IsPet() && (!target->GetOwner() || target->GetOwner()->ToPlayer()))
6170  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_CHARMED;
6171 
6172  int32 damage = CalculateSpellDamage(i, target);
6173  if (damage && int32(target->getLevel()) > damage)
6174  return SPELL_FAILED_HIGHLEVEL;
6175  }
6176 
6177  break;
6178  }
6179  case SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED:
6180  {
6181  // Xinef: disallow casting in water for mounts not increasing water movement Speed
6182  if (m_caster->IsInWater() && !m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_SWIM_SPEED))
6183  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_ABOVEWATER;
6184 
6185  // Ignore map check if spell have AreaId. AreaId already checked and this prevent special mount spells
6186  bool allowMount = !m_caster->GetMap()->IsDungeon() || m_caster->GetMap()->IsBattlegroundOrArena();
6187  InstanceTemplate const* it = sObjectMgr->GetInstanceTemplate(m_caster->GetMapId());
6188  if (it)
6189  allowMount = it->AllowMount;
6190  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !allowMount && !m_spellInfo->AreaGroupId)
6191  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_MOUNTS_ALLOWED;
6192 
6193  if (m_caster->IsInDisallowedMountForm())
6194  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_SHAPESHIFT;
6195 
6196  // xinef: dont allow to cast mounts in specific transforms
6197  if (m_caster->getTransForm())
6198  if (SpellInfo const* transformSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_caster->getTransForm()))
6199  if (transformSpellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_NO_IMMUNITIES) &&
6200  !transformSpellInfo->HasAttribute(SpellAttr0(SPELL_ATTR0_ALLOW_WHILE_MOUNTED | SPELL_ATTR0_AURA_IS_DEBUFF)))
6201  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_SHAPESHIFT;
6202 
6203  break;
6204  }
6205  case SPELL_AURA_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_ATTACKER_BONUS:
6206  {
6207  if (!m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6208  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6209 
6210  // can be casted at non-friendly unit or own pet/charm
6211  if (m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(m_targets.GetUnitTarget()))
6212  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_FRIENDLY;
6213 
6214  break;
6215  }
6216  case SPELL_AURA_FLY:
6217  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_MOUNTED_FLIGHT_SPEED:
6218  {
6219  // Xinef: added water check
6220  if (m_caster->IsInWater())
6221  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_ABOVEWATER;
6222 
6223  // not allow cast fly spells if not have req. skills (all spells is self target)
6224  // allow always ghost flight spells
6225  if (m_originalCaster && m_originalCaster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_originalCaster->IsAlive())
6226  {
6227  Battlefield* Bf = sBattlefieldMgr->GetBattlefieldToZoneId(m_originalCaster->GetZoneId());
6228  if (AreaTableEntry const* pArea = sAreaTableStore.LookupEntry(m_originalCaster->GetAreaId()))
6229  if ((pArea->flags & AREA_FLAG_NO_FLY_ZONE) || (Bf && !Bf->CanFlyIn()))
6230  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_HERE;
6231  }
6232  break;
6233  }
6234  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_MANA_LEECH:
6235  {
6236  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsTargetingArea())
6237  break;
6238 
6239  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || m_CastItem)
6240  break;
6241 
6242  if (!m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6243  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6244 
6245  if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->getPowerType() != POWER_MANA)
6246  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6247 
6248  break;
6249  }
6250  case SPELL_AURA_HOVER:
6251  {
6252  if ((m_spellInfo->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_MOUNT) != 0 && m_targets.GetUnitTarget() && m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->IsMounted())
6253  {
6254  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_ON_MOUNTED;
6255  }
6256  break;
6257  }
6258  default:
6259  break;
6260  }
6261  }
6262 
6263  // check trade slot case (last, for allow catch any another cast problems)
6264  if (m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
6265  {
6266  if (m_CastItem)
6267  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_ENCHANT_TRADE_WINDOW;
6268 
6269  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6270  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADING;
6271 
6272  TradeData* my_trade = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTradeData();
6273 
6274  if (!my_trade)
6275  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADING;
6276 
6277  TradeSlots slot = TradeSlots(m_targets.GetItemTargetGUID().GetRawValue());
6278  if (slot != TRADE_SLOT_NONTRADED)
6279  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6280 
6281  if (!IsTriggered())
6282  if (my_trade->GetSpell())
6283  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_ALREADY_ENCHANTED;
6284  }
6285 
6286  // check if caster has at least 1 combo point for spells that require combo points
6287  if (m_needComboPoints)
6288  if (Player* plrCaster = m_caster->ToPlayer())
6289  if (!plrCaster->GetComboPoints())
6290  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_COMBO_POINTS;
6291 
6292  // xinef: check relic cooldown
6293  if (m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetTemplate()->InventoryType == INVTYPE_RELIC && m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
6294  if (m_caster->HasSpellCooldown(SPELL_RELIC_COOLDOWN) && !m_caster->HasSpellItemCooldown(SPELL_RELIC_COOLDOWN, m_CastItem->GetEntry()))
6295  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
6296 
6297  // all ok
6298  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6299 }
6300 
6301 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckPetCast(Unit* target)
6302 {
6303  if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING) && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CAST_IN_PROGRESS)) //prevent spellcast interruption by another spellcast
6304  return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS;
6305 
6306  // dead owner (pets still alive when owners ressed?)
6307  if (Unit* owner = m_caster->GetCharmerOrOwner())
6308  if (!owner->IsAlive() && m_caster->GetEntry() != 30230) // Rise Ally
6309  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_DEAD;
6310 
6311  if (!target && m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6312  target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget();
6313 
6314  if (m_spellInfo->NeedsExplicitUnitTarget())
6315  {
6316  if (!target)
6317  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6318  m_targets.SetUnitTarget(target);
6319  }
6320 
6321  // xinef: Calculate power cost here, so funciton checking power can work properly and dont return shit results
6322  m_powerCost = m_spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(m_caster, m_spellSchoolMask, this);
6323 
6324  // cooldown
6325  if (Creature const* creatureCaster = m_caster->ToCreature())
6326  if (creatureCaster->HasSpellCooldown(m_spellInfo->Id))
6327  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
6328 
6329  // Check if spell is affected by GCD
6330  if (m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryCategory > 0)
6331  if (m_caster->GetCharmInfo() && m_caster->GetCharmInfo()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().HasGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo))
6332  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
6333 
6334  return CheckCast(true);
6335 }
6336 
6337 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckCasterAuras(bool preventionOnly) const
6338 {
6339  // spells totally immuned to caster auras (wsg flag drop, give marks etc)
6340  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR6_NOT_AN_ATTACK))
6341  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6342 
6343  uint8 school_immune = 0;
6344  uint32 mechanic_immune = 0;
6345  uint32 dispel_immune = 0;
6346 
6347  // Check if the spell grants school or mechanic immunity.
6348  // We use bitmasks so the loop is done only once and not on every aura check below.
6349  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT))
6350  {
6351  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
6352  {
6353  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_SCHOOL_IMMUNITY)
6354  school_immune |= uint32(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue);
6355  else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_MECHANIC_IMMUNITY)
6356  mechanic_immune |= 1 << uint32(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue);
6357  else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_DISPEL_IMMUNITY)
6358  dispel_immune |= SpellInfo::GetDispelMask(DispelType(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue));
6359  }
6360  // immune movement impairment and loss of control
6361  // PVP trinket EMFH TOC PVP trinket Bullheaded Bestial Wrath // Beath Within // Medalion of Immunity
6362  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 42292 || m_spellInfo->Id == 59752 || m_spellInfo->Id == 65547 || m_spellInfo->Id == 53490 || m_spellInfo->Id == 19574 || m_spellInfo->Id == 34471 || m_spellInfo->Id == 46227)
6363  mechanic_immune = IMMUNE_TO_MOVEMENT_IMPAIRMENT_AND_LOSS_CONTROL_MASK;
6364  }
6365 
6366  bool usableInStun = m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALLOW_WHILE_STUNNED);
6367 
6368  // Glyph of Pain Suppression
6369  // there is no other way to handle it
6370  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 33206 && !m_caster->HasAura(63248))
6371  usableInStun = false;
6372 
6373  // Check whether the cast should be prevented by any state you might have.
6374  SpellCastResult prevented_reason = SPELL_CAST_OK;
6375  // Have to check if there is a stun aura. Otherwise will have problems with ghost aura apply while logging out
6376  uint32 unitflag = m_caster->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS); // Get unit state
6377 
6378  // Xinef: if spell is triggered check preventionType only
6379  if (!preventionOnly)
6380  {
6381  if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED)
6382  {
6383  // spell is usable while stunned, check if caster has only mechanic stun auras, another stun types must prevent cast spell
6384  if (usableInStun)
6385  {
6386  bool foundNotStun = false;
6387  uint32 mask = (1 << MECHANIC_STUN) | (1 << MECHANIC_FREEZE) | (1 << MECHANIC_HORROR);
6388  // Barkskin should skip sleep effects, sap and fears
6389  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 22812)
6390  mask |= 1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED | 1 << MECHANIC_HORROR | 1 << MECHANIC_SLEEP;
6391  // Hand of Freedom, can be used while sapped
6392  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 1044)
6393  mask |= 1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED;
6394  Unit::AuraEffectList const& stunAuras = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
6395  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = stunAuras.begin(); i != stunAuras.end(); ++i)
6396  {
6397  if ((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->GetAllEffectsMechanicMask() && !((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->GetAllEffectsMechanicMask() & mask))
6398  {
6399  foundNotStun = true;
6400  break;
6401  }
6402  }
6403  if (foundNotStun)
6404  prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_STUNNED;
6405  }
6406  else
6407  prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_STUNNED;
6408  }
6409  else if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALLOW_WHILE_CONFUSED))
6410  prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_CONFUSED;
6411  else if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALLOW_WHILE_FLEEING))
6412  prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_FLEEING;
6413  }
6414 
6415  // Xinef: if there is no prevented_reason, check prevention types
6416  if (prevented_reason == SPELL_CAST_OK)
6417  {
6418  if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED && m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE)
6419  prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_SILENCED;
6420  else if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED && m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_PACIFY)
6421  prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_PACIFIED;
6422  }
6423 
6424  // Attr must make flag drop spell totally immune from all effects
6425  if (prevented_reason != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6426  {
6427  if (school_immune || mechanic_immune || dispel_immune)
6428  {
6429  //Checking auras is needed now, because you are prevented by some state but the spell grants immunity.
6430  Unit::AuraApplicationMap const& auras = m_caster->GetAppliedAuras();
6431  for (Unit::AuraApplicationMap::const_iterator itr = auras.begin(); itr != auras.end(); ++itr)
6432  {
6433  Aura const* aura = itr->second->GetBase();
6434  SpellInfo const* auraInfo = aura->GetSpellInfo();
6435  if (auraInfo->GetAllEffectsMechanicMask() & mechanic_immune)
6436  continue;
6437  if (auraInfo->GetSchoolMask() & school_immune && !auraInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_IMMUNITY_TO_HOSTILE_AND_FRIENDLY_EFFECTS))
6438  continue;
6439  if (auraInfo->GetDispelMask() & dispel_immune)
6440  continue;
6441 
6442  //Make a second check for spell failed so the right SPELL_FAILED message is returned.
6443  //That is needed when your casting is prevented by multiple states and you are only immune to some of them.
6444  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
6445  {
6446  if (AuraEffect* part = aura->GetEffect(i))
6447  {
6448  switch (part->GetAuraType())
6449  {
6450  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN:
6451  {
6452  uint32 mask = 1 << MECHANIC_STUN;
6453  // Barkskin should skip sleep effects, sap and fears
6454  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 22812)
6455  mask |= 1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED | 1 << MECHANIC_HORROR | 1 << MECHANIC_SLEEP;
6456  // Hand of Freedom, can be used while sapped
6457  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 1044)
6458  mask |= 1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED;
6459 
6460  if (!usableInStun || !(auraInfo->GetAllEffectsMechanicMask() & mask))
6461  return SPELL_FAILED_STUNNED;
6462  break;
6463  }
6464  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE:
6465  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALLOW_WHILE_CONFUSED))
6466  return SPELL_FAILED_CONFUSED;
6467  break;
6468  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR:
6469  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALLOW_WHILE_FLEEING))
6470  return SPELL_FAILED_FLEEING;
6471  break;
6472  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_SILENCE:
6473  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_PACIFY:
6474  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_PACIFY_SILENCE:
6475  if (m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_PACIFY)
6476  return SPELL_FAILED_PACIFIED;
6477  else if (m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE)
6478  return SPELL_FAILED_SILENCED;
6479  break;
6480  default:
6481  break;
6482  }
6483  }
6484  }
6485  }
6486  }
6487  // You are prevented from casting and the spell casted does not grant immunity. Return a failed error.
6488  else
6489  return prevented_reason;
6490  }
6491  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6492 }
6493 
6494 bool Spell::CanAutoCast(Unit* target)
6495 {
6496  ObjectGuid targetguid = target->GetGUID();
6497 
6498  for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
6499  {
6500  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA)
6501  {
6502  if (m_spellInfo->StackAmount <= 1)
6503  {
6504  if (target->HasAuraEffect(m_spellInfo->Id, j))
6505  return false;
6506  }
6507  else
6508  {
6509  if (AuraEffect* aureff = target->GetAuraEffect(m_spellInfo->Id, j))
6510  if (aureff->GetBase()->GetStackAmount() >= m_spellInfo->StackAmount)
6511  return false;
6512  }
6513  }
6514  else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[j].IsAreaAuraEffect())
6515  {
6516  if (target->HasAuraEffect(m_spellInfo->Id, j))
6517  return false;
6518  }
6519  }
6520 
6521  SpellCastResult result = CheckPetCast(target);
6522 
6523  if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK || result == SPELL_FAILED_UNIT_NOT_INFRONT)
6524  {
6525  SelectSpellTargets();
6526  //check if among target units, our WANTED target is as well (->only self cast spells return false)
6527  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
6528  if (ihit->targetGUID == targetguid)
6529  return true;
6530  }
6531  return false; //target invalid
6532 }
6533 
6534 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckRange(bool strict)
6535 {
6536  // Don't check for instant cast spells
6537  if (!strict && m_casttime == 0)
6538  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6539 
6540  uint32 range_type = 0;
6541 
6542  if (m_spellInfo->RangeEntry)
6543  {
6544  // check needed by 68766 51693 - both spells are cast on enemies and have 0 max range
6545  // these are triggered by other spells - possibly we should omit range check in that case?
6546  if (m_spellInfo->RangeEntry->ID == 1)
6547  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6548 
6549  range_type = m_spellInfo->RangeEntry->type;
6550  }
6551 
6552  Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget();
6553  float max_range = m_caster->GetSpellMaxRangeForTarget(target, m_spellInfo);
6554  float min_range = m_caster->GetSpellMinRangeForTarget(target, m_spellInfo);
6555 
6556  // xinef: hack for npc shooters
6557  if (min_range && GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !GetCaster()->GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer() && min_range <= 6.0f)
6558  range_type = SPELL_RANGE_RANGED;
6559 
6560  if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
6561  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_RANGE, max_range, this);
6562 
6563  // xinef: dont check max_range to strictly after cast
6564  if (range_type != SPELL_RANGE_MELEE && !strict)
