6565  max_range += std::min(3.0f, max_range * 0.1f); // 10% but no more than 3yd
6566 
6567  if (target)
6568  {
6569  if (target != m_caster)
6570  {
6571  // Xinef: WHAT DA FUCK IS THIS SHIT? Spells with 5yd range can hit target 9yd away? >.>
6572  if (range_type == SPELL_RANGE_MELEE)
6573  {
6574  float real_max_range = max_range;
6575  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->isMoving() && target->isMoving() && !m_caster->IsWalking() && !target->IsWalking())
6576  real_max_range -= MIN_MELEE_REACH; // Because of lag, we can not check too strictly here (is only used if both caster and target are moving)
6577  else
6578  real_max_range -= 2 * MIN_MELEE_REACH;
6579 
6580  if (!m_caster->IsWithinMeleeRange(target, std::max(real_max_range, 0.0f)))
6581  return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
6582  }
6583  else if (!m_caster->IsWithinCombatRange(target, max_range))
6584  return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE; //0x5A;
6585 
6586  if (m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED && range_type == SPELL_RANGE_RANGED)
6587  {
6588  if (m_caster->IsWithinMeleeRange(target))
6589  return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_CLOSE;
6590  }
6591 
6592  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (m_spellInfo->FacingCasterFlags & SPELL_FACING_FLAG_INFRONT) && !m_caster->HasInArc(static_cast<float>(M_PI), target))
6593  return SPELL_FAILED_UNIT_NOT_INFRONT;
6594  }
6595 
6596  // Xinef: check min range for self casts
6597  if (min_range && range_type != SPELL_RANGE_RANGED && m_caster->IsWithinCombatRange(target, min_range)) // skip this check if min_range = 0
6598  return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_CLOSE;
6599  }
6600 
6601  if (GameObject* goTarget = m_targets.GetGOTarget())
6602  {
6603  if (!goTarget->IsAtInteractDistance(m_caster->ToPlayer(), m_spellInfo))
6604  {
6605  return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
6606  }
6607  }
6608 
6609  if (m_targets.HasDst() && !m_targets.HasTraj())
6610  {
6611  if (!m_caster->IsWithinDist3d(m_targets.GetDstPos(), max_range))
6612  return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
6613  if (min_range && m_caster->IsWithinDist3d(m_targets.GetDstPos(), min_range))
6614  return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_CLOSE;
6615  }
6616 
6617  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6618 }
6619 
6620 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckPower()
6621 {
6622  // item cast not used power
6623  if (m_CastItem)
6624  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6625 
6626  //While .cheat power is enabled dont check if we need power to cast the spell
6627  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6628  {
6629  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_POWER))
6630  {
6631  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6632  }
6633  }
6634 
6635  // health as power used - need check health amount
6636  if (m_spellInfo->PowerType == POWER_HEALTH)
6637  {
6638  if (int32(m_caster->GetHealth()) <= m_powerCost)
6639  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
6640  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6641  }
6642  // Check valid power type
6643  if (m_spellInfo->PowerType >= MAX_POWERS)
6644  {
6645  LOG_ERROR("spells", "Spell::CheckPower: Unknown power type '%d'", m_spellInfo->PowerType);
6646  return SPELL_FAILED_UNKNOWN;
6647  }
6648 
6649  //check rune cost only if a spell has PowerType == POWER_RUNE
6650  if (m_spellInfo->PowerType == POWER_RUNE)
6651  {
6652  SpellCastResult failReason = CheckRuneCost(m_spellInfo->RuneCostID);
6653  if (failReason != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6654  return failReason;
6655  }
6656 
6657  // Check power amount
6658  Powers PowerType = Powers(m_spellInfo->PowerType);
6659  if (int32(m_caster->GetPower(PowerType)) < m_powerCost)
6660  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_POWER;
6661  else
6662  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6663 }
6664 
6665 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckItems()
6666 {
6667  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
6668  if (!player)
6669  {
6670  // Non-player case: Check if creature is disarmed
6671  if (!m_caster->CanUseAttackType(m_attackType) && (m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE || m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED))
6672  {
6673  return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS;
6674  }
6675 
6676  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6677  }
6678 
6679  if (!m_CastItem)
6680  {
6681  if (m_castItemGUID)
6682  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_READY;
6683  }
6684  else
6685  {
6686  uint32 itemid = m_CastItem->GetEntry();
6687  if (!player->HasItemCount(itemid))
6688  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_READY;
6689 
6690  ItemTemplate const* proto = m_CastItem->GetTemplate();
6691  if (!proto)
6692  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_READY;
6693 
6694  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ITEM_SPELLS; ++i)
6695  if (proto->Spells[i].SpellCharges)
6696  if (m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(i) == 0)
6697  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_CHARGES_REMAIN;
6698 
6699  // consumable cast item checks
6700  if (proto->Class == ITEM_CLASS_CONSUMABLE && m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6701  {
6702  // such items should only fail if there is no suitable effect at all - see Rejuvenation Potions for example
6703  SpellCastResult failReason = SPELL_CAST_OK;
6704  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; i++)
6705  {
6706  // skip check, pet not required like checks, and for TARGET_UNIT_PET m_targets.GetUnitTarget() is not the real target but the caster
6707  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_PET)
6708  continue;
6709 
6710  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL)
6711  {
6712  if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->IsFullHealth())
6713  {
6714  failReason = SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_AT_FULL_HEALTH;
6715  continue;
6716  }
6717  else
6718  {
6719  failReason = SPELL_CAST_OK;
6720  break;
6721  }
6722  }
6723 
6724  // Mana Potion, Rage Potion, Thistle Tea(Rogue), ...
6725  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_ENERGIZE)
6726  {
6727  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue < 0 || m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue >= int8(MAX_POWERS))
6728  {
6729  failReason = SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_AT_FULL_POWER;
6730  continue;
6731  }
6732 
6733  Powers power = Powers(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue);
6734  if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetPower(power) == m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetMaxPower(power))
6735  {
6736  failReason = SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_AT_FULL_POWER;
6737  continue;
6738  }
6739  else
6740  {
6741  failReason = SPELL_CAST_OK;
6742  break;
6743  }
6744  }
6745  }
6746  if (failReason != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6747  return failReason;
6748  }
6749  }
6750 
6751  // check target item
6752  if (m_targets.GetItemTargetGUID())
6753  {
6754  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6755  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6756 
6757  if (!m_targets.GetItemTarget())
6758  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_GONE;
6759 
6760  if (!m_targets.GetItemTarget()->IsFitToSpellRequirements(m_spellInfo))
6761  return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS;
6762  }
6763  // if not item target then required item must be equipped
6764  else
6765  {
6766  // Xinef: this is not true in my opinion, in eg bladestorm will not be canceled after disarm
6767  //if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_EQUIPPED_ITEM_REQUIREMENT))
6768  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_caster->ToPlayer()->HasItemFitToSpellRequirements(m_spellInfo))
6769  return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS;
6770  }
6771 
6772  // do not take reagents for these item casts
6773  if (!(m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetTemplate()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_NO_REAGENT_COST))
6774  {
6775  bool checkReagents = !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_POWER_AND_REAGENT_COST) && !player->CanNoReagentCast(m_spellInfo);
6776  // Not own traded item (in trader trade slot) requires reagents even if triggered spell
6777  if (!checkReagents)
6778  if (Item* targetItem = m_targets.GetItemTarget())
6779  if (targetItem->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
6780  checkReagents = true;
6781 
6782  // check reagents (ignore triggered spells with reagents processed by original spell) and special reagent ignore case.
6783  if (checkReagents)
6784  {
6785  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_REAGENTS; i++)
6786  {
6787  if (m_spellInfo->Reagent[i] <= 0)
6788  continue;
6789 
6790  uint32 itemid = m_spellInfo->Reagent[i];
6791  uint32 itemcount = m_spellInfo->ReagentCount[i];
6792 
6793  // if CastItem is also spell reagent
6794  if (m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetEntry() == itemid)
6795  {
6796  ItemTemplate const* proto = m_CastItem->GetTemplate();
6797  if (!proto)
6798  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_READY;
6799  for (int s = 0; s < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++s)
6800  {
6801  // CastItem will be used up and does not count as reagent
6802  int32 charges = m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(s);
6803  if (proto->Spells[s].SpellCharges < 0 && abs(charges) < 2)
6804  {
6805  ++itemcount;
6806  break;
6807  }
6808  }
6809  }
6810  if (!player->HasItemCount(itemid, itemcount))
6811  return SPELL_FAILED_REAGENTS;
6812  }
6813  }
6814 
6815  // check totem-item requirements (items presence in inventory)
6816  uint32 totems = 2;
6817  for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
6818  {
6819  if (m_spellInfo->Totem[i] != 0)
6820  {
6821  if (player->HasItemCount(m_spellInfo->Totem[i]))
6822  {
6823  totems -= 1;
6824  continue;
6825  }
6826  }
6827  else
6828  totems -= 1;
6829  }
6830  if (totems != 0)
6831  return SPELL_FAILED_TOTEMS; //0x7C
6832 
6833  // Check items for TotemCategory (items presence in inventory)
6834  uint32 TotemCategory = 2;
6835  for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
6836  {
6837  if (m_spellInfo->TotemCategory[i] != 0)
6838  {
6839  if (player->HasItemTotemCategory(m_spellInfo->TotemCategory[i]))
6840  {
6841  TotemCategory -= 1;
6842  continue;
6843  }
6844  }
6845  else
6846  TotemCategory -= 1;
6847  }
6848  if (TotemCategory != 0)
6849  return SPELL_FAILED_TOTEM_CATEGORY; //0x7B
6850  }
6851 
6852  // special checks for spell effects
6853  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; i++)
6854  {
6855  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect)
6856  {
6857  case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM:
6858  case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM_2:
6859  {
6860  // m_targets.GetUnitTarget() means explicit cast, otherwise we dont check for possible equip error
6861  Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget() ? m_targets.GetUnitTarget() : player;
6862  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !IsTriggered())
6863  {
6864  // SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM_2 differs from SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM in that it picks the random item to create from a pool of potential items,
6865  // so we need to make sure there is at least one free space in the player's inventory
6866  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM_2)
6867  if (target->ToPlayer()->GetFreeInventorySpace() == 0)
6868  {
6869  player->SendEquipError(EQUIP_ERR_INVENTORY_FULL, nullptr, nullptr, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
6870  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6871  }
6872 
6873  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType)
6874  {
6875  ItemTemplate const* itemTemplate = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
6876  if (!itemTemplate)
6877  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
6878 
6879  uint32 createCount = std::clamp<uint32>(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].CalcValue(), 1u, itemTemplate->GetMaxStackSize());
6880  ItemPosCountVec dest;
6881  InventoryResult msg = target->ToPlayer()->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType, createCount);
6882  if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK)
6883  {
6885  if (!itemTemplate->ItemLimitCategory)
6886  {
6887  player->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
6888  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6889  }
6890  else
6891  {
6892  // Conjure Food/Water/Refreshment spells
6893  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName != SPELLFAMILY_MAGE || (!(m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x40000000)))
6894  return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_MANY_OF_ITEM;
6895  else if (!(target->ToPlayer()->HasItemCount(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType)))
6896  {
6897  player->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
6898  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6899  }
6900  else
6901  player->CastSpell(player, m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcValue(), false); // move this to anywhere
6902 
6903  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6904  }
6905  }
6906  }
6907  }
6908  break;
6909  }
6910  case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_RANDOM_ITEM:
6911  {
6912  if (player->GetFreeInventorySpace() == 0)
6913  {
6914  player->SendEquipError(EQUIP_ERR_INVENTORY_FULL, nullptr, nullptr, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
6915  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6916  }
6917  break;
6918  }
6919  case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM:
6920  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType && m_targets.GetItemTarget()
6921  && (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->IsWeaponVellum() || m_targets.GetItemTarget()->IsArmorVellum()))
6922  {
6923  // cannot enchant vellum for other player
6924  if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetOwner() != m_caster)
6925  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADEABLE;
6926  // do not allow to enchant vellum from scroll made by vellum-prevent exploit
6927  if (m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetTemplate()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_NO_REAGENT_COST)
6928  return SPELL_FAILED_TOTEM_CATEGORY;
6929  ItemPosCountVec dest;
6930  InventoryResult msg = player->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType, 1);
6931  if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK)
6932  {
6933  player->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
6934  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6935  }
6936  }
6937  [[fallthrough]]; // TODO: Not sure whether the fallthrough was a mistake (forgetting a break) or intended. This should be double-checked.
6938  case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM_PRISMATIC:
6939  {
6940  Item* targetItem = m_targets.GetItemTarget();
6941  if (!targetItem)
6942  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
6943 
6944  // xinef: required level has to be checked also! Exploit fix
6945  if (targetItem->GetTemplate()->ItemLevel < m_spellInfo->BaseLevel || (targetItem->GetTemplate()->RequiredLevel && targetItem->GetTemplate()->RequiredLevel < m_spellInfo->BaseLevel))
6946  return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
6947 
6948  bool isItemUsable = false;
6949  for (uint8 e = 0; e < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++e)
6950  {
6951  ItemTemplate const* proto = targetItem->GetTemplate();
6952  if (proto->Spells[e].SpellId && (
6953  proto->Spells[e].SpellTrigger == ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE ||
6954  proto->Spells[e].SpellTrigger == ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_NO_DELAY_USE))
6955  {
6956  isItemUsable = true;
6957  break;
6958  }
6959  }
6960 
6961  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* enchantEntry = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue);
6962  // do not allow adding usable enchantments to items that have use effect already
6963  if (enchantEntry)
6964  {
6965  for (uint8 s = 0; s < MAX_SPELL_ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_EFFECTS; ++s)
6966  {
6967  switch (enchantEntry->type[s])
6968  {
6969  case ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_TYPE_USE_SPELL:
6970  if (isItemUsable)
6971  return SPELL_FAILED_ON_USE_ENCHANT;
6972  break;
6973  case ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_TYPE_PRISMATIC_SOCKET:
6974  {
6975  uint32 numSockets = 0;
6976  for (uint32 socket = 0; socket < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SOCKETS; ++socket)
6977  if (targetItem->GetTemplate()->Socket[socket].Color)
6978  ++numSockets;
6979 
6980  if (numSockets == MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SOCKETS || targetItem->GetEnchantmentId(PRISMATIC_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT))
6981  return SPELL_FAILED_MAX_SOCKETS;
6982  break;
6983  }
6984  }
6985  }
6986  }
6987 
6988  // Not allow enchant in trade slot for some enchant type
6989  if (targetItem->GetOwner() != m_caster)
6990  {
6991  if (!enchantEntry)
6992  return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
6993  if (enchantEntry->slot & ENCHANTMENT_CAN_SOULBOUND)
6994  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADEABLE;
6995  }
6996  break;
6997  }
6998  case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM_TEMPORARY:
6999  {
7000  Item* item = m_targets.GetItemTarget();
7001  if (!item)
7002  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
7003  // Not allow enchant in trade slot for some enchant type
7004  if (item->GetOwner() != m_caster)
7005  {
7006  uint32 enchant_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue;
7007  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(enchant_id);
7008  if (!pEnchant)
7009  return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
7010  if (pEnchant->slot & ENCHANTMENT_CAN_SOULBOUND)
7011  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADEABLE;
7012  }
7013 
7014  // Xinef: Apply item level restriction if the enchanting spell has max level restrition set
7015  if (m_CastItem && m_spellInfo->MaxLevel > 0)
7016  {
7017  if (item->GetTemplate()->ItemLevel < m_CastItem->GetTemplate()->RequiredLevel)
7018  return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
7019  if (item->GetTemplate()->ItemLevel > m_spellInfo->MaxLevel)
7020  return SPELL_FAILED_HIGHLEVEL;
7021  }
7022 
7023  break;
7024  }
7025  case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_HELD_ITEM:
7026  // check item existence in effect code (not output errors at offhand hold item effect to main hand for example
7027  break;
7028  case SPELL_EFFECT_DISENCHANT:
7029  {
7030  if (!m_targets.GetItemTarget())
7031  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7032 
7033  // prevent disenchanting in trade slot
7034  if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
7035  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7036 
7037  ItemTemplate const* itemProto = m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetTemplate();
7038  if (!itemProto)
7039  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7040 
7041  uint32 item_quality = itemProto->Quality;
7042  // 2.0.x addon: Check player enchanting level against the item disenchanting requirements
7043  uint32 item_disenchantskilllevel = itemProto->RequiredDisenchantSkill;
7044  if (item_disenchantskilllevel == uint32(-1))
7045  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7046  if (item_disenchantskilllevel > player->GetSkillValue(SKILL_ENCHANTING))
7047  return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
7048  if (item_quality > 4 || item_quality < 2)
7049  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7050  if (itemProto->Class != ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON && itemProto->Class != ITEM_CLASS_ARMOR)
7051  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7052  if (!itemProto->DisenchantID)
7053  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7054  break;
7055  }
7056  case SPELL_EFFECT_PROSPECTING:
7057  {
7058  if (!m_targets.GetItemTarget())
7059  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
7060  //ensure item is a prospectable ore
7061  if (!(m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetTemplate()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_IS_PROSPECTABLE))
7062  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
7063  //prevent prospecting in trade slot
7064  if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
7065  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
7066  //Check for enough skill in jewelcrafting
7067  uint32 item_prospectingskilllevel = m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetTemplate()->RequiredSkillRank;
7068  if (item_prospectingskilllevel > player->GetSkillValue(SKILL_JEWELCRAFTING))
7069  return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
7070  //make sure the player has the required ores in inventory
7071  if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetCount() < 5)
7072  return SPELL_FAILED_NEED_MORE_ITEMS;
7073 
7074  if (!LootTemplates_Prospecting.HaveLootFor(m_targets.GetItemTargetEntry()))
7075  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
7076 
7077  break;
7078  }
7079  case SPELL_EFFECT_MILLING:
7080  {
7081  if (!m_targets.GetItemTarget())
7082  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
7083  //ensure item is a millable herb
7084  if (!(m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetTemplate()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_IS_MILLABLE))
7085  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
7086  //prevent milling in trade slot
7087  if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
7088  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
7089  //Check for enough skill in inscription
7090  uint32 item_millingskilllevel = m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetTemplate()->RequiredSkillRank;
7091  if (item_millingskilllevel > player->GetSkillValue(SKILL_INSCRIPTION))
7092  return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
7093  //make sure the player has the required herbs in inventory
7094  if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetCount() < 5)
7095  return SPELL_FAILED_NEED_MORE_ITEMS;
7096 
7097  if (!LootTemplates_Milling.HaveLootFor(m_targets.GetItemTargetEntry()))
7098  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
7099 
7100  break;
7101  }
7102  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE:
7103  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE_NOSCHOOL:
7104  {
7105  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7106  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_PLAYER;
7107 
7108  if (m_attackType != RANGED_ATTACK)
7109  break;
7110 
7111  Item* pItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(m_attackType);
7112  if (!pItem || pItem->IsBroken())
7113  return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM;
7114 
7115  switch (pItem->GetTemplate()->SubClass)
7116  {
7117  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_THROWN:
7118  {
7119  uint32 ammo = pItem->GetEntry();
7120  if (!m_caster->ToPlayer()->HasItemCount(ammo))
7121  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7122  };
7123  break;
7124  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_GUN:
7125  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_BOW:
7126  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_CROSSBOW:
7127  {
7128  uint32 ammo = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_AMMO_ID);
7129  if (!ammo)
7130  {
7131  // Requires No Ammo
7132  if (m_caster->HasAura(46699))
7133  break; // skip other checks
7134 
7135  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7136  }
7137 
7138  ItemTemplate const* ammoProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(ammo);
7139  if (!ammoProto)
7140  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7141 
7142  if (ammoProto->Class != ITEM_CLASS_PROJECTILE)
7143  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7144 
7145  // check ammo ws. weapon compatibility
7146  switch (pItem->GetTemplate()->SubClass)
7147  {
7148  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_BOW:
7149  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_CROSSBOW:
7150  if (ammoProto->SubClass != ITEM_SUBCLASS_ARROW)
7151  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7152  break;
7153  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_GUN:
7154  if (ammoProto->SubClass != ITEM_SUBCLASS_BULLET)
7155  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7156  break;
7157  default:
7158  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7159  }
7160 
7161  if (!m_caster->ToPlayer()->HasItemCount(ammo))
7162  {
7163  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_AMMO_ID, 0);
7164  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7165  }
7166  };
7167  break;
7168  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_WAND:
7169  break;
7170  default:
7171  break;
7172  }
7173  break;
7174  }
7175  case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_MANA_GEM:
7176  {
7177  uint32 item_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType;
7178  ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(item_id);
7179 
7180  if (!pProto)
7181  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_AT_MAX_CHARGES;
7182 
7183  if (Item* pitem = player->GetItemByEntry(item_id))
7184  {
7185  for (int x = 0; x < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++x)
7186  if (pProto->Spells[x].SpellCharges != 0 && pitem->GetSpellCharges(x) == pProto->Spells[x].SpellCharges)
7187  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_AT_MAX_CHARGES;
7188  }
7189  break;
7190  }
7191  default:
7192  break;
7193  }
7194  }
7195 
7196  // check weapon presence in slots for main/offhand weapons
7197  if (/*never skip those checks !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_EQUIPPED_ITEM_REQUIREMENT) &&*/ m_spellInfo->EquippedItemClass >= 0)
7198  {
7199  // main hand weapon required
7200  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_REQUIRES_MAIN_HAND_WEAPON))
7201  {
7202  Item* item = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(BASE_ATTACK);
7203 
7204  // skip spell if no weapon in slot or broken
7205  if (!item || item->IsBroken())
7206  return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_MAINHAND;
7207 
7208  // skip spell if weapon not fit to triggered spell
7209  if (!item->IsFitToSpellRequirements(m_spellInfo))
7210  return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_MAINHAND;
7211  }
7212 
7213  // offhand hand weapon required
7214  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_REQUIRES_OFF_HAND_WEAPON))
7215  {
7216  Item* item = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(OFF_ATTACK);
7217 
7218  // skip spell if no weapon in slot or broken
7219  if (!item || item->IsBroken())
7220  return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_OFFHAND;
7221 
7222  // skip spell if weapon not fit to triggered spell
7223  if (!item->IsFitToSpellRequirements(m_spellInfo))
7224  return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_OFFHAND;
7225  }
7226 
7227  m_weaponItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(m_attackType, true);
7228  }
7229 
7230  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7231 }
7232 
7233 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckSpellFocus()
7234 {
7235  // check spell focus object
7236  if (m_spellInfo->RequiresSpellFocus)
7237  {
7238  CellCoord p(Acore::ComputeCellCoord(m_caster->GetPositionX(), m_caster->GetPositionY()));
7239  Cell cell(p);
7240 
7241  GameObject* ok = nullptr;
7242  Acore::GameObjectFocusCheck go_check(m_caster, m_spellInfo->RequiresSpellFocus);
7243  Acore::GameObjectSearcher<Acore::GameObjectFocusCheck> checker(m_caster, ok, go_check);
7244 
7245  TypeContainerVisitor<Acore::GameObjectSearcher<Acore::GameObjectFocusCheck>, GridTypeMapContainer > object_checker(checker);
7246  Map& map = *m_caster->GetMap();
7247  cell.Visit(p, object_checker, map, *m_caster, m_caster->GetVisibilityRange());
7248 
7249  if (!ok)
7250  return SPELL_FAILED_REQUIRES_SPELL_FOCUS;
7251 
7252  focusObject = ok; // game object found in range
7253  }
7254  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7255 }
7256 
7257 void Spell::Delayed() // only called in DealDamage()
7258 {
7259  if (!m_caster)// || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7260  return;
7261 
7262  //if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_DELAYED)
7263  // return; // spell is active and can't be time-backed
7264 
7265  if (isDelayableNoMore()) // Spells may only be delayed twice
7266  return;
7267 
7268  // spells not loosing casting time (slam, dynamites, bombs..)
7269  //if (!(m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DAMAGE))
7270  // return;
7271 
7272  //check pushback reduce
7273  int32 delaytime = 500; // spellcasting delay is normally 500ms
7274  int32 delayReduce = 100; // must be initialized to 100 for percent modifiers
7275  m_caster->ToPlayer()->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_NOT_LOSE_CASTING_TIME, delayReduce, this);
7276  delayReduce += m_caster->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_REDUCE_PUSHBACK) - 100;
7277  if (delayReduce >= 100)
7278  return;
7279 
7280  AddPct(delaytime, -delayReduce);
7281 
7282  if (m_timer + delaytime > m_casttime)
7283  {
7284  delaytime = m_casttime - m_timer;
7285  m_timer = m_casttime;
7286  }
7287  else
7288  m_timer += delaytime;
7289 
7290  LOG_DEBUG("spells", "Spell %u partially interrupted for (%d) ms at damage", m_spellInfo->Id, delaytime);
7291 
7292  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_DELAYED, 8 + 4);
7293  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
7294  data << uint32(delaytime);
7295 
7296  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
7297 }
7298 
7299 void Spell::DelayedChannel()
7300 {
7301  if (!m_caster || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || getState() != SPELL_STATE_CASTING)
7302  return;
7303 
7304  if (isDelayableNoMore()) // Spells may only be delayed twice
7305  return;
7306 
7307  //check pushback reduce
7308  // should be affected by modifiers, not take the dbc duration.
7309  int32 duration = ((m_channeledDuration > 0) ? m_channeledDuration : m_spellInfo->GetDuration());
7310 
7311  int32 delaytime = CalculatePct(duration, 25); // channeling delay is normally 25% of its time per hit
7312  int32 delayReduce = 100; // must be initialized to 100 for percent modifiers
7313  m_caster->ToPlayer()->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_NOT_LOSE_CASTING_TIME, delayReduce, this);
7314  delayReduce += m_caster->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_REDUCE_PUSHBACK) - 100;
7315  if (delayReduce >= 100)
7316  return;
7317 
7318  AddPct(delaytime, -delayReduce);
7319 
7320  if (m_timer <= delaytime)
7321  {
7322  delaytime = m_timer;
7323  m_timer = 0;
7324  }
7325  else
7326  m_timer -= delaytime;
7327 
7328  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell %u partially interrupted for %i ms, new duration: %u ms", m_spellInfo->Id, delaytime, m_timer);
7329 
7330  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
7331  if ((*ihit).missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
7332  if (Unit* unit = (m_caster->GetGUID() == ihit->targetGUID) ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID))
7333  unit->DelayOwnedAuras(m_spellInfo->Id, m_originalCasterGUID, delaytime);
7334 
7335  // partially interrupt persistent area auras
7336  if (DynamicObject* dynObj = m_caster->GetDynObject(m_spellInfo->Id))
7337  dynObj->Delay(delaytime);
7338 
7339  SendChannelUpdate(m_timer);
7340 }
7341 
7342 bool Spell::UpdatePointers()
7343 {
7344  if (m_originalCasterGUID == m_caster->GetGUID())
7345  m_originalCaster = m_caster;
7346  else
7347  {
7348  m_originalCaster = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, m_originalCasterGUID);
7349  if (m_originalCaster && !m_originalCaster->IsInWorld())
7350  m_originalCaster = nullptr;
7351  }
7352 
7353  if (m_castItemGUID && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7354  {
7355  m_CastItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetItemByGuid(m_castItemGUID);
7356  // cast item not found, somehow the item is no longer where we expected
7357  if (!m_CastItem)
7358  return false;
7359  }
7360  else
7361  m_CastItem = nullptr;
7362 
7363  m_targets.Update(m_caster);
7364 
7365  // further actions done only for dest targets
7366  if (!m_targets.HasDst())
7367  return true;
7368 
7369  // cache last transport
7370  WorldObject* transport = nullptr;
7371 
7372  // update effect destinations (in case of moved transport dest target)
7373  for (uint8 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
7374  {
7375  SpellDestination& dest = m_destTargets[effIndex];
7376  if (!dest._transportGUID)
7377  continue;
7378 
7379  if (!transport || transport->GetGUID() != dest._transportGUID)
7380  transport = ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*m_caster, dest._transportGUID);
7381 
7382  if (transport)
7383  {
7384  dest._position.Relocate(transport);
7385  dest._position.RelocateOffset(dest._transportOffset);
7386  }
7387  }
7388 
7389  return true;
7390 }
7391 
7392 CurrentSpellTypes Spell::GetCurrentContainer() const
7393 {
7394  if (IsNextMeleeSwingSpell())
7395  return(CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL);
7396  else if (IsAutoRepeat())
7397  return(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
7398  else if (m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
7399  return(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL);
7400  else
7401  return(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL);
7402 }
7403 
7404 bool Spell::CheckEffectTarget(Unit const* target, uint32 eff) const
7405 {
7406  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[eff].ApplyAuraName)
7407  {
7408  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS:
7409  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM:
7410  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS_PET:
7411  case SPELL_AURA_AOE_CHARM:
7412  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->IsVehicle())
7413  return false;
7414  if (target->IsMounted())
7415  return false;
7416  if (target->GetCharmerGUID())
7417  return false;
7418  if (int32 damage = CalculateSpellDamage(eff, target))
7419  if ((int32)target->getLevel() > damage)
7420  return false;
7421  break;
7422  default:
7423  break;
7424  }
7425 
7426  // xinef: skip los checking if spell has appropriate attribute, or target requires specific entry
7427  // this is only for target addition and target has to have unselectable flag, this is valid for FLAG_EXTRA_TRIGGER and quest triggers however there are some without this flag, used not_selectable
7428  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_IGNORE_LINE_OF_SIGHT) || (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE) && (m_spellInfo->Effects[eff].TargetA.GetCheckType() == TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY || m_spellInfo->Effects[eff].TargetB.GetCheckType() == TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY)))
7429  return true;
7430 
7431  // if spell is triggered, need to check for LOS disable on the aura triggering it and inherit that behaviour
7432  if (IsTriggered() && m_triggeredByAuraSpell && (m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_IGNORE_LINE_OF_SIGHT) ||
7433  DisableMgr::IsDisabledFor(DISABLE_TYPE_SPELL, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo->Id, nullptr, SPELL_DISABLE_LOS)))
7434  {
7435  return true;
7436  }
7437 
7438  // todo: shit below shouldn't be here, but it's temporary
7439  //Check targets for LOS visibility (except spells without range limitations)
7440  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[eff].Effect)
7441  {
7442  case SPELL_EFFECT_RESURRECT_NEW:
7443  // player far away, maybe his corpse near?
7444  if (target != m_caster && !target->IsWithinLOSInMap(m_caster, LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS))
7445  {
7446  if (!m_targets.GetCorpseTargetGUID())
7447  return false;
7448 
7449  Corpse* corpse = ObjectAccessor::GetCorpse(*m_caster, m_targets.GetCorpseTargetGUID());
7450  if (!corpse)
7451  return false;
7452 
7453  if (target->GetGUID() != corpse->GetOwnerGUID())
7454  return false;
7455 
7456  if (!corpse->IsWithinLOSInMap(m_caster, LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS) && !(m_spellFlags & SPELL_FLAG_REDIRECTED))
7457  return false;
7458  }
7459  break;
7460  case SPELL_EFFECT_SKIN_PLAYER_CORPSE:
7461  {
7462  if (!m_targets.GetCorpseTargetGUID())
7463  {
7464  if (target->IsWithinLOSInMap(m_caster, LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS) && target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE))
7465  return true;
7466 
7467  return false;
7468  }
7469 
7470  Corpse* corpse = ObjectAccessor::GetCorpse(*m_caster, m_targets.GetCorpseTargetGUID());
7471  if (!corpse)
7472  return false;
7473 
7474  if (target->GetGUID() != corpse->GetOwnerGUID())
7475  return false;
7476 
7477  if (!corpse->HasFlag(CORPSE_FIELD_FLAGS, CORPSE_FLAG_LOOTABLE))
7478  return false;
7479 
7480  if (!corpse->IsWithinLOSInMap(m_caster, LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS))
7481  return false;
7482  }
7483  break;
7484  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_RAF_FRIEND:
7485  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7486  return false;
7487  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->IsARecruiter() && target->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->GetRecruiterId() != m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->GetAccountId())
7488  return false;
7489  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->GetRecruiterId() != target->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->GetAccountId() && target->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->IsARecruiter())
7490  return false;
7491  if (target->ToPlayer()->getLevel() >= sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_RECRUIT_A_FRIEND_BONUS_PLAYER_LEVEL))
7492  return false;
7493  break;
7494 
7495  default: // normal case
7496  // Get GO cast coordinates if original caster -> GO
7497  WorldObject* caster = nullptr;
7498  if (m_originalCasterGUID.IsGameObject())
7499  caster = m_caster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(m_originalCasterGUID);
7500  if (!caster)
7501  caster = m_caster;
7502  if (target != m_caster)
7503  {
7504  if (m_targets.HasDst())
7505  {
7506  float x = m_targets.GetDstPos()->GetPositionX();
7507  float y = m_targets.GetDstPos()->GetPositionY();
7508  float z = m_targets.GetDstPos()->GetPositionZ();
7509 
7510  if (!target->IsWithinLOS(x, y, z, LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS))
7511  return false;
7512  }
7513  else if (!target->IsWithinLOSInMap(caster, LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS))
7514  return false;
7515  }
7516  break;
7517  }
7518 
7519  return true;
7520 }
7521 
7522 bool Spell::IsNextMeleeSwingSpell() const
7523 {
7524  return m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ON_NEXT_SWING_NO_DAMAGE);
7525 }
7526 
7527 bool Spell::IsIgnoringCooldowns() const
7528 {
7529  return (_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SPELL_AND_CATEGORY_CD) != 0;
7530 }
7531 
7532 bool Spell::IsAutoActionResetSpell() const
7533 {
7535  if (IsTriggered() || !(m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_INTERRUPT))
7536  {
7537  return false;
7538  }
7539 
7540  if (!m_casttime && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR6_DOESNT_RESET_SWING_TIMER_IF_INSTANT))
7541  {
7542  return false;
7543  }
7544 
7545  return true;
7546 }
7547 
7548 bool Spell::IsNeedSendToClient(bool go) const
7549 {
7550  return m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[0] || m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[1] || m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() ||
7551  m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f || (!m_triggeredByAuraSpell && !IsTriggered()) ||
7552  (go && m_triggeredByAuraSpell && m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo->IsChanneled());
7553 }
7554 
7555 bool Spell::HaveTargetsForEffect(uint8 effect) const
7556 {
7557  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::const_iterator itr = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); itr != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++itr)
7558  if (itr->effectMask & (1 << effect))
7559  return true;
7560 
7561  for (std::list<GOTargetInfo>::const_iterator itr = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); itr != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end(); ++itr)
7562  if (itr->effectMask & (1 << effect))
7563  return true;
7564 
7565  for (std::list<ItemTargetInfo>::const_iterator itr = m_UniqueItemInfo.begin(); itr != m_UniqueItemInfo.end(); ++itr)
7566  if (itr->effectMask & (1 << effect))
7567  return true;
7568 
7569  return false;
7570 }
7571 
7572 SpellEvent::SpellEvent(Spell* spell) : BasicEvent()
7573 {
7574  m_Spell = spell;
7575 }
7576 
7577 SpellEvent::~SpellEvent()
7578 {
7579  if (m_Spell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
7580  m_Spell->cancel();
7581 
7582  if (m_Spell->IsDeletable())
7583  {
7584  delete m_Spell;
7585  }
7586  else
7587  {
7588  LOG_ERROR("spells", "~SpellEvent: %s %s tried to delete non-deletable spell %u. Was not deleted, causes memory leak.",
7589  (m_Spell->GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? "Player" : "Creature"), m_Spell->GetCaster()->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), m_Spell->m_spellInfo->Id);
7590  ABORT();
7591  }
7592 }
7593 
7594 bool SpellEvent::Execute(uint64 e_time, uint32 p_time)
7595 {
7596  // update spell if it is not finished
7597  if (m_Spell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
7598  m_Spell->update(p_time);
7599 
7600  // check spell state to process
7601  switch (m_Spell->getState())
7602  {
7603  case SPELL_STATE_FINISHED:
7604  {
7605  // spell was finished, check deletable state
7606  if (m_Spell->IsDeletable())
7607  {
7608  // check, if we do have unfinished triggered spells
7609  return true; // spell is deletable, finish event
7610  }
7611  // event will be re-added automatically at the end of routine)
7612  }
7613  break;
7614 
7615  case SPELL_STATE_DELAYED:
7616  {
7617  // first, check, if we have just started
7618  if (m_Spell->GetDelayStart() != 0)
7619  {
7620  {
7621  // run the spell handler and think about what we can do next
7622  uint64 t_offset = e_time - m_Spell->GetDelayStart();
7623  uint64 n_offset = m_Spell->handle_delayed(t_offset);
7624  if (n_offset)
7625  {
7626  // re-add us to the queue
7627  m_Spell->GetCaster()->m_Events.AddEvent(this, m_Spell->GetDelayStart() + n_offset, false);
7628  return false; // event not complete
7629  }
7630  // event complete
7631  // finish update event will be re-added automatically at the end of routine)
7632  }
7633  }
7634  else
7635  {
7636  // delaying had just started, record the moment
7637  m_Spell->SetDelayStart(e_time);
7638  // re-plan the event for the delay moment
7639  m_Spell->GetCaster()->m_Events.AddEvent(this, e_time + m_Spell->GetDelayMoment(), false);
7640  return false; // event not complete
7641  }
7642  }
7643  break;
7644 
7645  default:
7646  {
7647  // all other states
7648  // event will be re-added automatically at the end of routine)
7649  } break;
7650  }
7651 
7652  // spell processing not complete, plan event on the next update interval
7653  m_Spell->GetCaster()->m_Events.AddEvent(this, e_time + 1, false);
7654  return false; // event not complete
7655 }
7656 
7657 void SpellEvent::Abort(uint64 /*e_time*/)
7658 {
7659  // oops, the spell we try to do is aborted
7660  if (m_Spell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
7661  m_Spell->cancel();
7662 }
7663 
7664 bool SpellEvent::IsDeletable() const
7665 {
7666  return m_Spell->IsDeletable();
7667 }
7668 
7669 bool ReflectEvent::Execute(uint64 /*e_time*/, uint32 /*p_time*/)
7670 {
7671  Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*_caster, _targetGUID);
7672  if (target && _caster->IsInMap(target))
7673  _caster->ProcDamageAndSpell(target, PROC_FLAG_NONE, PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_NEG, PROC_EX_REFLECT, 1, BASE_ATTACK, _spellInfo);
7674  return true;
7675 }
7676 
7677 bool Spell::IsValidDeadOrAliveTarget(Unit const* target) const
7678 {
7679  if (target->IsAlive())
7680  return !m_spellInfo->IsRequiringDeadTarget();
7681 
7682  return m_spellInfo->IsAllowingDeadTarget();
7683 }
7684 
7685 void Spell::HandleLaunchPhase()
7686 {
7687  // handle effects with SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH mode
7688  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
7689  {
7690  // don't do anything for empty effect
7691  if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsEffect())
7692  continue;
7693 
7694  HandleEffects(nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, i, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH);
7695  }
7696 
7697  float multiplier[MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS];
7698  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
7699  if (m_applyMultiplierMask & (1 << i))
7700  multiplier[i] = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].CalcDamageMultiplier(m_originalCaster, this);
7701 
7702  bool usesAmmo = m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
7703  Unit::AuraEffectList const& Auras = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_ABILITY_CONSUME_NO_AMMO);
7704  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator j = Auras.begin(); j != Auras.end(); ++j)
7705  {
7706  if ((*j)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
7707  usesAmmo = false;
7708  }
7709 
7710  bool firstTarget = true;
7711  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
7712  {
7713  TargetInfo& target = *ihit;
7714 
7715  uint32 mask = target.effectMask;
7716  if (!mask)
7717  continue;
7718 
7719  // do not consume ammo anymore for Hunter's volley spell
7720  if (IsTriggered() && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER && m_spellInfo->IsTargetingArea())
7721  usesAmmo = false;
7722 
7723  if (usesAmmo)
7724  {
7725  bool ammoTaken = false;
7726  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; i++)
7727  {
7728  if (!(mask & 1 << i))
7729  continue;
7730  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect)
7731  {
7732  case SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE:
7733  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE:
7734  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE_NOSCHOOL:
7735  case SPELL_EFFECT_NORMALIZED_WEAPON_DMG:
7736  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_PERCENT_DAMAGE:
7737  ammoTaken = true;
7738  TakeAmmo();
7739  }
7740  if (ammoTaken)
7741  break;
7742  }
7743  }
7744  DoAllEffectOnLaunchTarget(target, multiplier, firstTarget);
7745  firstTarget = false;
7746  }
7747 }
7748 
7749 void Spell::DoAllEffectOnLaunchTarget(TargetInfo& targetInfo, float* multiplier, bool firstTarget)
7750 {
7751  Unit* unit = nullptr;
7752  // In case spell hit target, do all effect on that target
7753  if (targetInfo.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
7754  unit = m_caster->GetGUID() == targetInfo.targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, targetInfo.targetGUID);
7755  // In case spell reflect from target, do all effect on caster (if hit)
7756  else if (targetInfo.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT && targetInfo.reflectResult == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
7757  unit = m_caster;
7758  if (!unit)
7759  return;
7760 
7761  uint8 ssEffect = MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS;
7762  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
7763  {
7764  if (targetInfo.effectMask & (1 << i))
7765  {
7766  m_damage = 0;
7767  m_healing = 0;
7768 
7769  HandleEffects(unit, nullptr, nullptr, i, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET);
7770 
7771  if (m_damage > 0)
7772  {
7773  // Xinef: Area Auras, AoE Targetting spells AND Chain Target spells (cleave etc.)
7774  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsAreaAuraEffect() || m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsTargetingArea() || (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ChainTarget > 1 && m_spellInfo->DmgClass != SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC))
7775  {
7776  m_damage = unit->CalculateAOEDamageReduction(m_damage, m_spellInfo->SchoolMask, m_caster);
7777  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7778  {
7779  uint32 targetAmount = m_UniqueTargetInfo.size();
7780  if (targetAmount > 10)
7781  m_damage = m_damage * 10 / targetAmount;
7782  }
7783  }
7784  }
7785 
7786  if (m_applyMultiplierMask & (1 << i))
7787  {
7788  m_damage = int32(m_damage * m_damageMultipliers[i]);
7789  m_damageMultipliers[i] *= multiplier[i];
7790  }
7791  targetInfo.damage += m_damage;
7792 
7793  // Sweeping Strikes
7794  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect)
7795  {
7796  case SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE:
7797  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE:
7798  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE_NOSCHOOL:
7799  case SPELL_EFFECT_NORMALIZED_WEAPON_DMG:
7800  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_PERCENT_DAMAGE:
7801  ssEffect = i;
7802  break;
7803  }
7804  }
7805  }
7806 
7807  // xinef: totem's inherit owner crit chance and dancing rune weapon
7808  Unit* caster = m_caster;
7809  if (m_caster->IsTotem() || m_caster->GetEntry() == 27893)
7810  {
7811  if (Unit* owner = m_caster->GetOwner())
7812  caster = owner;
7813  }
7814  else if (m_originalCaster)
7815  caster = m_originalCaster;
7816 
7817  float critChance = caster->SpellDoneCritChance(unit, m_spellInfo, m_spellSchoolMask, m_attackType, false);
7818  critChance = unit->SpellTakenCritChance(caster, m_spellInfo, m_spellSchoolMask, critChance, m_attackType, false);
7819  targetInfo.crit = roll_chance_f(std::max(0.0f, critChance));
7820 
7821  // Sweeping strikes wtf shit ;d
7822  if (m_caster->getClass() == CLASS_WARRIOR && ssEffect < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR &&
7823  ((m_spellInfo->Id != 50622 && m_spellInfo->Id != 44949) || firstTarget))
7824  {
7825  if (Aura* aur = m_caster->GetAura(12328))
7826  {
7827  Unit* target = m_caster->SelectNearbyNoTotemTarget(unit);
7828  if (!target || target == unit)
7829  return; // finish
7830 
7831  int32 mdmg = m_damage;
7832  int32 basepoints = 0;
7833  m_damage = 0;
7834 
7835  HandleEffects(target, nullptr, nullptr, ssEffect, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET);
7836 
7837  basepoints = (targetInfo.crit ? Unit::SpellCriticalDamageBonus(m_caster, m_spellInfo, m_damage, target) : m_damage);
7838  m_damage = mdmg;
7839  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(target, 26654, &basepoints, nullptr, nullptr, true);
7840 
7841  if (m_spellInfo->Id != 44949)
7842  aur->DropCharge();
7843  }
7844  }
7845 }
7846 
7847 SpellCastResult Spell::CanOpenLock(uint32 effIndex, uint32 lockId, SkillType& skillId, int32& reqSkillValue, int32& skillValue)
7848 {
7849  if (!lockId) // possible case for GO and maybe for items.
7850  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7851 
7852  // Get LockInfo
7853  LockEntry const* lockInfo = sLockStore.LookupEntry(lockId);
7854 
7855  if (!lockInfo)
7856  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7857 
7858  bool reqKey = false; // some locks not have reqs
7859 
7860  for (int j = 0; j < MAX_LOCK_CASE; ++j)
7861  {
7862  switch (lockInfo->Type[j])
7863  {
7864  // check key item (many fit cases can be)
7865  case LOCK_KEY_ITEM:
7866  if (lockInfo->Index[j] && m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetEntry() == lockInfo->Index[j])
7867  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7868  reqKey = true;
7869  break;
7870  // check key skill (only single first fit case can be)
7871  case LOCK_KEY_SKILL:
7872  {
7873  reqKey = true;
7874 
7875  // wrong locktype, skip
7876  if (uint32(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue) != lockInfo->Index[j])
7877  continue;
7878 
7879  skillId = SkillByLockType(LockType(lockInfo->Index[j]));
7880 
7881  if (skillId != SKILL_NONE)
7882  {
7883  reqSkillValue = lockInfo->Skill[j];
7884 
7885  // castitem check: rogue using skeleton keys. the skill values should not be added in this case.
7886  skillValue = m_CastItem || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER ?
7887  0 : m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSkillValue(skillId);
7888 
7889  // skill bonus provided by casting spell (mostly item spells)
7890  // add the effect base points modifier from the spell casted (cheat lock / skeleton key etc.)
7891  if ((m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_ITEM_TARGET || m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TargetB.GetTarget() == TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_ITEM_TARGET)
7892  && !m_spellInfo->IsAbilityOfSkillType(SKILL_LOCKPICKING))
7893  {
7894  skillValue += m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcValue();
7895  }
7896 
7897  if (skillValue < reqSkillValue)
7898  return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
7899  }
7900 
7901  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7902  }
7903  case LOCK_KEY_SPELL:
7904  {
7905  if (m_spellInfo->Id == lockInfo->Index[j])
7906  {
7907  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7908  }
7909  reqKey = true;
7910  break;
7911  }
7912  }
7913  }
7914 
7915  if (reqKey)
7916  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7917 
7918  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7919 }
7920 
7921 void Spell::SetSpellValue(SpellValueMod mod, int32 value)
7922 {
7923  switch (mod)
7924  {
7925  case SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0:
7926  m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[0] = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_0].CalcBaseValue(value);
7927  break;
7928  case SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT1:
7929  m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[1] = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcBaseValue(value);
7930  break;
7931  case SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT2:
7932  m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[2] = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_2].CalcBaseValue(value);
7933  break;
7934  case SPELLVALUE_RADIUS_MOD:
7935  m_spellValue->RadiusMod = (float)value / 10000;
7936  break;
7937  case SPELLVALUE_MAX_TARGETS:
7938  m_spellValue->MaxAffectedTargets = (uint32)value;
7939  break;
7940  case SPELLVALUE_AURA_STACK:
7941  m_spellValue->AuraStackAmount = uint8(value);
7942  break;
7943  case SPELLVALUE_AURA_DURATION:
7944  m_spellValue->AuraDuration = value;
7945  break;
7946  case SPELLVALUE_FORCED_CRIT_RESULT:
7947  m_spellValue->ForcedCritResult = (bool)value;
7948  break;
7949  }
7950 }
7951 
7952 void Spell::PrepareTargetProcessing()
7953 {
7954  CheckEffectExecuteData();
7955 }
7956 
7957 void Spell::FinishTargetProcessing()
7958 {
7959  SendLogExecute();
7960 }
7961 
7962 void Spell::InitEffectExecuteData(uint8 effIndex)
7963 {
7964  ASSERT(effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS);
7965  if (!m_effectExecuteData[effIndex])
7966  {
7967  m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] = new ByteBuffer(0x20);
7968  // first dword - target counter
7969  *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << uint32(1);
7970  }
7971  else
7972  {
7973  // increase target counter by one
7974  uint32 count = (*m_effectExecuteData[effIndex]).read<uint32>(0);
7975  (*m_effectExecuteData[effIndex]).put<uint32>(0, ++count);
7976  }
7977 }
7978 
7979 void Spell::CheckEffectExecuteData()
7980 {
7981  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
7982  ASSERT(!m_effectExecuteData[i]);
7983 }
7984 
7985 void Spell::LoadScripts()
7986 {
7987  if (_scriptsLoaded)
7988  return;
7989  _scriptsLoaded = true;
7990  sScriptMgr->CreateSpellScripts(m_spellInfo->Id, m_loadedScripts);
7991  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator itr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); itr != m_loadedScripts.end();)
7992  {
7993  if (!(*itr)->_Load(this))
7994  {
7995  std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator bitr = itr;
7996  ++itr;
7997  delete (*bitr);
7998  m_loadedScripts.erase(bitr);
7999  continue;
8000  }
8001  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell::LoadScripts: Script `%s` for spell `%u` is loaded now", (*itr)->_GetScriptName()->c_str(), m_spellInfo->Id);
8002  (*itr)->Register();
8003  ++itr;
8004  }
8005 }
8006 
8007 void Spell::CallScriptBeforeCastHandlers()
8008 {
8009  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8010  {
8011  (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_BEFORE_CAST);
8012  std::list<SpellScript::CastHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->BeforeCast.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->BeforeCast.begin();
8013  for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8014  (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8015 
8016  (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8017  }
8018 }
8019 
8020 void Spell::CallScriptOnCastHandlers()
8021 {
8022  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8023  {
8024  (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_ON_CAST);
8025  std::list<SpellScript::CastHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnCast.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnCast.begin();
8026  for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8027  (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8028 
8029  (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8030  }
8031 }
8032 
8033 void Spell::CallScriptAfterCastHandlers()
8034 {
8035  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8036  {
8037  (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_AFTER_CAST);
8038  std::list<SpellScript::CastHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->AfterCast.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->AfterCast.begin();
8039  for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8040  (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8041 
8042  (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8043  }
8044 }
8045 
8046 SpellCastResult Spell::CallScriptCheckCastHandlers()
8047 {
8048  SpellCastResult retVal = SPELL_CAST_OK;
8049  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8050  {
8051  (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_CHECK_CAST);
8052  std::list<SpellScript::CheckCastHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnCheckCast.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnCheckCast.begin();
8053  for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8054  {
8055  SpellCastResult tempResult = (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8056  if (retVal == SPELL_CAST_OK)
8057  retVal = tempResult;
8058  }
8059 
8060  (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8061  }
8062  return retVal;
8063 }
8064 
8065 void Spell::PrepareScriptHitHandlers()
8066 {
8067  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8068  (*scritr)->_InitHit();
8069 }
8070 
8071 bool Spell::CallScriptEffectHandlers(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellEffectHandleMode mode)
8072 {
8073  // execute script effect handler hooks and check if effects was prevented
8074  bool preventDefault = false;
8075  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8076  {
8077  std::list<SpellScript::EffectHandler>::iterator effItr, effEndItr;
8078  SpellScriptHookType hookType;
8079  switch (mode)
8080  {
8081  case SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH:
8082  effItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectLaunch.begin();
8083  effEndItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectLaunch.end();
8084  hookType = SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_EFFECT_LAUNCH;
8085  break;
8086  case SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET:
8087  effItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectLaunchTarget.begin();
8088  effEndItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectLaunchTarget.end();
8089  hookType = SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_EFFECT_LAUNCH_TARGET;
8090  break;
8091  case SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT:
8092  effItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectHit.begin();
8093  effEndItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectHit.end();
8094  hookType = SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_EFFECT_HIT;
8095  break;
8096  case SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET:
8097  effItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectHitTarget.begin();
8098  effEndItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectHitTarget.end();
8099  hookType = SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_EFFECT_HIT_TARGET;
8100  break;
8101  default:
8102  ABORT();
8103  return false;
8104  }
8105  (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(hookType);
8106  for (; effItr != effEndItr; ++effItr)
8107  // effect execution can be prevented
8108  if (!(*scritr)->_IsEffectPrevented(effIndex) && (*effItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex))
8109  (*effItr).Call(*scritr, effIndex);
8110 
8111  if (!preventDefault)
8112  preventDefault = (*scritr)->_IsDefaultEffectPrevented(effIndex);
8113 
8114  (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8115  }
8116  return preventDefault;
8117 }
8118 
8119 void Spell::CallScriptBeforeHitHandlers(SpellMissInfo missInfo)
8120 {
8121  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8122  {
8123  (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_BEFORE_HIT);
8124  std::list<SpellScript::BeforeHitHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->BeforeHit.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->BeforeHit.begin();
8125  for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8126  (*hookItr).Call(*scritr, missInfo);
8127 
8128  (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8129  }
8130 }
8131 
8132 void Spell::CallScriptOnHitHandlers()
8133 {
8134  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8135  {
8136  (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_HIT);
8137  std::list<SpellScript::HitHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnHit.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnHit.begin();
8138  for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8139  (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8140 
8141  (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8142  }
8143 }
8144 
8145 void Spell::CallScriptAfterHitHandlers()
8146 {
8147  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8148  {
8149  (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_AFTER_HIT);
8150  std::list<SpellScript::HitHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->AfterHit.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->AfterHit.begin();
8151  for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8152  (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8153 
8154  (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8155  }
8156 }
8157 
8158 void Spell::CallScriptObjectAreaTargetSelectHandlers(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets, SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
8159 {
8160  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8161  {
8162  (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_OBJECT_AREA_TARGET_SELECT);
8163  std::list<SpellScript::ObjectAreaTargetSelectHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnObjectAreaTargetSelect.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnObjectAreaTargetSelect.begin();
8164  for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8165  if (hookItr->IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && targetType.GetTarget() == hookItr->GetTarget())
8166  hookItr->Call(*scritr, targets);
8167 
8168  (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8169  }
8170 }
8171 
8172 void Spell::CallScriptObjectTargetSelectHandlers(WorldObject*& target, SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
8173 {
8174  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8175  {
8176  (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_OBJECT_TARGET_SELECT);
8177  std::list<SpellScript::ObjectTargetSelectHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnObjectTargetSelect.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnObjectTargetSelect.begin();
8178  for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8179  if (hookItr->IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && targetType.GetTarget() == hookItr->GetTarget())
8180  hookItr->Call(*scritr, target);
8181 
8182  (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8183  }
8184 }
8185 
8186 void Spell::CallScriptDestinationTargetSelectHandlers(SpellDestination& target, SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
8187 {
8188  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8189  {
8190  (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_DESTINATION_TARGET_SELECT);
8191  std::list<SpellScript::DestinationTargetSelectHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnDestinationTargetSelect.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnDestinationTargetSelect.begin();
8192  for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8193  if (hookItr->IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && targetType.GetTarget() == hookItr->GetTarget())
8194  hookItr->Call(*scritr, target);
8195 
8196  (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8197  }
8198 }
8199 
8200 bool Spell::CheckScriptEffectImplicitTargets(uint32 effIndex, uint32 effIndexToCheck)
8201 {
8202  // Skip if there are not any script
8203  if (!m_loadedScripts.size())
8204  return true;
8205 
8206  for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator itr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); itr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++itr)
8207  {
8208  std::list<SpellScript::ObjectTargetSelectHandler>::iterator targetSelectHookEnd = (*itr)->OnObjectTargetSelect.end(), targetSelectHookItr = (*itr)->OnObjectTargetSelect.begin();
8209  for (; targetSelectHookItr != targetSelectHookEnd; ++targetSelectHookItr)
8210  if (((*targetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && !(*targetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndexToCheck)) ||
8211  (!(*targetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && (*targetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndexToCheck)))
8212  return false;
8213 
8214  std::list<SpellScript::ObjectAreaTargetSelectHandler>::iterator areaTargetSelectHookEnd = (*itr)->OnObjectAreaTargetSelect.end(), areaTargetSelectHookItr = (*itr)->OnObjectAreaTargetSelect.begin();
8215  for (; areaTargetSelectHookItr != areaTargetSelectHookEnd; ++areaTargetSelectHookItr)
8216  if (((*areaTargetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && !(*areaTargetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndexToCheck)) ||
8217  (!(*areaTargetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && (*areaTargetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndexToCheck)))
8218  return false;
8219  }
8220  return true;
8221 }
8222 
8223 bool Spell::CanExecuteTriggersOnHit(uint8 effMask, SpellInfo const* triggeredByAura) const
8224 {
8225  // Relentless strikes, proc only from first effect
8226  if (triggeredByAura && triggeredByAura->SpellIconID == 559)
8227  return effMask & (1 << EFFECT_0);
8228 
8229  bool only_on_caster = (triggeredByAura && triggeredByAura->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_CLASS_TRIGGER_ONLY_ON_TARGET));
8230  // If triggeredByAura has SPELL_ATTR4_CLASS_TRIGGER_ONLY_ON_TARGET then it can only proc on a casted spell with TARGET_UNIT_CASTER
8231  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
8232  {
8233  if ((effMask & (1 << i)) && (!only_on_caster || (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_CASTER)))
8234  return true;
8235  }
8236  return effMask;
8237 }
8238 
8239 void Spell::PrepareTriggersExecutedOnHit()
8240 {
8241  // todo: move this to scripts
8242  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
8243  {
8244  SpellInfo const* excludeCasterSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spellInfo->ExcludeCasterAuraSpell);
8245  if (excludeCasterSpellInfo && !excludeCasterSpellInfo->IsPositive())
8246  m_preCastSpell = m_spellInfo->ExcludeCasterAuraSpell;
8247  SpellInfo const* excludeTargetSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spellInfo->ExcludeTargetAuraSpell);
8248  if (excludeTargetSpellInfo && !excludeTargetSpellInfo->IsPositive())
8249  m_preCastSpell = m_spellInfo->ExcludeTargetAuraSpell;
8250  }
8251 
8252  // todo: move this to scripts
8253  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
8254  {
8255  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
8256  {
8257  if( m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x40000000 )
8258  {
8259  Unit::AuraEffectList const& mVindication = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_SPELL);
8260  for(Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator itr = mVindication.begin(); itr != mVindication.end(); ++itr)
8261  {
8262  if( (*itr)->GetSpellInfo()->Effects[EFFECT_0].TriggerSpell == 26017 )
8263  {
8264  m_preCastSpell = 26017;
8265  break;
8266  }
8267  else if( (*itr)->GetSpellInfo()->Effects[EFFECT_0].TriggerSpell == 67 )
8268  m_preCastSpell = 67;
8269  }
8270  }
8271  break;
8272  }
8273  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
8274  {
8275  // Faerie Fire (Feral)
8276  if( m_spellInfo->Id == 16857 && (m_caster->GetShapeshiftForm() == FORM_BEAR || m_caster->GetShapeshiftForm() == FORM_DIREBEAR) )
8277  m_preCastSpell = 60089;
8278 
8279  break;
8280  }
8281  }
8282 
8283  // handle SPELL_AURA_ADD_TARGET_TRIGGER auras:
8284  // save auras which were present on spell caster on cast, to prevent triggered auras from affecting caster
8285  // and to correctly calculate proc chance when combopoints are present
8286  Unit::AuraEffectList const& targetTriggers = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_ADD_TARGET_TRIGGER);
8287  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = targetTriggers.begin(); i != targetTriggers.end(); ++i)
8288  {
8289  if (!(*i)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
8290  continue;
8291  SpellInfo const* auraSpellInfo = (*i)->GetSpellInfo();
8292  uint32 auraSpellIdx = (*i)->GetEffIndex();
8293  if (SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(auraSpellInfo->Effects[auraSpellIdx].TriggerSpell))
8294  {
8295  // calculate the chance using spell base amount, because aura amount is not updated on combo-points change
8296  // this possibly needs fixing
8297  int32 auraBaseAmount = (*i)->GetBaseAmount();
8298  // proc chance is stored in effect amount
8299  int32 chance = m_caster->CalculateSpellDamage(nullptr, auraSpellInfo, auraSpellIdx, &auraBaseAmount);
8300  // build trigger and add to the list
8301  HitTriggerSpell spellTriggerInfo;
8302  spellTriggerInfo.triggeredSpell = spellInfo;
8303  spellTriggerInfo.triggeredByAura = auraSpellInfo;
8304  spellTriggerInfo.chance = chance * (*i)->GetBase()->GetStackAmount();
8305  m_hitTriggerSpells.push_back(spellTriggerInfo);
8306  }
8307  }
8308 }
8309 
8310 // Global cooldowns management
8311 enum GCDLimits
8312 {
8313  MIN_GCD = 1000,
8314  MAX_GCD = 1500
8315 };
8316 
8317 bool Spell::HasGlobalCooldown() const
8318 {
8319  // Only player or controlled units have global cooldown
8320  if (m_caster->GetCharmInfo())
8321  return m_caster->GetCharmInfo()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().HasGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo);
8322  else if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8323  return m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().HasGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo);
8324  else
8325  return false;
8326 }
8327 
8328 void Spell::TriggerGlobalCooldown()
8329 {
8330  int32 gcd = m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime;
8331  if (!gcd)
8332  {
8333  // Xinef: fix for charmed pet spells with no cooldown info
8334  if (m_spellInfo->RecoveryTime == 0 && m_spellInfo->CategoryRecoveryTime == 0 && m_caster->GetCharmInfo())
8335  gcd = MIN_GCD;
8336  else
8337  return;
8338  }
8339 
8340  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8341  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_COOLDOWN))
8342  return;
8343 
8344  // Global cooldown can't leave range 1..1.5 secs
8345  // There are some spells (mostly not casted directly by player) that have < 1 sec and > 1.5 sec global cooldowns
8346  // but as tests show are not affected by any spell mods.
8347  if (m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime >= MIN_GCD && m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime <= MAX_GCD)
8348  {
8349  // gcd modifier auras are applied only to own spells and only players have such mods
8350  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8351  m_caster->ToPlayer()->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_GLOBAL_COOLDOWN, gcd, this);
8352 
8353  // Apply haste rating
8354  gcd = int32(float(gcd) * m_caster->GetFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED));
8355  if (gcd < MIN_GCD)
8356  gcd = MIN_GCD;
8357  else if (gcd > MAX_GCD)
8358  gcd = MAX_GCD;
8359  }
8360 
8361  // Only players or controlled units have global cooldown
8362  if (m_caster->GetCharmInfo())
8363  m_caster->GetCharmInfo()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().AddGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo, gcd);
8364  else if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8365  m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().AddGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo, gcd);
8366 }
8367 
8368 void Spell::CancelGlobalCooldown()
8369 {
8370  if (!m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime)
8371  return;
8372 
8373  // Cancel global cooldown when interrupting current cast
8374  if (m_caster->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL) != this)
8375  return;
8376 
8377  // Only players or controlled units have global cooldown
8378  if (m_caster->GetCharmInfo())
8379  m_caster->GetCharmInfo()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().CancelGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo);
8380  else if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8381  m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().CancelGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo);
8382 }
8383 
8384 void Spell::OnSpellLaunch()
8385 {
8386  if (!m_caster || !m_caster->IsInWorld())
8387  return;
8388 
8389  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(24390);
8390 
8391  // Make sure the player is sending a valid GO target and lock ID. SPELL_EFFECT_OPEN_LOCK
8392  // can succeed with a lockId of 0
8393  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 21651)
8394  {
8395  if (GameObject* go = m_targets.GetGOTarget())
8396  {
8397  LockEntry const* lockInfo = sLockStore.LookupEntry(go->GetGOInfo()->GetLockId());
8398  if (lockInfo && lockInfo->Index[1] == LOCKTYPE_SLOW_OPEN)
8399  {
8400  Spell* visual = new Spell(m_caster, spellInfo, TRIGGERED_NONE);
8401  visual->prepare(&m_targets);
8402  }
8403  }
8404  }
8405 }
8406 
8407 void TriggeredByAuraSpellData::Init(AuraEffect const* aurEff)
8408 {
8409  spellInfo = aurEff->GetSpellInfo();
8410  effectIndex = aurEff->GetEffIndex();
8411  tickNumber = aurEff->GetTickNumber();
8412 }
8413 
8414 namespace Acore
8415 {
8416 
8417  WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck::WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck(Unit* caster, Unit* referer, SpellInfo const* spellInfo,
8418  SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList) : _caster(caster), _referer(referer), _spellInfo(spellInfo),
8419  _targetSelectionType(selectionType), _condList(condList)
8420  {
8421  if (condList)
8422  _condSrcInfo = new ConditionSourceInfo(nullptr, caster);
8423  else
8424  _condSrcInfo = nullptr;
8425  }
8426 
8427  WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck::~WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck()
8428  {
8429  if (_condSrcInfo)
8430  delete _condSrcInfo;
8431  }
8432 
8433  bool WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck::operator()(WorldObject* target)
8434  {
8435  if (_spellInfo->CheckTarget(_caster, target, true) != SPELL_CAST_OK)
8436  return false;
8437  Unit* unitTarget = target->ToUnit();
8438  if (Corpse* corpseTarget = target->ToCorpse())
8439  {
8440  // use ofter for party/assistance checks
8441  if (Player* owner = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(corpseTarget->GetOwnerGUID()))
8442  unitTarget = owner;
8443  else
8444  return false;
8445  }
8446  if (unitTarget)
8447  {
8448  switch (_targetSelectionType)
8449  {
8450  case TARGET_CHECK_ENEMY:
8451  if (unitTarget->IsTotem())
8452  return false;
8453  if (!_caster->_IsValidAttackTarget(unitTarget, _spellInfo))
8454  return false;
8455  break;
8456  case TARGET_CHECK_ALLY:
8457  if (unitTarget->IsTotem())
8458  return false;
8459  if (!_caster->_IsValidAssistTarget(unitTarget, _spellInfo))
8460  return false;
8461  break;
8462  case TARGET_CHECK_PARTY:
8463  if (unitTarget->IsTotem())
8464  return false;
8465  if (!_caster->_IsValidAssistTarget(unitTarget, _spellInfo))
8466  return false;
8467  if (!_referer->IsInPartyWith(unitTarget))
8468  return false;
8469  break;
8470  case TARGET_CHECK_RAID_CLASS:
8471  if (_referer->getClass() != unitTarget->getClass())
8472  return false;
8473  [[fallthrough]];
8474  case TARGET_CHECK_RAID:
8475  if (unitTarget->IsTotem())
8476  return false;
8477  if (!_caster->_IsValidAssistTarget(unitTarget, _spellInfo))
8478  return false;
8479  if (!_referer->IsInRaidWith(unitTarget))
8480  return false;
8481  break;
8482  case TARGET_CHECK_CORPSE:
8483  if (_caster->IsFriendlyTo(unitTarget))
8484  return false;
8485  break;
8486  default:
8487  break;
8488  }
8489  }
8490  if (!_condSrcInfo)
8491  return true;
8492  _condSrcInfo->mConditionTargets[0] = target;
8493  return sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions(*_condSrcInfo, *_condList);
8494  }
8495 
8496  WorldObjectSpellNearbyTargetCheck::WorldObjectSpellNearbyTargetCheck(float range, Unit* caster, SpellInfo const* spellInfo,
8497  SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList)
8498  : WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck(caster, caster, spellInfo, selectionType, condList), _range(range), _position(caster)
8499  {
8500  }
8501 
8502  bool WorldObjectSpellNearbyTargetCheck::operator()(WorldObject* target)
8503  {
8504  float dist = target->GetDistance(*_position);
8505  if (dist < _range && WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck::operator ()(target))
8506  {
8507  _range = dist;
8508  return true;
8509  }
8510  return false;
8511  }
8512 
8513  WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck::WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck(float range, Position const* position, Unit* caster,
8514  Unit* referer, SpellInfo const* spellInfo, SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList)
8515  : WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck(caster, referer, spellInfo, selectionType, condList), _range(range), _position(position)
8516  {
8517  }
8518 
8519  bool WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck::operator()(WorldObject* target)
8520  {
8521  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT)
8522  {
8523  if (!target->ToGameObject()->IsInRange(_position->GetPositionX(), _position->GetPositionY(), _position->GetPositionZ(), _range))
8524  return false;
8525  }
8526  else if (!target->IsWithinDist3d(_position, _range))
8527  return false;
8528  else if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->ToCreature()->IsAvoidingAOE()) // pussywizard
8529  return false;
8530  return WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck::operator ()(target);
8531  }
8532 
8533  WorldObjectSpellConeTargetCheck::WorldObjectSpellConeTargetCheck(float coneAngle, float range, Unit* caster,
8534  SpellInfo const* spellInfo, SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList)
8535  : WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck(range, caster, caster, caster, spellInfo, selectionType, condList), _coneAngle(coneAngle)
8536  {
8537  }
8538 
8539  bool WorldObjectSpellConeTargetCheck::operator()(WorldObject* target)
8540  {
8541  if (_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_CONE_BACK))
8542  {
8543  if (!_caster->isInBack(target, _coneAngle))
8544  return false;
8545  }
8546  else if (_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_CONE_LINE))
8547  {
8548  if (!_caster->HasInLine(target, _caster->GetObjectSize()))
8549  return false;
8550  }
8551  else
8552  {
8553  if (!_caster->isInFront(target, _coneAngle))
8554  return false;
8555  }
8556  return WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck::operator ()(target);
8557  }
8558 
8559  WorldObjectSpellTrajTargetCheck::WorldObjectSpellTrajTargetCheck(float range, Position const* position, Unit* caster,
8560  SpellInfo const* spellInfo, SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList)
8561  : WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck(range, position, caster, caster, spellInfo, selectionType, condList)
8562  {
8563  }
8564 
8565  bool WorldObjectSpellTrajTargetCheck::operator()(WorldObject* target)
8566  {
8567  // return all targets on missile trajectory (0 - size of a missile)
8568  if (!_caster->HasInLine(target, 0))
8569  return false;
8570  return WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck::operator ()(target);
8571  }
8572 
8573 } //namespace Acore
